trans-unit.source: And that those who do not believe in the Hereafter - We have prepared for them a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: An dass déi, déi zu der verdéngt do net gleewen - Mir hu fir hinnen e batteren Strof virbereet.

trans-unit.source: And man supplicates for evil as he supplicates for good, and man is ever hasty.
trans-unit.target: A Mann supplicates fir béist wéi hie fir gutt supplicates, an de Mann ass schons hecktësch.

trans-unit.source: And We have made the night and day two signs, and We erased the sign of the night and made the sign of the day visible that you may seek bounty from your Lord and may know the number of years and the account [of time]. And everything We have set out in detail.
trans-unit.target: A mir hunn d'Nuecht an Dag zwee Izeger feieren, a Mir Youkai d'Zeechen vun der Nuecht an huet d'Zeechen vun der Daag ze gesinn, datt Dir Bounty aus Är Här sichen kann a kann d'Zuel vun Joeren kennen an de Kont [vun Zäit].

trans-unit.source: And [for] every person We have imposed his fate upon his neck, and We will produce for him on the Day of Resurrection a record which he will encounter spread open.
trans-unit.target: An [fir] all Persoun Mir säi Schicksal op säin Hals ausgeschafft, an Mir fir him op den Dag vun Akten e Rekord produzéiere wéi hien oppe verbreet gëtt begéinen.

trans-unit.source: [It will be said], "Read your record. Sufficient is yourself against you this Day as accountant."
trans-unit.target: [Et ass gesot ginn], "Äre Rekord Weiderliesen. Duer ass selwer géint Dir dësen Dag als Comptabel."

trans-unit.source: Whoever is guided is only guided for [the benefit of] his soul. And whoever errs only errs against it. And no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. And never would We punish until We sent a messenger.
trans-unit.target: Deejéinegen orientéiert ass nëmme fir [de Virdeel vun] seng Séil guidéiert.

trans-unit.source: And when We intend to destroy a city, We command its affluent but they defiantly disobey therein; so the word comes into effect upon it, and We destroy it with [complete] destruction.
trans-unit.target: An wann mer wëlles eng Stad ze zerstéieren, Kommando Mir seng Zouflosspunkt mä si hir Käschte dem Spannungen;

trans-unit.source: And how many have We destroyed from the generations after Noah. And sufficient is your Lord, concerning the sins of His servants, as Acquainted and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: A wéivill hu mir aus der Generatiounen no Noah zerstéiert.

trans-unit.source: Whoever should desire the immediate - We hasten for him from it what We will to whom We intend. Then We have made for him Hell, which he will [enter to] burn, censured and banished.
trans-unit.target: Wien soll der direkter Wonsch - Mir fir him aus et hasten wat Mir wäerten un deenen Mir plangen.

trans-unit.source: But whoever desires the Hereafter and exerts the effort due to it while he is a believer - it is those whose effort is ever appreciated [by Allah].
trans-unit.target: Mä wien Lëschter der verdéngt an enormen den Effort wéinst et iwwerdeems hien e gleeweg ass - et deenen hir Ustrengunge ass schons schätze [vun gefroot].

trans-unit.source: To each [category] We extend - to these and to those - from the gift of your Lord. And never has the gift of your Lord been restricted.
trans-unit.target: Fir all [Kategorie] Mir verlängeren - bis dës an déi - vun de Cadeau vu Är Här.

trans-unit.source: Look how We have favored [in provision] some of them over others. But the Hereafter is greater in degrees [of difference] and greater in distinction.
trans-unit.target: Kucken, wéi mer refuséiert hunn [zu Dispositioun] puer vun hinnen iwwer anerer.

trans-unit.source: Do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity and [thereby] become censured and forsaken.
trans-unit.target: Mengt net [als gläichberechtegt] maachen mat gefroot aner reliéis a [domat] ginn censured a verlooss.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord has decreed that you not worship except Him, and to parents, good treatment. Whether one or both of them reach old age [while] with you, say not to them [so much as], "uff," and do not repel them but speak to them a noble word.
trans-unit.target: An Äre Här huet Dekret dass Dir net ausser unzweiwelen, an Elteren, gudd behandelt.

trans-unit.source: And lower to them the wing of humility out of mercy and say, "My Lord, have mercy upon them as they brought me up [when I was] small."
trans-unit.target: A klenggeschriwwene hinne der Säit vun virukommen aus Barmhäerzegkeet a soen, "My Lord, hunn Barmhäerzegkeet op se nodeems se mech bruecht huet [wou ech war] kleng."

trans-unit.source: Your Lord is most knowing of what is within yourselves. If you should be righteous [in intention] - then indeed He is ever, to the often returning [to Him], Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Är Här ass déi wëssen vu wat bannen eens ass.

trans-unit.source: And give the relative his right, and [also] the poor and the traveler, and do not spend wastefully.
trans-unit.target: An der säin Recht relativ, an [och] déi aarm an déi Resender, a verbréngt net wastefully.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the wasteful are brothers of the devils, and ever has Satan been to his Lord ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt sinn d'wasteful Bridder vum lass, a schons huet zu sengem Här dankbar Satan ginn.

trans-unit.source: And if you [must] turn away from the needy awaiting mercy from your Lord which you expect, then speak to them a gentle word.
trans-unit.target: A wann Dir [muss] Tour ewech vun der schlechter Woch Barmhäerzegkeet vu Är Lord, deen dir erwaart, schwätzt dann zu hinnen eng sanft Wuert.

trans-unit.source: And do not make your hand [as] chained to your neck or extend it completely and [thereby] become blamed and insolvent.
trans-unit.target: An net deng Hand maachen [den] un den Hals jonk oder verlängeren et misst an [domat] ginn hung an insolvent.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]. Indeed He is ever, concerning His servants, Acquainted and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech Är Här Preventioun Dispositioun fir wiem hien Wills an din [ass].

trans-unit.source: And do not kill your children for fear of poverty. We provide for them and for you. Indeed, their killing is ever a great sin.
trans-unit.target: An do dierf net Är Kanner fir Angscht vun Aarmut.

trans-unit.source: And do not approach unlawful sexual intercourse. Indeed, it is ever an immorality and is evil as a way.
trans-unit.target: An do Approche net onerlaabt sexuell Residenz.

trans-unit.source: And do not kill the soul which Allah has forbidden, except by right. And whoever is killed unjustly - We have given his heir authority, but let him not exceed limits in [the matter of] taking life. Indeed, he has been supported [by the law].
trans-unit.target: An do dierf net d'Séil déi gefroot verbueden huet, ausser déi riets.

trans-unit.source: And do not approach the property of an orphan, except in the way that is best, until he reaches maturity. And fulfill [every] commitment. Indeed, the commitment is ever [that about which one will be] questioned.
trans-unit.target: An Approche net d'Proprietéit vun enger orphan, ausser an der Method, déi bescht ass, bis hien Defilé erreecht.

trans-unit.source: And give full measure when you measure, and weigh with an even balance. That is the best [way] and best in result.
trans-unit.target: Eraginn Mooss voll wann Dir Moossnam, a jiddweree mat enger souguer Gläichgewiicht.

trans-unit.source: And do not pursue that of which you have no knowledge. Indeed, the hearing, the sight and the heart - about all those [one] will be questioned.
trans-unit.target: A féieren net, datt vun deenen Dir keng Kenntnisser hunn.

trans-unit.source: And do not walk upon the earth exultantly. Indeed, you will never tear the earth [apart], and you will never reach the mountains in height.
trans-unit.target: An do trëppelt net exultantly op der Äerd.

trans-unit.source: All that - its evil is ever, in the sight of your Lord, detested.
trans-unit.target: All datt - seng Béisen ass schons, an d'Vue vun Äre Lord, detested.

trans-unit.source: That is from what your Lord has revealed to you, [O Muhammad], of wisdom. And, [O mankind], do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity, lest you be thrown into Hell, blamed and banished.
trans-unit.target: Dat ass aus wat Är Här huet zu Iech verroden, [O Muhammad], vun Wäisheet.

trans-unit.source: Then, has your Lord chosen you for [having] sons and taken from among the angels daughters? Indeed, you say a grave saying.
trans-unit.target: Dunn, huet Är Här Dir fir [mussen] Jongen gewielt an aus ënner der Engelen Duechtere geholl?

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly diversified [the contents] in this Qur'an that mankind may be reminded, but it does not increase the disbelievers except in aversion.
trans-unit.target: A mir hunn natierlech diversifizéiert [den Inhalter] an dësem Koran dass Menschen drun erënnert ginn, mä et heescht Erhéijung net iech ausser an aversion.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "If there had been with Him [other] gods, as they say, then they [each] would have sought to the Owner of the Throne a way."
trans-unit.target: Soen, [O Muhammad], "Wann et mat Him gouf [anere] Gëtter, wéi si soen, da si [all] hätt fir de Bauhär vun den Troun e Wee gesicht."

trans-unit.source: Exalted is He and high above what they say by great sublimity.
trans-unit.target: Getrennt ass hien an héich uewen wat se soen, déi grouss sublimity.

trans-unit.source: The seven heavens and the earth and whatever is in them exalt Him. And there is not a thing except that it exalts [Allah] by His praise, but you do not understand their [way of] exalting. Indeed, He is ever Forbearing and Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Déi siwe Himmel an d'Äerd an egal ass an hinne soe wëll.

trans-unit.source: And when you recite the Qur'an, We put between you and those who do not believe in the Hereafter a concealed partition.
trans-unit.target: A wann Dir der Koran och vu sech, Mir huet tëscht Iech an deenen déi an der verdéngt eng Bak Partitur do net gleewen.

trans-unit.source: And We have placed over their hearts coverings, lest they understand it, and in their ears deafness. And when you mention your Lord alone in the Qur'an, they turn back in aversion.
trans-unit.target: A mir hunn iwwer hir Häerzer Mauerbelag gesat, bewaacht se et verstoen, an hir Oueren deafness.

trans-unit.source: We are most knowing of how they listen to it when they listen to you and [of] when they are in private conversation, when the wrongdoers say, "You follow not but a man affected by magic."
trans-unit.target: Mir sinn déi wëssen vu wéi se bis et lauschteren wann se dir nolauschtert an [vun] wou si am private Gespréich, wann der wrongdoers soen, "Dir dann net awer en Mann vun enger magescher betraff."

trans-unit.source: Look how they strike for you comparisons; but they have strayed, so they cannot [find] a way.
trans-unit.target: Kucken, wéi se fir Iech Vergläicher gaangen;

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When we are bones and crumbled particles, will we [truly] be resurrected as a new creation?"
trans-unit.target: A si soen, "Wann mir Schanken an crumbled Deelercher sinn, wäerte mer [wierklech] als nei Kreatioun geruff ginn?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Be you stones or iron
trans-unit.target: Soen, "Be Dir Steng oder Eisen-

trans-unit.source: Or [any] creation of that which is great within your breasts." And they will say, "Who will restore us?" Say, "He who brought you forth the first time." Then they will nod their heads toward you and say, "When is that?" Say, "Perhaps it will be soon -
trans-unit.target: Oder [keng] Kreatioun vun deem wat bannent Är Broscht grouss ass. "A si soen," Wien eis et erëm? "So," Hien deen Dir hat d'éischte Kéier erausbréngen. "Da gëtt se hire Kapp hin Dir wénken a soen

trans-unit.source: On the Day He will call you and you will respond with praise of Him and think that you had not remained [in the world] except for a little."
trans-unit.target: Op der Day wäert Hien Dir ruffen an da mat luewen vun Him z'äntwerten an dass dir [an der Welt] ausser fir e klenge net ëmmer haten. "

trans-unit.source: And tell My servants to say that which is best. Indeed, Satan induces [dissension] among them. Indeed Satan is ever, to mankind, a clear enemy.
trans-unit.target: A soen Meng Dénger, déi soen dat bescht ass.

trans-unit.source: Your Lord is most knowing of you. If He wills, He will have mercy upon you; or if He wills, He will punish you. And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], over them as a manager.
trans-unit.target: Är Här ass déi wëssen vun dir.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord is most knowing of whoever is in the heavens and the earth. And We have made some of the prophets exceed others [in various ways], and to David We gave the book [of Psalms].
trans-unit.target: An Äre Här ass déi wëssen vu wien am Himmel ass an der Äerd.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Invoke those you have claimed [as gods] besides Him, for they do not possess the [ability for] removal of adversity from you or [for its] transfer [to someone else]."
trans-unit.target: Soen, "Kommandozeilvervollstännegung déi Dir [als Gëtter] niewt Hien hat hunn, fir si an der [Fähegkeet fir] Entfernung vun der Distanz vum Dir net besëtzen oder [fir seng] Transfermaart [zu engem aneren]."

trans-unit.source: Those whom they invoke seek means of access to their Lord, [striving as to] which of them would be nearest, and they hope for His mercy and fear His punishment. Indeed, the punishment of your Lord is ever feared.
trans-unit.target: Déi wiem se sichen sech op heescht vun Zougang zu hirem Här, [Quotefraen wéi zu] déi vun hinnen wier zueneen, a si hoffen fir säin Opfer an Angscht Seng Strof.

trans-unit.source: And there is no city but that We will destroy it before the Day of Resurrection or punish it with a severe punishment. That has ever been in the Register inscribed.
trans-unit.target: An do ass keng Stad, mee datt mir et virun der Day vun Akten zerstéieren oder se mat engem schwéieren Strof bestrofen.

trans-unit.source: And nothing has prevented Us from sending signs except that the former peoples denied them. And We gave Thamud the she-camel as a visible sign, but they wronged her. And We send not the signs except as a warning.
trans-unit.target: An näischt ass eis vun Hellewull Unzeeche ausser verhënnert, datt de fréiere Populatiounen se refüséiert.

trans-unit.source: And [remember, O Muhammad], when We told you, "Indeed, your Lord has encompassed the people." And We did not make the sight which We showed you except as a trial for the people, as was the accursed tree [mentioned] in the Qur'an. And We threaten them, but it increases them not except in great transgression.
trans-unit.target: An [erënneren, O Muhammad], wou mir gesot, "Iwwerhaapt Är Lord d'Leit Iwwernuechten huet."

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when We said to the angles, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except for Iblees. He said, "Should I prostrate to one You created from clay?"
trans-unit.target: An [Gewerkschaft] wou mir gesot fir d'Lokaléquipe, "zu Adam Gesiicht," a si eng formidabel Vue, ausser fir Iblees.

trans-unit.source: [Iblees] said, "Do You see this one whom You have honored above me? If You delay me until the Day of Resurrection, I will surely destroy his descendants, except for a few."
trans-unit.target: [Iblees] gesot, "Sidd Dir dat ee gesinn deen Dir virun mech geéiert hunn? Wann Dir mech Retard bis den Dag vun Akten, wäert ech seng Nokommen zerstéieren, ausser e puer."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Go, for whoever of them follows you, indeed Hell will be the recompense of you - an ample recompense.
trans-unit.target: [Gefroot] gesot, "Go, fir vun hinnen wien kënnt Dir, jo regelrecht Hell der unzerkennen vun Iech ginn - eng doriwwer unzerkennen.

trans-unit.source: And incite [to senselessness] whoever you can among them with your voice and assault them with your horses and foot soldiers and become a partner in their wealth and their children and promise them." But Satan does not promise them except delusion.
trans-unit.target: An r [zu senselessness] wien Dir kënnt dorënner mat Ärer Stëmm an iwwerfalen hinnen mat Äre Päerd a Fouss Zaldoten a ginn e Partner an hire Räichtum an hir Kanner an si verspriechen. "Mä Satan net verspriechen se net ausser illuminanter.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, over My [believing] servants there is for you no authority. And sufficient is your Lord as Disposer of affairs.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, iwwer Meng [gleeft] Dénger do ass fir dir keng Autoritéit.

trans-unit.source: It is your Lord who drives the ship for you through the sea that you may seek of His bounty. Indeed, He is ever, to you, Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Et ass Är Här deen d'Schëff fir Iech duerch d'Mier fiert, datt Dir vu sengem Bounty sichen kann.

trans-unit.source: And when adversity touches you at sea, lost are [all] those you invoke except for Him. But when He delivers you to the land, you turn away [from Him]. And ever is man ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: An wann der Distanz Iech um Mier Schlëff, verluer ginn [all] déi Dir ausser Him schwätzen.

trans-unit.source: Then do you feel secure that [instead] He will not cause a part of the land to swallow you or send against you a storm of stones? Then you would not find for yourselves an advocate.
trans-unit.target: Da wësst Dir sécher fillen, datt [amplaz] Hien ass net en Deel vun der Grondsteier féieren iech drénkt oder géint Dir engem Stuerm vun Steng schécken?

trans-unit.source: Or do you feel secure that He will not send you back into the sea another time and send upon you a hurricane of wind and drown you for what you denied? Then you would not find for yourselves against Us an avenger.
trans-unit.target: Oder do sécher fillt, datt hien Iech net an d'Mier aner Kéier schécken zréck a schéckt op Dir en Hurrikan vun Wand an engem Communiqué Dir fir wat Dir verweigert?

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly honored the children of Adam and carried them on the land and sea and provided for them of the good things and preferred them over much of what We have created, with [definite] preference.
trans-unit.target: A mir hunn natierlech d'Kanner vun Adam geéiert a gedroen hinnen op der Grondsteier a Mier fir se vun de gudde Saachen gëtt an hir Défense konzentréiert fir hinnen iwwer vill vun deem wat mir hunn, mat [definitive] Astellung.

trans-unit.source: [Mention, O Muhammad], the Day We will call forth every people with their record [of deeds]. Then whoever is given his record in his right hand - those will read their records, and injustice will not be done to them, [even] as much as a thread [inside the date seed].
trans-unit.target: [Ernimmung, O Muhammad], den Day Mir ruffen Iech all Leit mat hirem Album erausbréngen [vun mierks].

trans-unit.source: And whoever is blind in this [life] will be blind in the Hereafter and more astray in way.
trans-unit.target: A wien ass blann an dëser [Liewen] gëtt am Wee an d'verdéngt a méi astray blann ginn.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, they were about to tempt you away from that which We revealed to you in order to [make] you invent about Us something else; and then they would have taken you as a friend.
trans-unit.target: An jo, si waren iwwer Dir ewech ze changéieren aus, datt dat mer iech fir Teamchef [maachen] Iech iwwert eis eppes erfannen aneren;

trans-unit.source: And if We had not strengthened you, you would have almost inclined to them a little.
trans-unit.target: An wann mir Iech net verstäerkt hat, hätt Dir bal viséiert hinnen e bëssen.

trans-unit.source: Then [if you had], We would have made you taste double [punishment in] life and double [after] death. Then you would not find for yourself against Us a helper.
trans-unit.target: Da [wann Dir déi], hätt Mir feieren Dir duebel [Strof zu] Liewen an duebel [nom] Doud Goût.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, they were about to drive you from the land to evict you therefrom. And then [when they do], they will not remain [there] after you, except for a little.
trans-unit.target: An jo, waren si iwwert Iech aus dem Land ze fueren bis evict Dir therefrom.

trans-unit.source: [That is Our] established way for those We had sent before you of Our messengers; and you will not find in Our way any alteration.
trans-unit.target: [Dat ass Eis] gegrënnt Manéier fir Leit Mir ier Dir vun Eis Vermëttler geschéckt haten;

trans-unit.source: Establish prayer at the decline of the sun [from its meridian] until the darkness of the night and [also] the Qur'an of dawn. Indeed, the recitation of dawn is ever witnessed.
trans-unit.target: Eng Gebiet um Ënnergang vun der Sonn [aus hirer Miessung] bis d'Däischtert vun der Nuecht an [och] de Koran vun Sonnenopgang.

trans-unit.source: And from [part of] the night, pray with it as additional [worship] for you; it is expected that your Lord will resurrect you to a praised station.
trans-unit.target: An aus [Deel vun] der Nuecht, biede mat se als zousätzlech [Chouer] fir Iech;

trans-unit.source: And say, "My Lord, cause me to enter a sound entrance and to exit a sound exit and grant me from Yourself a supporting authority."
trans-unit.target: A soen, "My Lord, verursaache mech eng zolitt Entrée fir eran an eng zolitt Sortie ze Sortie an heimat mech aus selwer eng ënnerstëtz Autoritéit."

trans-unit.source: And say, "Truth has come, and falsehood has departed. Indeed is falsehood, [by nature], ever bound to depart."
trans-unit.target: A soen, "Truth ass komm, an falsehood higaang ass. Iwwerhaapt falsehood ass, [duerch Natur], jee zu fortfueren gebonnen."

trans-unit.source: And We send down of the Qur'an that which is healing and mercy for the believers, but it does not increase the wrongdoers except in loss.
trans-unit.target: A mir schécken Ugrëff vun de Koran, datt déi verkënnegt Barmhäerzegkeet fir de Jesus ass, mee et Erhéijung net de wrongdoers ausser zu Verloscht.

trans-unit.source: And when We bestow favor upon the disbeliever, he turns away and distances himself; and when evil touches him, he is ever despairing.
trans-unit.target: A wann mir dofir op d'disbeliever Härebierg, hie vläit ewech an Distanzen selwer;

trans-unit.source: Say, "Each works according to his manner, but your Lord is most knowing of who is best guided in way."
trans-unit.target: Soen, "All Wierker no senger Fassong, mä Är Här ass déi wëssen ween am Wee beschte opgewäert gëtt."

trans-unit.source: And they ask you, [O Muhammad], about the soul. Say, "The soul is of the affair of my Lord. And mankind have not been given of knowledge except a little."
trans-unit.target: A se froen Iech, [O Muhammad], un der Séil.

trans-unit.source: And if We willed, We could surely do away with that which We revealed to you. Then you would not find for yourself concerning it an advocate against Us.
trans-unit.target: An wann mir hierkënnt, konnt mer do sécherlech mat deem ewech, déi mer Iech verroden.

trans-unit.source: Except [We have left it with you] as a mercy from your Lord. Indeed, His favor upon you has ever been great.
trans-unit.target: Ausser [Mir hunn et lénks mat Iech] als Opfer vu Är Här.

trans-unit.source: Say, "If mankind and the jinn gathered in order to produce the like of this Qur'an, they could not produce the like of it, even if they were to each other assistants."
trans-unit.target: Soen, "Wann Menschen an der jinn fir afonnt d'wëll vun dëser Koran ze produzéieren, konnt si de wëll et net ze produzéieren, och wann se niefteneen Assistenten goufen."

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly diversified for the people in this Qur'an from every [kind] of example, but most of the people refused [anything] except disbelief.
trans-unit.target: A mir hunn diversifizéiert sécher fir d'Leit an dësem Koran aus all [Aart] vun Beispill, mä déi meescht vun de Leit refuséiert [näischt] ausser Teamorder.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "We will not believe you until you break open for us from the ground a spring.
trans-unit.target: A si soen, "Mir wäert Iech net gleewen, bis dir eng Fréijoer fir eis aus dem Buedem oppen Paus.

trans-unit.source: Or [until] you have a garden of palm tress and grapes and make rivers gush forth within them in force [and abundance]
trans-unit.target: Oder [bis] Dir hutt e Gaart vun palm Tress an Drauwe a Flëss gush erausbréngen bannent se a Kraaft [an Heefegkeet]

trans-unit.source: Or you make the heaven fall upon us in fragments as you have claimed or you bring Allah and the angels before [us]
trans-unit.target: Oder Dir maacht de Himmel oblige zu Fragmenter Hierscht wéi Dir hat hutt oder Iech eis gefroot an d'Engele ier [eis]

trans-unit.source: Or you have a house of gold or you ascend into the sky. And [even then], we will not believe in your ascension until you bring down to us a book we may read." Say, "Exalted is my Lord! Was I ever but a human messenger?"
trans-unit.target: Oder Dir hutt engem Haus vu Gold oder Dir eropklammen den Himmel.

trans-unit.source: And what prevented the people from believing when guidance came to them except that they said, "Has Allah sent a human messenger?"
trans-unit.target: A wat de Leit aus Iwwerzeegung penibel wann d'Leedung zu hinnen komm, ausser datt se gesot, "Huet geschéckt gefroot engem Mënsch Messenger?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "If there were upon the earth angels walking securely, We would have sent down to them from the heaven an angel [as a] messenger."
trans-unit.target: Soen, "wann et op der Äerd Engele sech sécher Fouss, géif Mir mussen hinnen aus dem Himmel en Engel [als] Messenger geschéckt huet."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Sufficient is Allah as Witness between me and you. Indeed he is ever, concerning His servants, Acquainted and Seeing."
trans-unit.target: Soen, "duer gefroot als Zeien tëscht mech ass an dir. Tatsächlech ass hien schons, iwwer säin Dénger, leieren an entlaang."

trans-unit.source: And whoever Allah guides - he is the [rightly] guided; and whoever He sends astray - you will never find for them protectors besides Him, and We will gather them on the Day of Resurrection [fallen] on their faces - blind, dumb and deaf. Their refuge is Hell; every time it subsides We increase them in blazing fire.
trans-unit.target: A wien gefroot kenneléieren - hien ass den [mécht] orientéiert;

trans-unit.source: That is their recompense because they disbelieved in Our verses and said, "When we are bones and crumbled particles, will we [truly] be resurrected [in] a new creation?"
trans-unit.target: Dat ass hir unzerkennen well se zu Eis Verse disbelieved a gesot, "Wann mir Schanken an crumbled Deelercher sinn, wäerte mer [wierklech] [an] eng nei Kreatioun geruff ginn?"

trans-unit.source: Do they not see that Allah, who created the heavens and earth, is [the one] Able to create the likes of them? And He has appointed for them a term, about which there is no doubt. But the wrongdoers refuse [anything] except disbelief.
trans-unit.target: gesinn do si net dass gefroot, deen Himmel an Äerd erschaf huet, ass [déi een] Lag gär vun hinnen ze schafen?

trans-unit.source: Say [to them], "If you possessed the depositories of the mercy of my Lord, then you would withhold out of fear of spending." And ever has man been stingy.
trans-unit.target: Soen [hinnen], "Wann s de depositories vun der Barmhäerzegkeet vu mengem Här haat, dann hätt dir vun Angscht vun Ausgaben aller eraus."

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given Moses nine evident signs, so ask the Children of Israel [about] when he came to them and Pharaoh said to him, "Indeed I think, O Moses, that you are affected by magic."
trans-unit.target: A mir hu sécherlech entscheet Moses néng evident Schëlder, sou froen d'Kanner vun Israel [iwwert] wou hien huet hinnen an Pharaoh sot zu him: "Iwwerhaapt mengen ech, O Moses, datt Dir déi magesch betraff sinn."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "You have already known that none has sent down these [signs] except the Lord of the heavens and the earth as evidence, and indeed I think, O Pharaoh, that you are destroyed."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] gesot, "Dir hutt scho bekannt datt keen dës [Unzeeche] geschéckt verwandelt huet ausser dem Här vun den Himmel an d'Äerd als Beweiser, an zwar mengen ech, O Pharaoh, datt Dir zerstéiert ginn."

trans-unit.source: So he intended to drive them from the land, but We drowned him and those with him all together.
trans-unit.target: Sou gehofft hien hinnen aus dem Land ze fueren, mä mir leien him an déi mat him all zesummen.

trans-unit.source: And We said after Pharaoh to the Children of Israel, "Dwell in the land, and when there comes the promise of the Hereafter, We will bring you forth in [one] gathering."
trans-unit.target: A mir gesot no Pharaoh fir d'Kanner vun Israel, "am Land agespaart, an wann et der Versprieche vun der verdéngt kënnt, wäert Mir dir eis spannender [een] versammelen."

trans-unit.source: And with the truth We have sent the Qur'an down, and with the truth it has descended. And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a bringer of good tidings and a warner.
trans-unit.target: A mat der Wourecht Mir hunn de Koran erof, a mat der Wourecht et ass erofgaang geschéckt.

trans-unit.source: And [it is] a Qur'an which We have separated [by intervals] that you might recite it to the people over a prolonged period. And We have sent it down progressively.
trans-unit.target: An [ass] engem Koran deen Mir getrennt hunn [vun Intervalle], datt Dir et fir d'Leit iwwer eng länger Zäit och vu sech kéinten.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Believe in it or do not believe. Indeed, those who were given knowledge before it - when it is recited to them, they fall upon their faces in prostration,
trans-unit.target: Soen, "Geld an et oder gleewen net zréckzeféieren, déi Wëssen uvertraut ginn ier se -. Wann et hinnen recited ass, se falen op hir Gesiichter an prostration,

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Exalted is our Lord! Indeed, the promise of our Lord has been fulfilled."
trans-unit.target: A si soen, "getrennt ass eisen Här! Zréckzeféieren, déi verspriechen vun eisem Här huet erfëllt gouf."

trans-unit.source: And they fall upon their faces weeping, and the Qur'an increases them in humble submission.
trans-unit.target: An se falen op hir Gesiichter gekrasch, an de Koran Erhéijunge hinnen an bescheiden Soumissioun.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Call upon Allah or call upon the Most Merciful. Whichever [name] you call - to Him belong the best names." And do not recite [too] loudly in your prayer or [too] quietly but seek between that an [intermediate] way.
trans-unit.target: Soen, "ruffen gefroot oder ruffen déi meescht Verléierer Egal [Numm] Dir Opruff -. Hien de beschte Nimm gehéieren."

trans-unit.source: And say, "Praise to Allah, who has not taken a son and has had no partner in [His] dominion and has no [need of a] protector out of weakness; and glorify Him with [great] glorification."
trans-unit.target: A soen, "Lueft ze gleewen, deen net vun engem Jong geholl huet, an huet zu [Seng] Dominion kee Partner haten an huet kee [muss vun engem] Protecteur aus Schwäch; an Villmools Him mat [super] glorification."

trans-unit.source: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, who has sent down upon His Servant the Book and has not made therein any deviance.
trans-unit.target: [All] luewen ass [wéinst] ze gleewen, deen d'Buch op säin Déngschtmeedche geschéckt verwandelt huet an huet net androen all deviance.

trans-unit.source: [He has made it] straight, to warn of severe punishment from Him and to give good tidings to the believers who do righteous deeds that they will have a good reward
trans-unit.target: riichter [Hien huet et gemaach], vun Him vun schwéieren Strof ze warnen a gutt Noriicht fir d'Gleeweger ginn déi Gerecht mierks maachen, datt se eng gutt Belounung hu wäert

trans-unit.source: In which they will remain forever
trans-unit.target: An dat wäert si bleift ëmmer

trans-unit.source: And to warn those who say, "Allah has taken a son."
trans-unit.target: An ze warnen, déi soen, "gefroot e Jong geholl huet."

trans-unit.source: They have no knowledge of it, nor had their fathers. Grave is the word that comes out of their mouths; they speak not except a lie.
trans-unit.target: Si hu kee Wësse vun et, nach déi hir Pappen.

trans-unit.source: Then perhaps you would kill yourself through grief over them, [O Muhammad], if they do not believe in this message, [and] out of sorrow.
trans-unit.target: Da vläicht Dir Iech duerch Trauer iwwer hinnen kill géif, [O Muhammad], wann se gleewen net zu dësem Message, [a] aus traureg.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have made that which is on the earth adornment for it that We may test them [as to] which of them is best in deed.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, Mir hunn dat gemaach, wat fir hien op der Äerd adornment ass, datt mir hinnen Test kann [wéi zu] vun hinnen déi an enregistréiert bescht ass.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, We will make that which is upon it [into] a barren ground.
trans-unit.target: An jo, wäert mir dat maachen, wat op se ass [an] enger Fraen Buedem.

trans-unit.source: Or have you thought that the companions of the cave and the inscription were, among Our signs, a wonder?
trans-unit.target: Oder hun gemengt dir dass de Begleeder vun der Höhl an der Opschrëft goufen, dorënner Eis Schëlder, e Wonner?

trans-unit.source: [Mention] when the youths retreated to the cave and said, "Our Lord, grant us from Yourself mercy and prepare for us from our affair right guidance."
trans-unit.target: [Ernimmung] wann de Jugendlechen un der Höhl reagéiert a sot, "Eis Lord, heimat eis aus selwer Barmhäerzegkeet a preparéieren fir eis aus eiser Affär Recht Orientatioun."

trans-unit.source: So We cast [a cover of sleep] over their ears within the cave for a number of years.
trans-unit.target: Also Goss Mir [e Cover vun Schlof] iwwer hir Oueren an der Höhl fir eng Rei vu Joren.

trans-unit.source: Then We awakened them that We might show which of the two factions was most precise in calculating what [extent] they had remained in time.
trans-unit.target: Mir Hernandez hinnen dann, datt mir dat vun de zwou eenzel Faktioune weisen kéint war präzis zu Paien wat [Mooss] si zu Zäit blouf haten.

trans-unit.source: It is We who relate to you, [O Muhammad], their story in truth. Indeed, they were youths who believed in their Lord, and We increased them in guidance.
trans-unit.target: Et ass mer deen Iech concernéieren, [O Muhammad], hir Geschicht an d'Wourecht.

trans-unit.source: And We made firm their hearts when they stood up and said, "Our Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth. Never will we invoke besides Him any deity. We would have certainly spoken, then, an excessive transgression.
trans-unit.target: An Mir feieren Firma hir Häerzer wann si opgestan an huet gesot, "Eis Lord de Lord vun den Himmel ass an der Äerd. Ni wäerte mir nieft Him all Wiesen schwätzen. Mir wier sécherlech geschwat hunn, dann, exzessivem transgression.

trans-unit.source: These, our people, have taken besides Him deities. Why do they not bring for [worship of] them a clear authority? And who is more unjust than one who invents about Allah a lie?"
trans-unit.target: Dës, eis Leit, déi niewt Him fënnt geholl.

trans-unit.source: [The youths said to one another], "And when you have withdrawn from them and that which they worship other than Allah, retreat to the cave. Your Lord will spread out for you of His mercy and will prepare for you from your affair facility."
trans-unit.target: [D'Jugendlechen gesot fir eng aner], "A wann Dir vun hinnen entzunn hunn an déi déi se anere wéi gefroot Chouer, Réckzuch op der Höhl. Deng Lord fir Iech vun Seng Barmhäerzegkeet héhé ginn an dann fir Iech vun Ärem Dossier Gebei preparéieren

trans-unit.source: And [had you been present], you would see the sun when it rose, inclining away from their cave on the right, and when it set, passing away from them on the left, while they were [laying] within an open space thereof. That was from the signs of Allah. He whom Allah guides is the [rightly] guided, but he whom He leaves astray - never will you find for him a protecting guide.
trans-unit.target: An [haten Dir dobäi gouf], géift Dir d'Sonn kucken wou et opgestan, inclining aus hirem Höhl ewech op d'Recht, a wann et virbereet, Virowend vun hinnen ewech op der lénker Säit, wann se sech [leeën] bannent oppene Raum stoppen

trans-unit.source: And you would think them awake, while they were asleep. And We turned them to the right and to the left, while their dog stretched his forelegs at the entrance. If you had looked at them, you would have turned from them in flight and been filled by them with terror.
trans-unit.target: An Dir géift mengen se waakreg, während si geschlof huet.

trans-unit.source: And similarly, We awakened them that they might question one another. Said a speaker from among them, "How long have you remained [here]?" They said, "We have remained a day or part of a day." They said, "Your Lord is most knowing of how long you remained. So send one of you with this silver coin of yours to the city and let him look to which is the best of food and bring you provision from it and let him be cautious. And let no one be aware of you.
trans-unit.target: An ähnlech, Mir Hernandez hinnen dass se eng aner Fro kéint.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, if they come to know of you, they will stone you or return you to their religion. And never would you succeed, then - ever."
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech, wann se vun dir kommen ze wëssen, wäerten se Stee Dir oder Retour Dir fir hir Relioun.

trans-unit.source: And similarly, We caused them to be found that they [who found them] would know that the promise of Allah is truth and that of the Hour there is no doubt. [That was] when they disputed among themselves about their affair and [then] said, "Construct over them a structure. Their Lord is most knowing about them." Said those who prevailed in the matter, "We will surely take [for ourselves] over them a masjid."
trans-unit.target: An ähnlech, Mir ëmmer se fonnt ginn datt si [deen se fonnt] géif wëssen, datt d'Versprieche vun gefroot Wourecht ass an déi vun der Hour do ass keen Zweiwel.

trans-unit.source: They will say there were three, the fourth of them being their dog; and they will say there were five, the sixth of them being their dog - guessing at the unseen; and they will say there were seven, and the eighth of them was their dog. Say, [O Muhammad], "My Lord is most knowing of their number. None knows them except a few. So do not argue about them except with an obvious argument and do not inquire about them among [the speculators] from anyone."
trans-unit.target: Si wäert soen et waren dräi, déi véiert vun hinnen hir Hond Wiesen;

trans-unit.source: And never say of anything, "Indeed, I will do that tomorrow,"
trans-unit.target: An ni vun eppes soen, "Tatsächlech, ech wäert dat muer maachen,"

trans-unit.source: Except [when adding], "If Allah wills." And remember your Lord when you forget [it] and say, "Perhaps my Lord will guide me to what is nearer than this to right conduct."
trans-unit.target: Ausser [beim Bäisetze], "Wann gefroot Wills."

trans-unit.source: And they remained in their cave for three hundred years and exceeded by nine.
trans-unit.target: A si blouf fir dräi honnert Joer an hir Höhl an iwwerschratt vun néng.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Allah is most knowing of how long they remained. He has [knowledge of] the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. How Seeing is He and how Hearing! They have not besides Him any protector, and He shares not His legislation with anyone."
trans-unit.target: Soen, "gefroot ass déi wëssen vu wéi laang si bliwwen. Hien [Wëssen] der Gewerkschaft [Aspekter] vun den Himmel an d'Äerd erschaf huet. Wéi entlaang ass hien a wéi héieren! Si hunn net niewt Him all Protecteur, an Hien deelt

trans-unit.source: And recite, [O Muhammad], what has been revealed to you of the Book of your Lord. There is no changer of His words, and never will you find in other than Him a refuge.
trans-unit.target: An och vu sech, [O Muhammad], wat vun der Buch vun Äre Här Iech verroden gouf.

trans-unit.source: And keep yourself patient [by being] with those who call upon their Lord in the morning and the evening, seeking His countenance. And let not your eyes pass beyond them, desiring adornments of the worldly life, and do not obey one whose heart We have made heedless of Our remembrance and who follows his desire and whose affair is ever [in] neglect.
trans-unit.target: An halen Patient [vun Wiesen] mat deenen, déi an der Moien op hirem Här Appel an der Owend, sengem Naturgeschicht.

trans-unit.source: And say, "The truth is from your Lord, so whoever wills - let him believe; and whoever wills - let him disbelieve." Indeed, We have prepared for the wrongdoers a fire whose walls will surround them. And if they call for relief, they will be relieved with water like murky oil, which scalds [their] faces. Wretched is the drink, and evil is the resting place.
trans-unit.target: A soen, "D'Wourecht aus Är Här ass, sou opfale Wills - loosse him gleewen; a wien Wills - loosse him disbelieve."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - indeed, We will not allow to be lost the reward of any who did well in deeds.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, déi gegleeft hunn an Gerechten mierks gemaach - jo, wäert Mir erlaben net d'Belounung vun all deen am mierks huet och verluer gin.

trans-unit.source: Those will have gardens of perpetual residence; beneath them rivers will flow. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and will wear green garments of fine silk and brocade, reclining therein on adorned couches. Excellent is the reward, and good is the resting place.
trans-unit.target: Déi wäerten Gäert vun Éiweg Residenz hunn;

trans-unit.source: And present to them an example of two men: We granted to one of them two gardens of grapevines, and We bordered them with palm trees and placed between them [fields of] crops.
trans-unit.target: An dobäi un hinnen e Beispill vun zwee Männer: Mir mëschten ze ee vun hinnen zwee Gäert vun grapevines, a Mir Openthalt hinnen mat palm Beem an tëscht hinnen [Felder vun] eréischt gesat.

trans-unit.source: Each of the two gardens produced its fruit and did not fall short thereof in anything. And We caused to gush forth within them a river.
trans-unit.target: Jiddereng vun den zwéi Gäert produzéiert seng Friichten a falen net kuerz zielt zu eppes.

trans-unit.source: And he had fruit, so he said to his companion while he was conversing with him, "I am greater than you in wealth and mightier in [numbers of] men."
trans-unit.target: An hien huet Uebst, sou sot hie fir säi Begleeder während hien mat him war conversing, "ech méi wéi Dir am Räichtum a staark zu [Zuelen vun] Männer."

trans-unit.source: And he entered his garden while he was unjust to himself. He said, "I do not think that this will perish - ever.
trans-unit.target: An hien bei sengem Gaart iwwerdeems hien gerecht ze getraff huet.

trans-unit.source: And I do not think the Hour will occur. And even if I should be brought back to my Lord, I will surely find better than this as a return."
trans-unit.target: An ech denken do net de Hour geschéie wäert.

trans-unit.source: His companion said to him while he was conversing with him, "Have you disbelieved in He who created you from dust and then from a sperm-drop and then proportioned you [as] a man?
trans-unit.target: Säi Begleeder sot zu him während hien mat him war conversing, "Hutt Dir am Hien disbelieved déi Dir aus Stëbs erschaf an duerno vun engem presuméierten-Lëscht a verschiddenen Etappen Dir dann [den] engem Mann?

trans-unit.source: But as for me, He is Allah, my Lord, and I do not associate with my Lord anyone.
trans-unit.target: Mä wéi fir mech, hien ass gefroot, mäin Här, an ech maachen Associé net mat mengem Här jiddereen.

trans-unit.source: And why did you, when you entered your garden, not say, 'What Allah willed [has occurred]; there is no power except in Allah '? Although you see me less than you in wealth and children,
trans-unit.target: A firwat hutt Dir, wann Dir Äre Gaart koum, net soen, "Wat gefroot hierkënnt [Priedegt huet];

trans-unit.source: It may be that my Lord will give me [something] better than your garden and will send upon it a calamity from the sky, and it will become a smooth, dusty ground,
trans-unit.target: Et kann dass meng Lord ginn mech [eppes] besser wéi Äre Gaart a gëtt vun den Himmel op et eng Calamity schécken, an et gëtt e fléissenden, stëpsechen Terrain ginn,

trans-unit.source: Or its water will become sunken [into the earth], so you would never be able to seek it."
trans-unit.target: Oder hir Waasser gëtt Dell ginn [an der Äerd], esou géif een ni fäerdeg ginn et ze sichen. "

trans-unit.source: And his fruits were encompassed [by ruin], so he began to turn his hands about [in dismay] over what he had spent on it, while it had collapsed upon its trellises, and said, "Oh, I wish I had not associated with my Lord anyone."
trans-unit.target: A seng Friichten sech Iwwernuechten [zur Ruin], esou huet hien ugefaange seng Hänn zu béid iwwer [zu ustrengen] iwwer wat hien op et ass déi, wann se op seng trellises zesummegefall haten, a sot, "Oh, ech wënschen hat ech net verbonnen

trans-unit.source: And there was for him no company to aid him other than Allah, nor could he defend himself.
trans-unit.target: An do war fir him kee Betrib him anere wéi gefroot fir Hëllef, nach hätt hie selwer verteidegen.

trans-unit.source: There the authority is [completely] for Allah, the Truth. He is best in reward and best in outcome.
trans-unit.target: Et ass d'Autoritéit [komplett] fir gefroot, der Truth.

trans-unit.source: And present to them the example of the life of this world, [its being] like rain which We send down from the sky, and the vegetation of the earth mingles with it and [then] it becomes dry remnants, scattered by the winds. And Allah is ever, over all things, Perfect in Ability.
trans-unit.target: An dobäi un hinnen d'Beispill vun der Liewensqualitéit vun dëser Welt, [sengem Wiesen] wëll Reen wat mir aus dem Himmel schécken verwandelt, an d'Vegetatioun vun der Äerd mat et Minotaurus an [dann] et gëtt dréchen Iwwerreschter, déi vun de Wand Fragmenter.

trans-unit.source: Wealth and children are [but] adornment of the worldly life. But the enduring good deeds are better to your Lord for reward and better for [one's] hope.
trans-unit.target: Wealth a Kanner sinn [mä] adornment vun de weltlechen Liewen.

trans-unit.source: And [warn of] the Day when We will remove the mountains and you will see the earth prominent, and We will gather them and not leave behind from them anyone.
trans-unit.target: An [Gespiir vu] den Dag wou Mir wäerten d'Bierger ewechzehuelen an Dir wäert d'Äerd groussaarteg gesinn, a mir wäerten se sammelen an net hannert verloossen aus hinnen jiddereen.

trans-unit.source: And they will be presented before your Lord in rows, [and He will say], "You have certainly come to Us just as We created you the first time. But you claimed that We would never make for you an appointment."
trans-unit.target: A si ginn ier Är Här an Reien virgestallt ginn, [a Hie wäert soen], "Du hues äis sécher kommen just als Mir hunn Iech déi éischte Kéier. Mä Dir hat dat Mir géifen ni fir Iech e Rendez-vous ze maachen."

trans-unit.source: And the record [of deeds] will be placed [open], and you will see the criminals fearful of that within it, and they will say, "Oh, woe to us! What is this book that leaves nothing small or great except that it has enumerated it?" And they will find what they did present [before them]. And your Lord does injustice to no one.
trans-unit.target: An de Rekord [vun mierks] ginn Faarwe [oppen], an Dir wäert d'Kriminell ängschtlech vu datt bannent et gesinn, an si soen, "Oh, gare eis! Wat dësem Buch ass, datt näischt méi kleng oder grouss, ausser datt Blieder

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when We said to the angels, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except for Iblees. He was of the jinn and departed from the command of his Lord. Then will you take him and his descendants as allies other than Me while they are enemies to you? Wretched it is for the wrongdoers as an exchange.
trans-unit.target: An [Gewerkschaft] wou mir gesot fir d'Engelen, "zu Adam Gesiicht," a si eng formidabel Vue, ausser fir Iblees.

trans-unit.source: I did not make them witness to the creation of the heavens and the earth or to the creation of themselves, and I would not have taken the misguiders as assistants.
trans-unit.target: Ech hat se fir d'Kreatioun vun den Himmel an d'Äerd oder dem Schafe vun selwer net Zeien, an ech wier net de misguiders als Assistenten geholl hunn.

trans-unit.source: And [warn of] the Day when He will say, "Call 'My partners' whom you claimed," and they will invoke them, but they will not respond to them. And We will put between them [a valley of] destruction.
trans-unit.target: An [Gespiir vu] den Dag wou hie wäert soen, "Call" Mäi Partner deen Dir hat, "a si wäerten se sech op, mee se gëtt hinnen net z'äntwerten.

trans-unit.source: And the criminals will see the Fire and will be certain that they are to fall therein. And they will not find from it a way elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: An der Kriminell, gëtt d'Weeltzer gesinn a bestëmmte ginn datt si doran ze falen.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly diversified in this Qur'an for the people from every [kind of] example; but man has ever been, most of anything, [prone to] dispute.
trans-unit.target: A mir hunn diversifizéiert sécher an dëser machbar ass fir d'Leit aus all [Zort] Beispill;

trans-unit.source: And nothing has prevented the people from believing when guidance came to them and from asking forgiveness of their Lord except that there [must] befall them the [accustomed] precedent of the former peoples or that the punishment should come [directly] before them.
trans-unit.target: An näischt huet d'Leit dovun aus Iwwerzeegung wann Orientatioun hinnen huet an aus anscheinend Verzeiung vun hirem Här, ausser datt et [muss] hinnen de [Gewunnecht] kritesch vun der fréierer Populatiounen oder datt d'Strof och nees net gutt kommen soll [direkt] virun hinnen.

trans-unit.source: And We send not the messengers except as bringers of good tidings and warners. And those who disbelieve dispute by [using] falsehood to [attempt to] invalidate thereby the truth and have taken My verses, and that of which they are warned, in ridicule.
trans-unit.target: A mir schécken net d'Vermëttler ausser als bringers vu gutt Noriicht an warners.

trans-unit.source: And who is more unjust than one who is reminded of the verses of his Lord but turns away from them and forgets what his hands have put forth? Indeed, We have placed over their hearts coverings, lest they understand it, and in their ears deafness. And if you invite them to guidance - they will never be guided, then - ever.
trans-unit.target: An deen ass méi gerecht wéi een déi vun der Verse vu sengem Här drun ass mee vläit vun hinnen ewech a Vergiess wat seng Hänn erausbréngen Supporter hunn?

trans-unit.source: And your Lord is the Forgiving, full of mercy. If He were to impose blame upon them for what they earned, He would have hastened for them the punishment. Rather, for them is an appointment from which they will never find an escape.
trans-unit.target: An Äre Lord ass de verzeien, voll vu ausgeliwwert.

trans-unit.source: And those cities - We destroyed them when they wronged, and We made for their destruction an appointed time.
trans-unit.target: An deene Stied - Mir zerstéiert se wann se wronged, a Mir hunn eng Zäit fir hir Zerstéierung.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when Moses said to his servant, "I will not cease [traveling] until I reach the junction of the two seas or continue for a long period."
trans-unit.target: An [Gewerkschaft] wann Moses sot zu senge Kniecht: "Ech wäert net stierft [ennerwee] bis ech der Kräizung vun den zwou Mier oder och weiderhin fir eng laang Zäit erreechen."

trans-unit.source: But when they reached the junction between them, they forgot their fish, and it took its course into the sea, slipping away.
trans-unit.target: Mee wann se der Kräizung tëscht hinnen erreecht, hu si hir Fësch, an et huet säin natierlech un d'Mier, rutschen ewech.

trans-unit.source: So when they had passed beyond it, [Moses] said to his boy, "Bring us our morning meal. We have certainly suffered in this, our journey, [much] fatigue."
trans-unit.target: Also wann se eraus et batter hat, [Moses] sot zu sengem Jong, "Bréng eis Moies Iessen. Mir hu sécherlech zu dëser, eiser Rees Babyoil, [vill] néi."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Did you see when we retired to the rock? Indeed, I forgot [there] the fish. And none made me forget it except Satan - that I should mention it. And it took its course into the sea amazingly".
trans-unit.target: Hie sot: "Hutt Dir gesinn wann mer zu der Rock pensionnéierte Dot, ech vergiess [do] de Fësch A keen huet mech et ausser Satan vergiessen -?.. Dat ech et soll An et huet seng natierlech nees Mier erstaunlecherweis".

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "That is what we were seeking." So they returned, following their footprints.
trans-unit.target: [Moses] gesot, "Dat ass dat wat mer sech engagéiert."

trans-unit.source: And they found a servant from among Our servants to whom we had given mercy from us and had taught him from Us a [certain] knowledge.
trans-unit.target: An si hunn e Kniecht vun ënnert Eis Dénger zu deem mir Opfer vun eis kritt haten an déi him vun eis eng [bestëmmte] Wësse vermëttelt.

trans-unit.source: Moses said to him, "May I follow you on [the condition] that you teach me from what you have been taught of sound judgement?"
trans-unit.target: Moses sot zu him: "Mee ech Iech op [den Zoustand] verfollegen datt Dir léieren mech aus wat Dir vun Toun Uerteel geléiert hunn?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Indeed, with me you will never be able to have patience.
trans-unit.target: Hien huet gesot, "Iwwerhaapt, mat mech Dir wäert ni fäheg sinn, Gedold ze hunn.

trans-unit.source: And how can you have patience for what you do not encompass in knowledge?"
trans-unit.target: A wéi kann s du Gedold fir wat Dir am Wëssen falen net? "

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "You will find me, if Allah wills, patient, and I will not disobey you in [any] order."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] gesot, "Dir wäert mech fannen, wann gefroot Wills, Patient, an ech wäert Iech an [keng] fir net dem."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Then if you follow me, do not ask me about anything until I make to you about it mention."
trans-unit.target: Hien huet gesot, "Dann, wann Dir mech verfollegen, froot mech net gangen bis ech un dir huelen un et ernimmen."

trans-unit.source: So they set out, until when they had embarked on the ship, al-Khidh r tore it open. [Moses] said, "Have you torn it open to drown its people? You have certainly done a grave thing."
trans-unit.target: Also setzen se eraus, bis wann se op d'Schëff Ascensioun haten, al-Khidh r Nilsen et oppen.

trans-unit.source: [Al-Khidh r] said, "Did I not say that with me you would never be able to have patience?"
trans-unit.target: [Al-Khidh r] gesot, "Hat ech dat net soen mat mech géif Dir ni fäheg Gedold ze hunn?"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Do not blame me for what I forgot and do not cover me in my matter with difficulty."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] gesot, "Do zouzeschreiwen mech net fir wat ech vergiess an Cover mech mat Schwieregkeeten an meng Fro net."

trans-unit.source: So they set out, until when they met a boy, al-Khidh r killed him. [Moses] said, "Have you killed a pure soul for other than [having killed] a soul? You have certainly done a deplorable thing."
trans-unit.target: Also setzen se eraus, bis wéini si e Jong begéint, al-Khidh r him ëmbruecht.

trans-unit.source: [Al-Khidh r] said, "Did I not tell you that with me you would never be able to have patience?"
trans-unit.target: [Al-Khidh r] gesot, "Hat ech Iech net soen, datt mat mir géif Dir ni fäheg Gedold ze hunn?"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "If I should ask you about anything after this, then do not keep me as a companion. You have obtained from me an excuse."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] gesot, "Wann ech dech ëm näischt no dësem froen soll, dann als Begleeder hale mech do net. Dir hutt Virwand vun mir kritt."

trans-unit.source: So they set out, until when they came to the people of a town, they asked its people for food, but they refused to offer them hospitality. And they found therein a wall about to collapse, so al-Khidh r restored it. [Moses] said, "If you wished, you could have taken for it a payment."
trans-unit.target: Also setzen se eraus, bis wann se bis d'Leit vun enger Gemeng huet, si hir Leit fir Liewensmëttel gefrot, mä si refuséiert hinnen Gaaschtfrëndlechkeet ze bidden.

trans-unit.source: [Al-Khidh r] said, "This is parting between me and you. I will inform you of the interpretation of that about which you could not have patience.
trans-unit.target: [Al-Khidh r] gesot, "Dat tëscht mech ass blatzegen an dir. Ech wäert Dir vun der Interpretatioun vun deem informéieren iwwer déi Dir net Gedold hätt.

trans-unit.source: As for the ship, it belonged to poor people working at sea. So I intended to cause defect in it as there was after them a king who seized every [good] ship by force.
trans-unit.target: Wéi fir d'Schëff, goung et un aarm Leit um Mier schaffen.

trans-unit.source: And as for the boy, his parents were believers, and we feared that he would overburden them by transgression and disbelief.
trans-unit.target: A wéi fir de Jong, seng Elteren waren Gleeweger, a mir gefaart, datt hien hinnen duerch transgression an Teamorder overburden géif.

trans-unit.source: So we intended that their Lord should substitute for them one better than him in purity and nearer to mercy.
trans-unit.target: Sou gehofft mir, datt hiren Här soll fir hinnen eng besser wéi him zu Rengheet an Orbit ze Barmhäerzegkeet Ersatz.

trans-unit.source: And as for the wall, it belonged to two orphan boys in the city, and there was beneath it a treasure for them, and their father had been righteous. So your Lord intended that they reach maturity and extract their treasure, as a mercy from your Lord. And I did it not of my own accord. That is the interpretation of that about which you could not have patience."
trans-unit.target: A wéi fir d'Mauer, goung et un zwou orphan Jongen an der Stad, an do gouf ënnert et e Schatz fir hinnen an hire Papp no gerecht ginn.

trans-unit.source: And they ask you, [O Muhammad], about Dhul-Qarnayn. Say, "I will recite to you about him a report."
trans-unit.target: A se froen Iech, [O Muhammad], iwwer Dhul-Qarnayn.

trans-unit.source: Indeed We established him upon the earth, and We gave him to everything a way.
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech etabléierten Mir him op der Äerd, a Mir huet him eng Manéier fir alles.

trans-unit.source: So he followed a way
trans-unit.target: Also huet hien duerno eng Manéier

trans-unit.source: Until, when he reached the setting of the sun, he found it [as if] setting in a spring of dark mud, and he found near it a people. Allah said, "O Dhul-Qarnayn, either you punish [them] or else adopt among them [a way of] goodness."
trans-unit.target: Bis, wou hien de Kader vun der Sonn erreecht, hunn hien et [wéi wann] an engem Fréijoer donkel Bulli Kader, an hien fonnt nächster et engem Leit.

trans-unit.source: He said, "As for one who wrongs, we will punish him. Then he will be returned to his Lord, and He will punish him with a terrible punishment.
trans-unit.target: Hien huet gesot, "Als fir een deen handelt, mir ginn him bestrofen. Da wäert hien zu sengem Här zréck ginn, an hie wäert him mat engem schrecklechen Strof bestrofen.

trans-unit.source: But as for one who believes and does righteousness, he will have a reward of Paradise, and we will speak to him from our command with ease."
trans-unit.target: Mä wéi fir een deen mengt an seet Gerechtegkeet, wäert hien eng Belounung vun Paradise hunn, a mir wäerte mat Liichtegkeet zu him aus eise Kommandant schwätzt. "

trans-unit.source: Then he followed a way
trans-unit.target: Dann duerno huet hien eng Manéier

trans-unit.source: Until, when he came to the rising of the sun, he found it rising on a people for whom We had not made against it any shield.
trans-unit.target: Bis, wou hien un de Protester vun der Sonn huet, war hien et op enger Leit Aarbechtsmarché fir wiem mer géint et net gemaach haten all Schëld.

trans-unit.source: Thus. And We had encompassed [all] that he had in knowledge.
trans-unit.target: Sou.

trans-unit.source: Then he followed a way
trans-unit.target: Dann duerno huet hien eng Manéier

trans-unit.source: Until, when he reached [a pass] between two mountains, he found beside them a people who could hardly understand [his] speech.
trans-unit.target: Bis, wou hien [enger Passe] erreecht tëscht zwee Bierger, fonnt huet niewent hinnen eng Leit, déi kaum verstoe kënnen [sengem] Ried.

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Dhul-Qarnayn, indeed Gog and Magog are [great] corrupters in the land. So may we assign for you an expenditure that you might make between us and them a barrier?"
trans-unit.target: Si sot, "O Dhul-Qarnayn, jo Gog an de Magog sinn [super] corrupters am Land. Also kënne mer uginn fir Iech eng Ausgaben dass Dir tëschent eis an hinnen eng Barrière maachen kéint?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "That in which my Lord has established me is better [than what you offer], but assist me with strength; I will make between you and them a dam.
trans-unit.target: Hien huet gesot, "Dat zu deem mengem Här huet etabléierten mech besser ass [wéi Dir Offer], mee hëllefen mech mat Stäerkt; Ech tëscht Dir maachen wäert an hinnen eng anzeléën.

trans-unit.source: Bring me sheets of iron" - until, when he had leveled [them] between the two mountain walls, he said, "Blow [with bellows]," until when he had made it [like] fire, he said, "Bring me, that I may pour over it molten copper."
trans-unit.target: Bréng mech Blieder vun Eisen "- bis, wann hien net opginn hat [hinnen] tëschent den zwou Bierg Maueren, sot hien," Blow [mat Ballegsystem], "bis wéini hien huet et gemaach [wëll] Feier, sot hien," Bréng mech

trans-unit.source: So Gog and Magog were unable to pass over it, nor were they able [to effect] in it any penetration.
trans-unit.target: Sou goufen Gog an de Magog knapp driwwer ze Passe, nach waren se kënnen [zu Effekt] an et keng Pénétratioun.

trans-unit.source: [Dhul-Qarnayn] said, "This is a mercy from my Lord; but when the promise of my Lord comes, He will make it level, and ever is the promise of my Lord true."
trans-unit.target: [Dhul-Qarnayn] gesot, "Dat ass eng Barmhäerzegkeet vu mengem Här;. Mee wann d'Versprieche vun mengem Här kënnt, wäert hien et Niveau maachen, an schon ass d'Versprieche vun mengem Här richtege"

trans-unit.source: And We will leave them that day surging over each other, and [then] the Horn will be blown, and We will assemble them in [one] assembly.
trans-unit.target: A mir ginn hinnen déi Dag verloossen iwwer all aner surging, an [dann] d'Horn wäert geplatzt ginn, a mir wäerten se zu [een] Versammlung Board.

trans-unit.source: And We will present Hell that Day to the Disbelievers, on display -
trans-unit.target: A mir wäerten dobäi Hell datt Day un iech, op Ecran -

trans-unit.source: Those whose eyes had been within a cover [removed] from My remembrance, and they were not able to hear.
trans-unit.target: Deenen hir Aen hätt bannent engem Cover [geläscht] vun Meng Erënnerungsowend, a si waren net kënnen ze héieren.

trans-unit.source: Then do those who disbelieve think that they can take My servants instead of Me as allies? Indeed, We have prepared Hell for the disbelievers as a lodging.
trans-unit.target: Dann denkt déi disbelieve datt se Meng Dénger amplaz Me als westwalisesch huelen kann?

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Shall we [believers] inform you of the greatest losers as to [their] deeds?
trans-unit.target: Soen, [O Muhammad], "Spille mer [Jesus] informéieren Dir vun der gréisster Loser wéi zu [hir] mierks?

trans-unit.source: [They are] those whose effort is lost in worldly life, while they think that they are doing well in work."
trans-unit.target: [Si sinn] deenen hir Effort ass an weltlechen Liewe verluer, wann se mengen, datt si och an Aarbecht maachen. "

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones who disbelieve in the verses of their Lord and in [their] meeting Him, so their deeds have become worthless; and We will not assign to them on the Day of Resurrection any importance.
trans-unit.target: Déi sinn déi, déi an d'Wierk vun hirem Här disbelieve an zu [hir] Treffen Him, sou hir mierks wäertlos ginn hunn;

trans-unit.source: That is their recompense - Hell - for what they denied and [because] they took My signs and My messengers in ridicule.
trans-unit.target: Dat ass hir unzerkennen - Hell - fir wat se refüséiert an [well] si dee Meng Zeeche an Mäi Vermëttler am lächerlech.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - they will have the Gardens of Paradise as a lodging,
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, déi gegleeft hunn an Gerechten mierks gemaach - si gëtt de Gäert vum Paradise hunn als Logement,

trans-unit.source: Wherein they abide eternally. They will not desire from it any transfer.
trans-unit.target: Hellef Dags se eternally.

trans-unit.source: Say, "If the sea were ink for [writing] the words of my Lord, the sea would be exhausted before the words of my Lord were exhausted, even if We brought the like of it as a supplement."
trans-unit.target: Soen, "Wann d'Mier huet Tënt fir [schreiwen] de Wierder vu mengem Här, géif d'Mier verbraucht ginn, ier d'Wierder vu mengem Här verbraucht huet, och wann mir d'wéi vu et als Zousaz bruecht."

trans-unit.source: Say, "I am only a man like you, to whom has been revealed that your god is one God. So whoever would hope for the meeting with his Lord - let him do righteous work and not associate in the worship of his Lord anyone."
trans-unit.target: . Soen, "Ech sinn nëmmen e Mann wéi Dir, zu där opgedeckt gouf, datt Är Gott ass ee Gott Also wien géif fir d'Gespréich mat senger Lord hoffen - loosse him éierlech Aarbecht maachen an net am Chouer vun sengem Här jiddereen Associé.

trans-unit.source: Kaf, Ha, Ya, 'Ayn, Sad.
trans-unit.target: Kaf, Ha, Ja, 'Ayn, Sad.

trans-unit.source: [This is] a mention of the mercy of your Lord to His servant Zechariah
trans-unit.target: [Dat ass] eng Ernimmung vun der Barmhäerzegkeet vu Är Lord zu sengem Kniecht Zechariah

trans-unit.source: When he called to his Lord a private supplication.
trans-unit.target: Wann hien genannt zu sengem Här engem private Gebiet.

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, indeed my bones have weakened, and my head has filled with white, and never have I been in my supplication to You, my Lord, unhappy.
trans-unit.target: Hien huet gesot, "My Lord, jo hun meng Schanken geschwächt, a mengem Kapp huet mat wäiss gefëllt, an nach ni hunn ech zu mengem Gebiet zu Du gouf, mäin Här, traureg.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, I fear the successors after me, and my wife has been barren, so give me from Yourself an heir
trans-unit.target: An jo, fäerten ech den Nofolger der mech, a meng Fra huet Fraen ginn, sou ginn mir aus selwer eng destinéiert

trans-unit.source: Who will inherit me and inherit from the family of Jacob. And make him, my Lord, pleasing [to You]."
trans-unit.target: Wien ierwen mech a Grofschaften aus der Famill vun Jacob.

trans-unit.source: [He was told], "O Zechariah, indeed We give you good tidings of a boy whose name will be John. We have not assigned to any before [this] name."
trans-unit.target: [Hien gesot gouf], "O Zechariah, jo regelrecht Mir ginn Iech gutt Noriicht vun engem Jong, deem säin Numm John ginn. Mir hu virum fir all net unerkannten [dëser] Numm."

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, how will I have a boy when my wife has been barren and I have reached extreme old age?"
trans-unit.target: Hien huet gesot, "My Lord, wéi ech e Jong hun wou meng Fra gouf Fraen an ech hunn extrem Alter erreecht?"

trans-unit.source: [An angel] said, "Thus [it will be]; your Lord says, 'It is easy for Me, for I created you before, while you were nothing.' "
trans-unit.target: [En Engel] gesot, "Sou [et wäert];". Et ass einfach fir mech, fir déi ech Iech virdrun erschaf, wann Dir näischt waren 'Är Här seet,

trans-unit.source: [Zechariah] said, "My Lord, make for me a sign." He said, "Your sign is that you will not speak to the people for three nights, [being] sound."
trans-unit.target: [Zechariah] gesot, "My Lord, en Zeechen fir mech maachen."

trans-unit.source: So he came out to his people from the prayer chamber and signaled to them to exalt [Allah] in the morning and afternoon.
trans-unit.target: Also huet hien aus dem Gebied Chamber ze seng Leit eraus an hinnen frustréiert zu wëll [gefroot] an de Moien an de Mëtteg.

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "O John, take the Scripture with determination." And We gave him judgement [while yet] a boy
trans-unit.target: [Gefroot] gesot, "O John, d'Schrëft mat Determinatioun huelen."

trans-unit.source: And affection from Us and purity, and he was fearing of Allah
trans-unit.target: An Häerzen vun eis an Puritéit, an hien war z'evitéieren vun der Douane

trans-unit.source: And dutiful to his parents, and he was not a disobedient tyrant.
trans-unit.target: An dutiful fir seng Elteren, an hie war net eng disobedient Tyrann.

trans-unit.source: And peace be upon him the day he was born and the day he dies and the day he is raised alive.
trans-unit.target: A Fridden op him ginn Dag hien gebuer gouf an den Dag hie stierft a Dag hien lieweg opgewuess ass.

trans-unit.source: And mention, [O Muhammad], in the Book [the story of] Mary, when she withdrew from her family to a place toward the east.
trans-unit.target: An ernimmen, [O Muhammad], an d'Buch [d'Geschicht vun] Mary, wann si aus hirer Famill op eng Plaz Richtung Oste zréckgetrueden.

trans-unit.source: And she took, in seclusion from them, a screen. Then We sent to her Our Angel, and he represented himself to her as a well-proportioned man.
trans-unit.target: A si huet d'Wierker vun hinnen, en Écran.

trans-unit.source: She said, "Indeed, I seek refuge in the Most Merciful from you, [so leave me], if you should be fearing of Allah."
trans-unit.target: Si sot, "Tatsächlech, ech géi zréck an d'meescht Verléierer vun dir, [sou verlooss mech], wann Dir vun gefroot z'evitéieren soll."

trans-unit.source: He said, "I am only the messenger of your Lord to give you [news of] a pure boy."
trans-unit.target: Hien huet gesot, "ech nëmmen de Messenger vun Äre Här Dir [Neiegkeete] eng reng Jong ze ginn."

trans-unit.source: She said, "How can I have a boy while no man has touched me and I have not been unchaste?"
trans-unit.target: Si soten: "Wéi kann ech e Jong hunn iwwerdeems kee Mënsch mech huet gesträift an ech hunn net unchaste ginn?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Thus [it will be]; your Lord says, 'It is easy for Me, and We will make him a sign to the people and a mercy from Us. And it is a matter [already] decreed.' "
trans-unit.target: Hien huet gesot, "Sou [et wäert];".. Et ass einfach fir mech, a mir wäerten hien en Zeechen fir d'Leit an enger Barmhäerzegkeet vun eis maachen An et ass engem egal [schonn] Dekret 'Är Här seet,

trans-unit.source: So she conceived him, and she withdrew with him to a remote place.
trans-unit.target: Also komm hatt him, a si wéilte mat him op engem Erfindungen Plaz.

trans-unit.source: And the pains of childbirth drove her to the trunk of a palm tree. She said, "Oh, I wish I had died before this and was in oblivion, forgotten."
trans-unit.target: An der Péng vun accouchement gefuer hire zu der Mall vun engem palm Bam.

trans-unit.source: But he called her from below her, "Do not grieve; your Lord has provided beneath you a stream.
trans-unit.target: Mä hie genannt hirem aus ënnert hir, "Hutt keng eisem léiwen; Är Här ënnert Iech eng Baach gëtt huet.

trans-unit.source: And shake toward you the trunk of the palm tree; it will drop upon you ripe, fresh dates.
trans-unit.target: An rëselt Richtung Dir d'Mall vun der palm Bam;

trans-unit.source: So eat and drink and be contented. And if you see from among humanity anyone, say, 'Indeed, I have vowed to the Most Merciful abstention, so I will not speak today to [any] man.' "
trans-unit.target: Also iessen an drénken a Konkretes ze ginn.

trans-unit.source: Then she brought him to her people, carrying him. They said, "O Mary, you have certainly done a thing unprecedented.
trans-unit.target: Dunn hunn si him un hir Leit, him Droen.

trans-unit.source: O sister of Aaron, your father was not a man of evil, nor was your mother unchaste."
trans-unit.target: O Schwëster vum Aaron, Äre Papp war net e Mann vun Béisen, nach ass Är Mamm unchaste. "

trans-unit.source: So she pointed to him. They said, "How can we speak to one who is in the cradle a child?"
trans-unit.target: Also dodrun si zu him.

trans-unit.source: [Jesus] said, "Indeed, I am the servant of Allah. He has given me the Scripture and made me a prophet.
trans-unit.target: [Jesus] gesot, "Dot, ech sinn de Kniecht vum gefroot. Hien huet mech d'Strophe entscheet huet an huet e Prophéit mech.

trans-unit.source: And He has made me blessed wherever I am and has enjoined upon me prayer and zakah as long as I remain alive
trans-unit.target: An hien huet mech geseent wou ech an huet op mech Gebied an zakah soulaang goufe si verklot wéi ech lieweg bleiwen

trans-unit.source: And [made me] dutiful to my mother, and He has not made me a wretched tyrant.
trans-unit.target: An [huet mech] dutiful fir meng Mamm, an hien huet net mech e erbäermlech Tyrann feieren.

trans-unit.source: And peace is on me the day I was born and the day I will die and the day I am raised alive."
trans-unit.target: A Fridden ass op mech den Dag ech gebuer gouf an den Dag Ech stierwe wäert an den Dag Ech lieweg opgewuess sinn. "

trans-unit.source: That is Jesus, the son of Mary - the word of truth about which they are in dispute.
trans-unit.target: Dat ass de Jesus, de Jong vum Maria - d'Wuert vun Wourecht iwwert déi se am Sträit sinn.

trans-unit.source: It is not [befitting] for Allah to take a son; exalted is He! When He decrees an affair, He only says to it, "Be," and it is.
trans-unit.target: Et ass net [Brillanten] fir gefroot engem Jong ze huelen;

trans-unit.source: [Jesus said], "And indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. That is a straight path."
trans-unit.target: [Sot de Jesus], "An effektiv, ass gefroot mengem Här an Är Lord, sou unzweiwelen. Dat enger riichter Wee ass."

trans-unit.source: Then the factions differed [concerning Jesus] from among them, so woe to those who disbelieved - from the scene of a tremendous Day.
trans-unit.target: Dunn ënnerscheet déi eenzel Faktioune [betreffend Jesus] aus dorënner, sou gare déi disbelieved - aus der Zeen vun enger immenser Day.

trans-unit.source: How [clearly] they will hear and see the Day they come to Us, but the wrongdoers today are in clear error.
trans-unit.target: Wéi [haut] wäert se den Day si kommen bei eis, mä de wrongdoers haut sinn zu kloer Fehler héieren a gesinn.

trans-unit.source: And warn them, [O Muhammad], of the Day of Regret, when the matter will be concluded; and [yet], they are in [a state of] heedlessness, and they do not believe.
trans-unit.target: A warnen hinnen, [O Muhammad], vun der Day vun bedauert, wann d'Matière ofgeschloss ginn;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is We who will inherit the earth and whoever is on it, and to Us they will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt ass et mir deen der Äerd ierwen wäert an wien ass op et, an eis wäert si hannescht ginn.

trans-unit.source: And mention in the Book [the story of] Abraham. Indeed, he was a man of truth and a prophet.
trans-unit.target: An ernimmen am Buch [d'Geschicht vun] Abraham.

trans-unit.source: [Mention] when he said to his father, "O my father, why do you worship that which does not hear and does not see and will not benefit you at all?
trans-unit.target: [Ernimmung] wou hie sot zu sengem Papp, "Mäi Papp, firwat do Chouer Dir dass dat net heescht héieren a gesinn net an wäert Dir guer net profitéiert?

trans-unit.source: O my father, indeed there has come to me of knowledge that which has not come to you, so follow me; I will guide you to an even path.
trans-unit.target: O mäi Papp, Exemplar ass et fir mech vu Wëssen kommen, datt deen net op dir ass komm, sou nogoën;

trans-unit.source: O my father, do not worship Satan. Indeed Satan has ever been, to the Most Merciful, disobedient.
trans-unit.target: O mäi Papp, do Chouer net Satan.

trans-unit.source: O my father, indeed I fear that there will touch you a punishment from the Most Merciful so you would be to Satan a companion [in Hellfire]."
trans-unit.target: O mäi Papp, effektiv fäerten ech, datt et wäert Iech eng Strof vun de gréissten Verléierer Déngschtleeschtunge fir Iech ze Satan engem Begleetstär [zu Hellfire] gin wier. "

trans-unit.source: [His father] said, "Have you no desire for my gods, O Abraham? If you do not desist, I will surely stone you, so avoid me a prolonged time."
trans-unit.target: [Säi Papp] gesot, "Hutt Dir keng Loscht fir meng Gëtter, O Abraham? Wann s du net do desist, wäert ech Iech sécherlech Steen, esou vermeide mir eng länger Zäit."

trans-unit.source: [Abraham] said, "Peace will be upon you. I will ask forgiveness for you of my Lord. Indeed, He is ever gracious to me.
trans-unit.target: [Abraham] gesot, "Fridden op iech ginn. Ech Verzeiung fir Iech vu mengem Här frot gëtt. Iwwerhaapt, Hien ass fir mech schons gracious.

trans-unit.source: And I will leave you and those you invoke other than Allah and will invoke my Lord. I expect that I will not be in invocation to my Lord unhappy."
trans-unit.target: An ech wäert Iech verloossen an deenen Dir sech op aner wéi gefroot a wäert meng Här schwätzen.

trans-unit.source: So when he had left them and those they worshipped other than Allah, We gave him Isaac and Jacob, and each [of them] We made a prophet.
trans-unit.target: Also wann hien se no lénks an deene se aner wéi gefroot kruten, huet mir him Isaac a Jacob, an all [vun hinnen] Mir hunn e Prophéit.

trans-unit.source: And We gave them of Our mercy, and we made for them a reputation of high honor.
trans-unit.target: A mir huet se vun Eisen Barmhäerzegkeet, a mir gemaach fir hinnen e Ruff vun héich Éier.

trans-unit.source: And mention in the Book, Moses. Indeed, he was chosen, and he was a messenger and a prophet.
trans-unit.target: An ernimmen am Buch, Moses.

trans-unit.source: And We called him from the side of the mount at [his] right and brought him near, confiding [to him].
trans-unit.target: An Mir genannt him aus der Säit vun der Montéierung um [sengem] riets an huet him bei, confiding [him].

trans-unit.source: And We gave him out of Our mercy his brother Aaron as a prophet.
trans-unit.target: An Mir huet him Aaron aus Eisen Barmhäerzegkeet sengem Brudder als Prophéit.

trans-unit.source: And mention in the Book, Ishmael. Indeed, he was true to his promise, and he was a messenger and a prophet.
trans-unit.target: An ernimmen am Buch, Ishmael.

trans-unit.source: And he used to enjoin on his people prayer and zakah and was to his Lord pleasing.
trans-unit.target: An hien benotzt op seng Leit Gebied an zakah zu enjoin a gouf zu sengem Här lackeleg.

trans-unit.source: And mention in the Book, Idrees. Indeed, he was a man of truth and a prophet.
trans-unit.target: An ernimmen am Buch, Idrees.
