trans-unit.source: And We raised him to a high station.
trans-unit.target: A mir konnten him zu engem héich Gare.

trans-unit.source: Those were the ones upon whom Allah bestowed favor from among the prophets of the descendants of Adam and of those We carried [in the ship] with Noah, and of the descendants of Abraham and Israel, and of those whom We guided and chose. When the verses of the Most Merciful were recited to them, they fell in prostration and weeping.
trans-unit.target: Déi sech do op där gefroot zugonschte vun de Prophéiten vun den Nokommen vum Adam Moderniséierung a vun deenen Mir [am Schëff] gedroen mam Noah, an vun den Nokomme vum Abraham an Israel, a vun deenen, deenen Mir guidéiert a Besëtz geholl.

trans-unit.source: But there came after them successors who neglected prayer and pursued desires; so they are going to meet evil -
trans-unit.target: Mä et huet no hinne Nofolger déi Gebied vernoléissegt an emgesat Lëscht;

trans-unit.source: Except those who repent, believe and do righteousness; for those will enter Paradise and will not be wronged at all.
trans-unit.target: Ausser déi ëmkéiers, gleewen an do Gerechtegkeet;

trans-unit.source: [Therein are] gardens of perpetual residence which the Most Merciful has promised His servants in the unseen. Indeed, His promise has ever been coming.
trans-unit.target: [Sinn androen] Gäert vun Éiweg Residenz, déi de gréissten Verléierer Seng Dénger an der Gewerkschaft versprach huet.

trans-unit.source: They will not hear therein any ill speech - only [greetings of] peace - and they will have their provision therein, morning and afternoon.
trans-unit.target: Si gëtt net héieren androen all krank Ried - nëmmen [Gréiss vun] Fridden - a si wäert hir Dispositioun hunn doran, Moien an de Mëtteg.

trans-unit.source: That is Paradise, which We give as inheritance to those of Our servants who were fearing of Allah.
trans-unit.target: Dat ass Paradise, wat Mir ginn als Ierfschaft fir déi vun eis Staatsbeamten, déi vun gefroot z'evitéieren goufen.

trans-unit.source: [Gabriel said], "And we [angels] descend not except by the order of your Lord. To Him belongs that before us and that behind us and what is in between. And never is your Lord forgetful -
trans-unit.target: . [Gabriel gesot] ", A mir [Engelen] Nokomme net ausser duerch d'Bestellung vun Äre Här zu him gehéiert, dass virun eis an datt hannert eis a wat an tëschent ass An ni ass Är Här forgetful. -

trans-unit.source: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them - so worship Him and have patience for His worship. Do you know of any similarity to Him?"
trans-unit.target: Här vum Himmel a vun der Äerd, an egal ass tëscht hinnen - sou unzweiwelen an hu Gedold fir säin Kult.

trans-unit.source: And the disbeliever says, "When I have died, am I going to be brought forth alive?"
trans-unit.target: An der disbeliever seet, "Wann ech gestuerwen hunn, nënnen ech dÃ lieweg ze ginn bruecht?"

trans-unit.source: Does man not remember that We created him before, while he was nothing?
trans-unit.target: Huet erënneren Mann net, datt mir him virun geschaf, iwwerdeems hien näischt ass?

trans-unit.source: So by your Lord, We will surely gather them and the devils; then We will bring them to be present around Hell upon their knees.
trans-unit.target: Also vun Äre Lord, wäert Mir sammelen Fangerspëtzen hinnen an d'lass;

trans-unit.source: Then We will surely extract from every sect those of them who were worst against the Most Merciful in insolence.
trans-unit.target: Da wäert Mir Extrait Fangerspëtzen vun all Gesellschaft déi vun hinnen, déi an eng Frechheet Schlëmmst géint de gréissten Verléierer goufen.

trans-unit.source: Then, surely it is We who are most knowing of those most worthy of burning therein.
trans-unit.target: Dunn, secherlech ass et mir déi meescht wëssen vun deene meeschte Waasserlaf Verbrenne Spannungen ginn.

trans-unit.source: And there is none of you except he will come to it. This is upon your Lord an inevitability decreed.
trans-unit.target: An do ass keen vun iech ausser hien un et kommen.

trans-unit.source: Then We will save those who feared Allah and leave the wrongdoers within it, on their knees.
trans-unit.target: Da gëtt mir déi retten deen gefroot gefaart a verloossen d'wrongdoers bannent et, op hir Knéien.

trans-unit.source: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Which of [our] two parties is best in position and best in association?"
trans-unit.target: A wann Eis Verse fir hinnen esou kloer dofir recited ginn, déi zu deene soen disbelieve déi gleewen, "Wéi vun [eiser] zwou Parteien ass bescht zu Positioun an bescht an association?"

trans-unit.source: And how many a generation have We destroyed before them who were better in possessions and [outward] appearance?
trans-unit.target: A wéivill e Generatioun hu mir virun hinnen zerstéiert deen am Besëtz besser waren an [bausse] krut?

trans-unit.source: Say, "Whoever is in error - let the Most Merciful extend for him an extension [in wealth and time] until, when they see that which they were promised - either punishment [in this world] or the Hour [of resurrection] - they will come to know who is worst in position and weaker in soldiers."
trans-unit.target: Soen, "wie am Fehler ass - loosse de gréissten Verléierer fir him eng Extensioun verlängeren [am Räichtum an Zäit] bis, wéi si dat gesinn, wat si versprach huet - entweder Strof [an dëser Welt] oder d'Hour [vun Sënde] - si

trans-unit.source: And Allah increases those who were guided, in guidance, and the enduring good deeds are better to your Lord for reward and better for recourse.
trans-unit.target: An gefroot Erhéijunge déi orientéiert huet, an Orientatioun, an d'gesäit Grenzen gutt Reha sinn besser ze Är Lord fir Belounung a besser fir Recoursen.

trans-unit.source: Then, have you seen he who disbelieved in Our verses and said, "I will surely be given wealth and children [in the next life]?"
trans-unit.target: Dann, Dir hutt hien deen an eisem Gott a sot disbelieved gesinn, "Ech wäert Räichtum a Kanner ginn [am nächste Liewen]?"

trans-unit.source: Has he looked into the unseen, or has he taken from the Most Merciful a promise?
trans-unit.target: Huet hien an der Gewerkschaft ausgesinn, oder huet hien aus dem gréissten Verléierer engem verspriechen geholl?

trans-unit.source: No! We will record what he says and extend for him from the punishment extensively.
trans-unit.target: Nee!

trans-unit.source: And We will inherit him [in] what he mentions, and he will come to Us alone.
trans-unit.target: A mir wäerten hien ierwen [an] wat hie schreift, an hien waert eis eleng.

trans-unit.source: And they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that they would be for them [a source of] honor.
trans-unit.target: An si hunn och gefroot [falsch] fënnt geholl, datt si fir hinnen [enger Quell vu] Éier ginn hätt.

trans-unit.source: No! Those "gods" will deny their worship of them and will be against them opponents [on the Day of Judgement].
trans-unit.target: Nee!

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that We have sent the devils upon the disbelievers, inciting them to [evil] with [constant] incitement?
trans-unit.target: gesinn Mengt Dir net, datt mir d'lass geschéckt hunn op iech, Brutalitéit hinnen zu [Béisen] mat [konstant] Provokatioun?

trans-unit.source: So be not impatient over them. We only count out to them a [limited] number.
trans-unit.target: Also ginn net Ongedëlleg iwwer hinnen.

trans-unit.source: On the Day We will gather the righteous to the Most Merciful as a delegation
trans-unit.target: Op der Day wäert Mir der Gerechten zu de gréissten Verléierer wéi enger Delegatioun versammele

trans-unit.source: And will drive the criminals to Hell in thirst
trans-unit.target: A wäerten d'Kriminell ze Hell an verdréchnen fueren

trans-unit.source: None will have [power of] intercession except he who had taken from the Most Merciful a covenant.
trans-unit.target: Keen wäert hunn [Muecht vun] Fürbitte ausser hien deen aus dem gréissten Verléierer engem Bond geholl hat.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken [for Himself] a son."
trans-unit.target: A si soen, "Déi meescht Verléierer geholl huet [fir selwer] engem Jong."

trans-unit.source: You have done an atrocious thing.
trans-unit.target: Dir hutt eng atrocious Saach gemaach.

trans-unit.source: The heavens almost rupture therefrom and the earth splits open and the mountains collapse in devastation
trans-unit.target: Den Himmel bal Broch therefrom an der Äerd räisst oppen an de Bierger Zesummebroch am Artikel ass

trans-unit.source: That they attribute to the Most Merciful a son.
trans-unit.target: Datt se dat wënscht zu de gréissten Verléierer engem Jong.

trans-unit.source: And it is not appropriate for the Most Merciful that He should take a son.
trans-unit.target: An et ass net ubruecht fir déi meescht Verléierer dass Hien soll e Jong huelen.

trans-unit.source: There is no one in the heavens and earth but that he comes to the Most Merciful as a servant.
trans-unit.target: Et ass keen an den Himmel an Äerd mä dass hie bei de gréissten Verléierer als Staatsbeamten.

trans-unit.source: He has enumerated them and counted them a [full] counting.
trans-unit.target: Hien huet hinnen enumerated a gezielt hinnen e [voll] Zielen.

trans-unit.source: And all of them are coming to Him on the Day of Resurrection alone.
trans-unit.target: An all vun hinnen si schonn eleng op der Day vun Akten ze Him.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - the Most Merciful will appoint for them affection.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, déi gegleeft hunn a gemaach Gerechten Reha - déi meescht Verléierer gëtt fir se Häerzen z'iwwerwaachen.

trans-unit.source: So, [O Muhammad], We have only made Qur'an easy in the Arabic language that you may give good tidings thereby to the righteous and warn thereby a hostile people.
trans-unit.target: Also [O Muhammad], hu mir gemaach nëmmen Koran einfach an d'arabesch Sprooch dass Dir gutt Noriicht ginn kënnen domat d'Gerechten a warnen doduerch eng feindlech Leit.

trans-unit.source: And how many have We destroyed before them of generations? Do you perceive of them anyone or hear from them a sound?
trans-unit.target: A wéivill hunn zerstéiert Mir ier se vu Generatiounen?

trans-unit.source: Ta, Ha.
trans-unit.target: Ta, Ha.

trans-unit.source: We have not sent down to you the Qur'an that you be distressed
trans-unit.target: Mir hunn net fir Iech de Koran geschéckt huet, datt dir traureg ginn

trans-unit.source: But only as a reminder for those who fear [Allah] -
trans-unit.target: Awer nëmmen als Rappel fir déi [gefroot] Angscht -

trans-unit.source: A revelation from He who created the earth and highest heavens,
trans-unit.target: A Révélatioun vum Hien deen der Äerd an héchsten Himmel hunn,

trans-unit.source: The Most Merciful [who is] above the Throne established.
trans-unit.target: Déi meescht Verléierer [deen ass] virun den Troun etabléiert.

trans-unit.source: To Him belongs what is in the heavens and what is on the earth and what is between them and what is under the soil.
trans-unit.target: Hien gehéiert, wat am Himmel ass a wat op der Äerd ass a wat tëscht hinnen ass a wat ënner dem Buedem läit.

trans-unit.source: And if you speak aloud - then indeed, He knows the secret and what is [even] more hidden.
trans-unit.target: A wann Dir haart schwätzen - da jo, weess hien de Geheimdéngscht a wat ass [och] méi verstoppt.

trans-unit.source: Allah - there is no deity except Him. To Him belong the best names.
trans-unit.target: Gleewen - et ass kee Gottheet ausser Him.

trans-unit.source: And has the story of Moses reached you? -
trans-unit.target: An huet d'Geschicht vun Moses erreecht Dir?

trans-unit.source: When he saw a fire and said to his family, "Stay here; indeed, I have perceived a fire; perhaps I can bring you a torch or find at the fire some guidance."
trans-unit.target: Wann hien e Feier gesinn a sot zu senger Famill, "hei bleiwen; jo, hunn ech e Feier ugesi; vläicht kann ech Iech eng Täscheluucht eis oder bei der Feier puer Orientatioun fannen."

trans-unit.source: And when he came to it, he was called, "O Moses,
trans-unit.target: A wann hien bis et huet, war hien genannt, "O Moses,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am your Lord, so remove your sandals. Indeed, you are in the sacred valley of Tuwa.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, ech däin Här, datt Är Sandalen ewechzehuelen.

trans-unit.source: And I have chosen you, so listen to what is revealed [to you].
trans-unit.target: An ech hunn an dëse Match gaangen Dir, zu esou nolauschtert wat Teamchef ass [Iech].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am Allah. There is no deity except Me, so worship Me and establish prayer for My remembrance.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, ech sin gefroot.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Hour is coming - I almost conceal it - so that every soul may be recompensed according to that for which it strives.
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech ass d'Hour nächste - ech si bal verheemlechen - datt all Séil nom gin ersat kënne bis datt fir déi et bestrieft.

trans-unit.source: So do not let one avert you from it who does not believe in it and follows his desire, for you [then] would perish.
trans-unit.target: Also do net fortschwemme ee Dir aus et gerannt deen gleewen net an dat an sengem Wonsch follegt, fir Iech [dann] zwéngen géif.

trans-unit.source: And what is that in your right hand, O Moses?"
trans-unit.target: An wat ass dat zu Är riets Hand, O Moses? "

trans-unit.source: He said, "It is my staff; I lean upon it, and I bring down leaves for my sheep and I have therein other uses."
trans-unit.target: Hien huet gesot, "Et mengem Personal ass; ech recommandéieren op dat, an ech nnert Blieder fir mäi Schof an ech hunn aneren Utilisatioune androen."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Throw it down, O Moses."
trans-unit.target: [Gefroot] gesot, "et Schéiss verwandelt, O Moses."

trans-unit.source: So he threw it down, and thereupon it was a snake, moving swiftly.
trans-unit.target: Also huet hien et war, an hale war et eng Schlaang war, bewegt säi.

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Seize it and fear not; We will return it to its former condition.
trans-unit.target: [Gefroot] gesot, "lassgezunn et an Angscht net; Mir et zu senge fréiere Zoustand zréck ginn.

trans-unit.source: And draw in your hand to your side; it will come out white without disease - another sign,
trans-unit.target: A Rou ze Äre Säit an Ärem Hand;

trans-unit.source: That We may show you [some] of Our greater signs.
trans-unit.target: Datt mir Iech weisen kann [e] vun Eis grouss Schëlder.

trans-unit.source: Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed."
trans-unit.target: Go ze Pharaoh.

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "My Lord, expand for me my breast [with assurance]
trans-unit.target: [Moses] gesot, "My Lord, meng Broscht fir mech ausbaue [mat assurance]

trans-unit.source: And ease for me my task
trans-unit.target: A bescheed fir mech meng Aufgab

trans-unit.source: And untie the knot from my tongue
trans-unit.target: An untie bestuede aus menger Mammesprooch

trans-unit.source: That they may understand my speech.
trans-unit.target: Dass si vläicht meng Ried verstoen.

trans-unit.source: And appoint for me a minister from my family -
trans-unit.target: An z'iwwerwaachen fir mech e Minister vu menger Famill -

trans-unit.source: Aaron, my brother.
trans-unit.target: Aaron, mäi Brudder.

trans-unit.source: Increase through him my strength
trans-unit.target: Hëlt duerch him meng Stäerkt

trans-unit.source: And let him share my task
trans-unit.target: A loosse him meng Aufgab deelen

trans-unit.source: That we may exalt You much
trans-unit.target: Datt mir Dir kënnt vill wëll

trans-unit.source: And remember You much.
trans-unit.target: An Erënnerung Dir vill.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, You are of us ever Seeing."
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, Dir sidd vun eis schons entlaang. "

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "You have been granted your request, O Moses.
trans-unit.target: [Gefroot] gesot, "Dir hutt Är Demande, O Moses Selbstverständlechkeet ginn.

trans-unit.source: And We had already conferred favor upon you another time,
trans-unit.target: A mir hu schonn conferred dofir op Iech aner Kéier,

trans-unit.source: When We inspired to your mother what We inspired,
trans-unit.target: Wann mir op Är Mamm inspiréiert wat mir inspiréiert,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], 'Cast him into the chest and cast it into the river, and the river will throw it onto the bank; there will take him an enemy to Me and an enemy to him.' And I bestowed upon you love from Me that you would be brought up under My eye.
trans-unit.target: [Vergiess], him an der Këscht Cast an et an de Floss Goss, an de Floss et op der Bank geheien wäert;

trans-unit.source: [And We favored you] when your sister went and said, 'Shall I direct you to someone who will be responsible for him?' So We restored you to your mother that she might be content and not grieve. And you killed someone, but We saved you from retaliation and tried you with a [severe] trial. And you remained [some] years among the people of Madyan. Then you came [here] at the decreed time, O Moses.
trans-unit.target: [An Mir Gout Dir] wann Är Schwëster gaangen a sot, "Spille ech iech een direkt déi fir him responsabel ginn?"

trans-unit.source: And I produced you for Myself.
trans-unit.target: An ech produzéiert Dir fir Aarmutsgrenz.

trans-unit.source: Go, you and your brother, with My signs and do not slacken in My remembrance.
trans-unit.target: Gitt Dir an Äre Brudder, mat Meng Zeeche an do slacken net zu Meng Erënnerungsowend.

trans-unit.source: Go, both of you, to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed.
trans-unit.target: Go, souwuel vun Iech, fir Pharaoh.

trans-unit.source: And speak to him with gentle speech that perhaps he may be reminded or fear [Allah]."
trans-unit.target: An zu him mat sanft Ried schwätzt, datt vläicht kann hien och oder Angscht [gefroot] gin. "

trans-unit.source: They said, "Our Lord, indeed we are afraid that he will hasten [punishment] against us or that he will transgress."
trans-unit.target: Si sot, "Eis Här, jo mir Angscht ginn, datt hien hasten gëtt [Strof] géint eis oder datt hien transgress."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Fear not. Indeed, I am with you both; I hear and I see.
trans-unit.target: [Gefroot] gesot, "Fäert net Dot, ech mat Dir sin souwuel;. Ech héieren an ech gesinn.

trans-unit.source: So go to him and say, 'Indeed, we are messengers of your Lord, so send with us the Children of Israel and do not torment them. We have come to you with a sign from your Lord. And peace will be upon he who follows the guidance.
trans-unit.target: Also zu him goen a soen, "zréckzeféieren, mir sinn Vermëttler vu Är Lord, esou schécken mat eis de Kanner vun Israel an net hinnen éiweg.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it has been revealed to us that the punishment will be upon whoever denies and turns away.' "
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt ass et schonn fir eis verroden, datt d'Strof festgeluecht ginn wien dassen ausgeglach ewech. "

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "So who is the Lord of you two, O Moses?"
trans-unit.target: [Pharaoh] gesot, "Also deen den Här vun iech zwee, O Moses ass?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Our Lord is He who gave each thing its form and then guided [it]."
trans-unit.target: Hien huet gesot, "Eis Här ass hien déi eenzel Saach seng Form huet an dann orientéiert [ass]."

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "Then what is the case of the former generations?"
trans-unit.target: [Pharaoh] gesot, "Dann, wat de Fall vum fréieren Generatiounen ass?"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "The knowledge thereof is with my Lord in a record. My Lord neither errs nor forgets."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] gesot, "D'Wëssen Verdeelung mat mengem Här bei engem Rekord ass. My Lord weder nach Vergiess errs."

trans-unit.source: [It is He] who has made for you the earth as a bed [spread out] and inserted therein for you roadways and sent down from the sky, rain and produced thereby categories of various plants.
trans-unit.target: [Et ass Hien] déi fir Iech d 'Äerd als Bett [héhé] an hin androen fir Iech roadways a geschéckt erof vum Himmel, Reen a produzéiert domat Kategorien vu verschidde Planzen gemaach huet.

trans-unit.source: Eat [therefrom] and pasture your livestock. Indeed, in that are signs for those of intelligence.
trans-unit.target: Eat [therefrom] an Weed Béischten.

trans-unit.source: From the earth We created you, and into it We will return you, and from it We will extract you another time.
trans-unit.target: Vun der Äerd Mir hunn Iech, an et wäert mer Iech zréck, an aus et mir dir aner Zäit ofzebauen.

trans-unit.source: And We certainly showed Pharaoh Our signs - all of them - but he denied and refused.
trans-unit.target: An mir awer sécher Eis Unzeeche Pharaoh - all vun hinnen - mä hie volljäreg an refuséiert.

trans-unit.source: He said, "Have you come to us to drive us out of our land with your magic, O Moses?
trans-unit.target: Hie sot: "Hutt Dir fir eis kommen eis mat Äre Magie aus eisem Land ze fueren, O Moses?

trans-unit.source: Then we will surely bring you magic like it, so make between us and you an appointment, which we will not fail to keep and neither will you, in a place assigned."
trans-unit.target: Da wäerte mir Iech secherlech gudd bréngt wéi dat, sou maachen tëschent eis an iech e Rendez-vous, déi mir wäerten net ze halen versoen an weder wäert Dir, zu enger Plaz zougewisen. "

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Your appointment is on the day of the festival when the people assemble at mid-morning."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] gesot, "Deng vous op den Dag vum Festival ass wann d'Leit an der Mëtt-Moien Board."

trans-unit.source: So Pharaoh went away, put together his plan, and then came [to Moses].
trans-unit.target: Also ass Pharaoh ewech, huet zesumme mat sengem plangen, an huet duerno [zu Moses].

trans-unit.source: Moses said to the magicians summoned by Pharaoh, "Woe to you! Do not invent a lie against Allah or He will exterminate you with a punishment; and he has failed who invents [such falsehood]."
trans-unit.target: Moses gesot zu der vun Pharaoh aberuff magicians, "Wéi schrecklech fir iech Do gelunn géint gefroot net erfannen oder Hien wäert Dir mat enger Strof exterminéieren;!. An hien huet dunn deen [esou falsehood] Suerge"

trans-unit.source: So they disputed over their affair among themselves and concealed their private conversation.
trans-unit.target: Also si ëmstridden ënnert selwer iwwer hire Affär an Bak hire private Gespréich.

trans-unit.source: They said, "Indeed, these are two magicians who want to drive you out of your land with their magic and do away with your most exemplary way.
trans-unit.target: Si sot, "zréckzeféieren, dës sinn zwee magicians déi Dir aus Ärem Land mat hir Magie fueren wëllen an do fort mat Äre stäerkste exemplaresch Manéier.

trans-unit.source: So resolve upon your plan and then come [forward] in line. And he has succeeded today who overcomes."
trans-unit.target: Also klären op Är plangen an da kommen [vir] zu Linn.

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Moses, either you throw or we will be the first to throw."
trans-unit.target: Si sot, "O Moses, entweder Dir geheien oder mir wäerten d'éischt ze geheien ginn."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Rather, you throw." And suddenly their ropes and staffs seemed to him from their magic that they were moving [like snakes].
trans-unit.target: Hien huet gesot, "opgefall, Dir geheien."

trans-unit.source: And he sensed within himself apprehension, did Moses.
trans-unit.target: An hien hun an sech apprehension, huet Moses.

trans-unit.source: Allah said, "Fear not. Indeed, it is you who are superior.
trans-unit.target: Gefroot gesot: "Fäert net. Iwwerhaapt, et ass Iech déi bescht sinn.

trans-unit.source: And throw what is in your right hand; it will swallow up what they have crafted. What they have crafted is but the trick of a magician, and the magician will not succeed wherever he is."
trans-unit.target: An geheien, wat an Äre riets Hand ass;

trans-unit.source: So the magicians fell down in prostration. They said, "We have believed in the Lord of Aaron and Moses."
trans-unit.target: Also gefall der magicians zu prostration verwandelt.

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "You believed him before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic. So I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will crucify you on the trunks of palm trees, and you will surely know which of us is more severe in [giving] punishment and more enduring."
trans-unit.target: [Pharaoh] gesot, "Du him gegleeft, ier ech Iech Autorisatioun huet. Iwwerhaapt, hie Är Leader ass deen Dir magesch geléiert huet. Also wäert ech sécher Hänn a Féiss op Géigendeel Säiten frecken, an ech wäert Iech op de Bamstämm ugedoen

trans-unit.source: They said, "Never will we prefer you over what has come to us of clear proofs and [over] He who created us. So decree whatever you are to decree. You can only decree for this worldly life.
trans-unit.target: Si sot, "nie wäerte mir léiwer Dir iwwer wat fir eis vu kloer noweisen komm ass an [iwwer] Hien deen ugeluecht eis. Also Dekret wat Dir zu Dekret ginn. Du kanns nëmmen Dekret fir dës weltlechen Liewen.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, we have believed in our Lord that He may forgive us our sins and what you compelled us [to do] of magic. And Allah is better and more enduring."
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt hu mir zu eiser Här gegleeft datt hien eis eis Sënnen verzeien kann a wat Dir Verenegong eis [do] vun bewierken.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, whoever comes to his Lord as a criminal - indeed, for him is Hell; he will neither die therein nor live.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, wien kënnt zu sengem Här als kriminellen - jo, fir him Hell ass;

trans-unit.source: But whoever comes to Him as a believer having done righteous deeds - for those will be the highest degrees [in position]:
trans-unit.target: Mä wien bei Hien als gleeweg Gerechten mierks gemaach no - fir déi gëtt den héchste Grad [zu Positioun] ginn:

trans-unit.source: Gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. And that is the reward of one who purifies himself.
trans-unit.target: Gardens vun Éiweg Residenz ënnert deem Flëss stréimen, Hellef se eternally Dags.

trans-unit.source: And We had inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants and strike for them a dry path through the sea; you will not fear being overtaken [by Pharaoh] nor be afraid [of drowning]."
trans-unit.target: A mir hu bis Moses inspiréiert, "Travel vun Nuecht mat Meng Dénger an Spectateur fir hinnen en dréchent Wee duerch d'Mier; Dir wäert net [vun Pharaoh] Wiesen iwwerholl Angscht nach Angscht gin [vun Erdrénke]."

trans-unit.source: So Pharaoh pursued them with his soldiers, and there covered them from the sea that which covered them,
trans-unit.target: Esou emgesat Pharaoh hinne mat sengem Zaldoten, an do Daach hinnen aus dem Mier, dass déi hinne geschwat,

trans-unit.source: And Pharaoh led his people astray and did not guide [them].
trans-unit.target: An Pharaoh gefouert seng Leit astray an Guide rauszesichen [hinnen].

trans-unit.source: O Children of Israel, We delivered you from your enemy, and We made an appointment with you at the right side of the mount, and We sent down to you manna and quails,
trans-unit.target: O Kanner vun Israel, Mir geliwwert Dir aus Ärem Feind, a Mir hunn mat Dir e Rendez-vous op der rietser Ofwiersäit vun de Bierg, a mir geschéckt erof ze Dir Manna an quails,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], "Eat from the good things with which We have provided you and do not transgress [or oppress others] therein, lest My anger should descend upon you. And he upon whom My anger descends has certainly fallen."
trans-unit.target: [Vergiess], "Eat aus der gutt Saache mat deem mir Iech gestallt hunn an transgress nët [oder anerer oppress] androen, bewaacht Meng Roserei op Dir Nokomme soll. An hien op deem fällt Meng Roserei huet sécherlech packen."

trans-unit.source: But indeed, I am the Perpetual Forgiver of whoever repents and believes and does righteousness and then continues in guidance.
trans-unit.target: Mä jo, ech sin der Éiweg Forgiver vun opfale fëmmen an denkt a freet Gerechtegkeet a setzt dann an Orientatioun.

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "And what made you hasten from your people, O Moses?"
trans-unit.target: [Gefroot] gesot, "A wat huet Dir aus Ärem Leit hasten, O Moses?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "They are close upon my tracks, and I hastened to You, my Lord, that You be pleased."
trans-unit.target: Hien huet gesot, "Si sinn no mäi Bunnen, an ech hastened zu Dir, mäin Här, datt Dir zefridde gin."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "But indeed, We have tried your people after you [departed], and the Samiri has led them astray."
trans-unit.target: [Gefroot] gesot, "Ma jo, mir hunn Är Leit no dir [higaang] versicht, an d'Samiri huet hinnen astray gefouert."

trans-unit.source: So Moses returned to his people, angry and grieved. He said, "O my people, did your Lord not make you a good promise? Then, was the time [of its fulfillment] too long for you, or did you wish that wrath from your Lord descend upon you, so you broke your promise [of obedience] to me?"
trans-unit.target: Also zréck Moses zu sengem Vollek, rosen an grieved.

trans-unit.source: They said, "We did not break our promise to you by our will, but we were made to carry burdens from the ornaments of the people [of Pharaoh], so we threw them [into the fire], and thus did the Samiri throw."
trans-unit.target: Si sot, "Mir hu Paus net eis Verspriechen dir vun eis ginn, mä mir waren feieren Laascht vun den Motiver vun de Leit ze maachen [vun Pharaoh], also mir Flucht hinnen [an d'Feier], a sou huet den Samiri geheien

trans-unit.source: And he extracted for them [the statue of] a calf which had a lowing sound, and they said, "This is your god and the god of Moses, but he forgot."
trans-unit.target: An hien Quecksëlwer fir hinnen [d'Statu vun] e Kallef déi eng nächst Toun huet, an si soten, "Dat Äre Gott ass an de Gott vum Moses, mä hien hat vergiess."

trans-unit.source: Did they not see that it could not return to them any speech and that it did not possess for them any harm or benefit?
trans-unit.target: gesinn hutt se net, datt et net zu hinnen all Ried zréck kënnt an dass et net fir si gemaach besëtzen all schueden oder profitéieren?

trans-unit.source: And Aaron had already told them before [the return of Moses], "O my people, you are only being tested by it, and indeed, your Lord is the Most Merciful, so follow me and obey my order."
trans-unit.target: An Aaron Hades schonn hinnen ier [de Retour vum Moses], "O meng Leit, sidd Dir nëmmen déi et getest ginn, an zwar, Är Lord ass de gréissten Verléierer, esou verfollegen mech a meng Bestellung weit."

trans-unit.source: They said, "We will never cease being devoted to the calf until Moses returns to us."
trans-unit.target: Si sot, "Mir wäerten ni un d'Kallef e stierft, gëtt bis Moses un eis preparéieren."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "O Aaron, what prevented you, when you saw them going astray,
trans-unit.target: [Moses] gesot, "O Aaron, wat verhënnert Dir, wann Dir se astray gesinn lass,

trans-unit.source: From following me? Then have you disobeyed my order?"
trans-unit.target: Vu mir folgend?

trans-unit.source: [Aaron] said, "O son of my mother, do not seize [me] by my beard or by my head. Indeed, I feared that you would say, 'You caused division among the Children of Israel, and you did not observe [or await] my word.' "
trans-unit.target: [Aaron] gesot, "O Jong vun menger Mamm, do lassgezunn net [mech] vun mengem Baart oder duerch mäi Kapp. Iwwerhaapt, ech gefaart, datt Dir géift soen," Du Divisioun ënnert d'Kanner vun Israel ëmmer, an dir hutt net fest

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "And what is your case, O Samiri?"
trans-unit.target: [Moses] gesot, "An wat ass Är Fall, O Samiri?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "I saw what they did not see, so I took a handful [of dust] from the track of the messenger and threw it, and thus did my soul entice me."
trans-unit.target: Hien huet gesot, "ech gesinn wat se net gemaach gesinn, sou huet ech e puer [vun Stëbs] vun der Streck vun der Messenger an Flucht ass, an doduerch huet meng Séil mech Profane guer net getrennt."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Then go. And indeed, it is [decreed] for you in [this] life to say, 'No contact.' And indeed, you have an appointment [in the Hereafter] you will not fail to keep. And look at your 'god' to which you remained devoted. We will surely burn it and blow it into the sea with a blast.
trans-unit.target: [Moses] gesot, "Dann ginn. An jo, ass et [Dekret] fir Iech zu [dëser] Liewen ze soen, Neen Kontakt."

trans-unit.source: Your god is only Allah, except for whom there is no deity. He has encompassed all things in knowledge."
trans-unit.target: Äre Gott ass nëmme gefroot, ausser fir deen et keng Gottheet.

trans-unit.source: Thus, [O Muhammad], We relate to you from the news of what has preceded. And We have certainly given you from Us the Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Sou, [O Muhammad], summenhang Mir fir Iech aus der Nouvelle vun wat vrun huet.

trans-unit.source: Whoever turns away from it - then indeed, he will bear on the Day of Resurrection a burden,
trans-unit.target: Deejéinegen ëmdréit aus et ewech - da jo, hien op den Dag vun Akten eng Belaaschtung Bier ginn,

trans-unit.source: [Abiding] eternally therein, and evil it is for them on the Day of Resurrection as a load -
trans-unit.target: [Konstante] eternally androen, an dat Béist ass et fir si op der Day vun Akten als Laaschten -

trans-unit.source: The Day the Horn will be blown. And We will gather the criminals, that Day, blue-eyed.
trans-unit.target: D'Day d'Horn wäert geplatzt ginn.

trans-unit.source: They will murmur among themselves, "You remained not but ten [days in the world]."
trans-unit.target: Si ginn ënnert sech Rumeuren, "Du blouf net mee ten [Deeg an der Welt]."

trans-unit.source: We are most knowing of what they say when the best of them in manner will say, "You remained not but one day."
trans-unit.target: Mir sinn déi wëssen vu wat se soen, wann déi bescht vun hinnen op seng Manéier soen, "Dir nach net, mee een Dag."

trans-unit.source: And they ask you about the mountains, so say, "My Lord will blow them away with a blast.
trans-unit.target: A se froen Dir iwwer de Bierger, also soen, "My Lord wäert si mat engem Héichuewen Coup ewech.

trans-unit.source: And He will leave the earth a level plain;
trans-unit.target: An hie wäert d'Äerd engem Niveau Kreon verloossen;

trans-unit.source: You will not see therein a depression or an elevation."
trans-unit.target: Dir wäert net doran eng Depressioun oder eng Héicht gesinn. "

trans-unit.source: That Day, everyone will follow [the call of] the Caller [with] no deviation therefrom, and [all] voices will be stilled before the Most Merciful, so you will not hear except a whisper [of footsteps].
trans-unit.target: Dat Day, jiddereen dann [den Opruff vun] den Ament [mat] kee deviation therefrom, an [all] Stëmmen virum meescht Verléierer stilled ginn, sou dass Dir net ausser engem attak héieren gëtt [vun Spass].

trans-unit.source: That Day, no intercession will benefit except [that of] one to whom the Most Merciful has given permission and has accepted his word.
trans-unit.target: Dat Day, gëtt keen Fürbitte Virdeel ausser [datt vun] een zu deenen déi meescht Verléierer Erlaabnis Härgott an huet säi Wuert akzeptéiert.

trans-unit.source: Allah knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them, but they do not encompass it in knowledge.
trans-unit.target: Gefroot weess wat ass [weideres] virun hinnen a wat gëtt no hinnen ginn, mä si maachen falen et net am Wëssen.

trans-unit.source: And [all] faces will be humbled before the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence. And he will have failed who carries injustice.
trans-unit.target: An [all] Gesiichter gëtt virun der Scho-Living geéiert ginn, déi Sustainer vun der Existenz.

trans-unit.source: But he who does of righteous deeds while he is a believer - he will neither fear injustice nor deprivation.
trans-unit.target: Mä deejéinegen vun Gerechten mierks iwwerdeems hien e gleeweg ass - hien gëtt weder Angscht Ongerechtegkeet nach Entzuch.

trans-unit.source: And thus We have sent it down as an Arabic Qur'an and have diversified therein the warnings that perhaps they will avoid [sin] or it would cause them remembrance.
trans-unit.target: An domat hu mer et verwandelt wéi eng arabesch Koran geschéckt an hunn doran de Warnunge diversifizéiert, datt vläicht ginn se [Sënn] verhënneren oder et géif hinnen Erënnerungsowend féieren.

trans-unit.source: So high [above all] is Allah, the Sovereign, the Truth. And, [O Muhammad], do not hasten with [recitation of] the Qur'an before its revelation is completed to you, and say, "My Lord, increase me in knowledge."
trans-unit.target: Esou héich [virun allem] ass gefroot, den souveränen, der Truth.

trans-unit.source: And We had already taken a promise from Adam before, but he forgot; and We found not in him determination.
trans-unit.target: A mir hu scho virun e Versprieche vum Adam geholl, mä hien hat vergiess;

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when We said to the angels, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except Iblees; he refused.
trans-unit.target: An [Gewerkschaft] wou mir gesot fir d'Engelen, "zu Adam Gesiicht," a si eng formidabel Vue, ausser Iblees;

trans-unit.source: So We said, "O Adam, indeed this is an enemy to you and to your wife. Then let him not remove you from Paradise so you would suffer.
trans-unit.target: Also sot mer, "O Adam, jo dat ass e Feind ze Dir an Är Fra. Da loosse mer him Dir vun Paradise net ewechhuelen sou géif Dir leiden.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is [promised] for you not to be hungry therein or be unclothed.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt ass et [versprach] fir Iech net hongereg ginn ze androen oder unclothed ginn.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, you will not be thirsty therein or be hot from the sun."
trans-unit.target: An jo, wäert Dir net duuschtereg ginn androen oder waarm gin vun der Sonn. "

trans-unit.source: Then Satan whispered to him; he said, "O Adam, shall I direct you to the tree of eternity and possession that will not deteriorate?"
trans-unit.target: Dunn geflüstert Satan zu him;

trans-unit.source: And Adam and his wife ate of it, and their private parts became apparent to them, and they began to fasten over themselves from the leaves of Paradise. And Adam disobeyed his Lord and erred.
trans-unit.target: An Adam a seng Fra Fruucht vun et, an hir privat Deeler gouf offensichtlech un hinnen, a si huet ugefaangen iwwer sech selwer aus der Blieder vun Paradise ze ratifizéiert.

trans-unit.source: Then his Lord chose him and turned to him in forgiveness and guided [him].
trans-unit.target: Da kucke sengem Här him a war him an d'Verzeiung a guidéiert [him].

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Descend from Paradise - all, [your descendants] being enemies to one another. And if there should come to you guidance from Me - then whoever follows My guidance will neither go astray [in the world] nor suffer [in the Hereafter].
trans-unit.target: [Gefroot] gesot, "aus Paradise Nokomme -. All, [Är Nokommen] Feinden ze eng aner Wiesen A wann et aus Me ze Dir Orientatioun kommen soll - da kënnt opfale Meng Orientatioun gëtt weder astray goen [an der Welt] nach bëssen [

trans-unit.source: And whoever turns away from My remembrance - indeed, he will have a depressed life, and We will gather him on the Day of Resurrection blind."
trans-unit.target: A wien dréit vun Meng Erënnerungsowend ewech - jo, gëtt hien eng depriméiert Liewen hunn, a mir wäerten hien op der Day vun Akten blannen Glaawen ".

trans-unit.source: He will say, "My Lord, why have you raised me blind while I was [once] seeing?"
trans-unit.target: Hie wäert soen, "My Lord, firwat hutt Dir opgewuess mech blann wann ech [eemol] gouf geknackt?"

trans-unit.source: [Allah] will say, "Thus did Our signs come to you, and you forgot them; and thus will you this Day be forgotten."
trans-unit.target: [Gefroot] gëtt gesot, "hutt Sou Eis Unzeeche komm fir Iech, an du hu se;. An dofir wäert Dir dës Day vergiess ginn"

trans-unit.source: And thus do We recompense he who transgressed and did not believe in the signs of his Lord. And the punishment of the Hereafter is more severe and more enduring.
trans-unit.target: An dofir maachen Mir hien unzerkennen déi transgressed a gleewen net am Zeeche vun sengem Här.

trans-unit.source: Then, has it not become clear to them how many generations We destroyed before them as they walk among their dwellings? Indeed in that are signs for those of intelligence.
trans-unit.target: Dunn, ass et net kloer ze si ginn, wéi vill Generatioune Mir ier si zerstéiert, wéi se ënnert hir Wunnénge goen?

trans-unit.source: And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, punishment would have been an obligation [due immediately], and [if not for] a specified term [decreed].
trans-unit.target: A wann net fir e Wuert dat aus Är Här vrun, Strof wier eng Obligatioun hunn [wéinst direkt] a [wann net fir] engem spezifizéierter Begrëff [Dekret].

trans-unit.source: So be patient over what they say and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting; and during periods of the night [exalt Him] and at the ends of the day, that you may be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: Also gin Patient iwwer wat se soen a wëll [gefroot] mat luewen vun Äre Här virun der Luucht vun der Sonn a virun hirem Kader;

trans-unit.source: And do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [some] categories of them, [its being but] the splendor of worldly life by which We test them. And the provision of your Lord is better and more enduring.
trans-unit.target: An do verlängeren net deng Aen déi Richtung déi mir kritt hunn léifsten zu [e] Kategorien vun hinnen, [sengem Wiesen awer] Pruecht vun weltlechen Liewen duerch déi mir hinnen Test.

trans-unit.source: And enjoin prayer upon your family [and people] and be steadfast therein. We ask you not for provision; We provide for you, and the [best] outcome is for [those of] righteousness.
trans-unit.target: An enjoin Gebied op Är Famill [a Leit] an androen aneschters wéi säi Brudder ginn.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Why does he not bring us a sign from his Lord?" Has there not come to them evidence of what was in the former scriptures?
trans-unit.target: A si soen, "Firwat hien eis net en Zeechen vu sengem Här bréngen?"

trans-unit.source: And if We had destroyed them with a punishment before him, they would have said, "Our Lord, why did You not send to us a messenger so we could have followed Your verses before we were humiliated and disgraced?"
trans-unit.target: An wann mer se mat enger Strof virun him zerstéiert hat, hätt si gesot hunn, "Eis Lord, firwat hutt Dir net eng Messenger fir eis schécken sou konnten mir Deng Verse gefollegt hunn, ier mir schaffe kann a disgraced goufen?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Each [of us] is waiting; so wait. For you will know who are the companions of the sound path and who is guided."
trans-unit.target: Soen, "All [vun eis] wart; sou wait Fir Dir wësst wäerten déi de Begleeder vun de Sound ugebonne ginn an déi opgewäert gëtt.."

trans-unit.source: [The time of] their account has approached for the people, while they are in heedlessness turning away.
trans-unit.target: [D'Zäit vun] hire Kont huet fir de Leit gudden, während si an heedlessness ginn doriwwer ewech.

trans-unit.source: No mention comes to them anew from their Lord except that they listen to it while they are at play
trans-unit.target: Nee ernimmen kënnt hinnen opstoën aus hirem Här ausser datt se bis et lauschteren während si um Leeschtung sinn

trans-unit.source: With their hearts distracted. And those who do wrong conceal their private conversation, [saying], "Is this [Prophet] except a human being like you? So would you approach magic while you are aware [of it]?"
trans-unit.target: Mat hiren Häerzer ofgelenkt.

trans-unit.source: The Prophet said, "My Lord knows whatever is said throughout the heaven and earth, and He is the Hearing, the Knowing."
trans-unit.target: De Prophet gesot, "My Lord weess wat ganze Himmel an Äerd gesot ass, an hien ass Prozess, den Lo."

trans-unit.source: But they say, "[The revelation is but] a mixture of false dreams; rather, he has invented it; rather, he is a poet. So let him bring us a sign just as the previous [messengers] were sent [with miracles]."
trans-unit.target: Mee si soen, "[Déi Révélatioun ass awer] enger Mëschung vu falschen Dreem; éischter, hien et erfonnt huet; éischter, hien ass e Poet him eis Also loosse mer eis en Zeechen grad wéi virdrun [Vermëttler] geschéckt goufen [mat veruersaachen.

trans-unit.source: Not a [single] city which We destroyed believed before them, so will they believe?
trans-unit.target: Net eng [Single] Stad déi mer virun hinne gegleeft zerstéiert, sou gëtt si gleewen?

trans-unit.source: And We sent not before you, [O Muhammad], except men to whom We revealed [the message], so ask the people of the message if you do not know.
trans-unit.target: A mir geschéckt net virun dir, [O Muhammad], ausser Männer zu deem Mir verroden [de Message], esou froen d'Leit vun de Message, wann Dir wësst net.

trans-unit.source: And We did not make the prophets forms not eating food, nor were they immortal [on earth].
trans-unit.target: A mir hunn net d'Prophéiten maachen Formen net giess, nach waren se onstierwlechen [op der Äerd].

trans-unit.source: Then We fulfilled for them the promise, and We saved them and whom We willed and destroyed the transgressors.
trans-unit.target: Dann erfëllt Mir fir hinnen d'Verspriechen, a mir gerett hinnen an där mir hierkënnt an der transgressors zerstéiert.

trans-unit.source: We have certainly sent down to you a Book in which is your mention. Then will you not reason?
trans-unit.target: Mir hunn natierlech fir Iech e Buch an deem Artikel ass ernimmen geschéckt huet.

trans-unit.source: And how many a city which was unjust have We shattered and produced after it another people.
trans-unit.target: A wéivill enger Stad, déi gerecht ass hun mer Gefällegkeet an aner Leit nodeems se produzéiert.

trans-unit.source: And when its inhabitants perceived Our punishment, at once they fled from it.
trans-unit.target: A wann sengen Awunner Eis Strof ugesi, op eemol stoen se aus et.

trans-unit.source: [Some angels said], "Do not flee but return to where you were given luxury and to your homes - perhaps you will be questioned."
trans-unit.target: [Gesot Verschiddener Engelen], "Do Ramplassang net awer zréck un, wou Dir Luxus entscheet sech a fir dobannen -. Vläicht wäert Dir gefrot ginn"

trans-unit.source: They said, "O woe to us! Indeed, we were wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: Si sot, "O gare eis! Zréckzeféieren, mir wrongdoers goufen."

trans-unit.source: And that declaration of theirs did not cease until We made them [as] a harvest [mowed down], extinguished [like a fire].
trans-unit.target: An datt eng Deklaratioun vun héchster net stierft, bis Mir si gemaach [den] engem Recolte [mowed verwandelt], extinguished [wëll e Feier].

trans-unit.source: And We did not create the heaven and earth and that between them in play.
trans-unit.target: A mir hu schafen net den Himmel an Äerd an déi tëscht hinnen an Leeschtung.

trans-unit.source: Had We intended to take a diversion, We could have taken it from [what is] with Us - if [indeed] We were to do so.
trans-unit.target: Hu mer gehofft Diversioun ze huelen, mir hunn kéint et aus geholl [wat ass] mat eis - wann [Exemplar] Mir esou ze maachen huet.

trans-unit.source: Rather, We dash the truth upon falsehood, and it destroys it, and thereupon it departs. And for you is destruction from that which you describe.
trans-unit.target: Villméi gerannt Mir der Wourecht op falsehood, an et freckt ass, an hale et departs.

trans-unit.source: To Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and the earth. And those near Him are not prevented by arrogance from His worship, nor do they tire.
trans-unit.target: Hien gehéiert wien am Himmel an op der Äerd ass.

trans-unit.source: They exalt [Him] night and day [and] do not slacken.
trans-unit.target: Si wëll [Him] Nuecht an Dag [a] do slacken net.

trans-unit.source: Or have men taken for themselves gods from the earth who resurrect [the dead]?
trans-unit.target: Oder hun Männer fir sech Gëtter aus der Äerd geholl, déi gegrënnt [den Doudegen]?

trans-unit.source: Had there been within the heavens and earth gods besides Allah, they both would have been ruined. So exalted is Allah, Lord of the Throne, above what they describe.
trans-unit.target: Déi do am Himmel an Äerd Götter niewt gefroot ginn, si zwee hunn géif zerstéiert ginn.

trans-unit.source: He is not questioned about what He does, but they will be questioned.
trans-unit.target: Hien ass net gefrot, wat hie seet, mä si wäert gefouert ginn.

trans-unit.source: Or have they taken gods besides Him? Say, [O Muhammad], "Produce your proof. This [Qur'an] is the message for those with me and the message of those before me." But most of them do not know the truth, so they are turning away.
trans-unit.target: Oder hunn se Götter niewt Him geholl?

trans-unit.source: And We sent not before you any messenger except that We revealed to him that, "There is no deity except Me, so worship Me."
trans-unit.target: A mir geschéckt ier Dir keng Messenger ausser dass mir zu him sot, datt, "Et ass keng reliéis ausser Me, esou Me Chouer."

trans-unit.source: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken a son." Exalted is He! Rather, they are [but] honored servants.
trans-unit.target: A si soen, "Déi meescht Verléierer e Jong geholl huet."

trans-unit.source: They cannot precede Him in word, and they act by His command.
trans-unit.target: Si kann Him net zu Wuert marschéiert, a si Akt vun Seng Kommando.

trans-unit.source: He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them, and they cannot intercede except on behalf of one whom He approves. And they, from fear of Him, are apprehensive.
trans-unit.target: Hie weess, wat ass [weideres] virun hinnen a wat der hinnen ginn, a si kënnen ausser op Numm vun engem net intercede wiem hien approuvéiert.

trans-unit.source: And whoever of them should say, "Indeed, I am a god besides Him"- that one We would recompense with Hell. Thus do We recompense the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: A wien vun hinnen sollen soen, "Tatsächlech, ech ee Gott ausser Him" -, datt ee mer géif mat Hell unzerkennen.

trans-unit.source: Have those who disbelieved not considered that the heavens and the earth were a joined entity, and We separated them and made from water every living thing? Then will they not believe?
trans-unit.target: Hunn déi, déi net dass den Himmel an d'Äerd als disbelieved eng Entitéit zesumme waren, a mir getrennt hinnen a vum Waasser all déi Saach gemaach?

trans-unit.source: And We placed within the earth firmly set mountains, lest it should shift with them, and We made therein [mountain] passes [as] roads that they might be guided.
trans-unit.target: A mir Faarwe fest bannent der Äerd Bierger virbereet, bewaacht et mat hinnen Verréckelung sollen, a Mir feieren androen [Bierg] Passë [den] Stroossen datt se leede kënnen.

trans-unit.source: And We made the sky a protected ceiling, but they, from its signs, are turning away.
trans-unit.target: A mir hunn den Himmel e geschützt Plafongsbiller, mä si, aus sengem Schëlter sinn doriwwer ewech.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who created the night and the day and the sun and the moon; all [heavenly bodies] in an orbit are swimming.
trans-unit.target: An et ass hien, deen d'Nuecht an den Dag an der Sonn an dem Mound hunn;

trans-unit.source: And We did not grant to any man before you eternity [on earth]; so if you die - would they be eternal?
trans-unit.target: A Mir hunn heimat net zu all Mënsch ier Dir [op der Äerd] Éiwegkeet;

trans-unit.source: Every soul will taste death. And We test you with evil and with good as trial; and to Us you will be returned.
trans-unit.target: All Séil Doud Goût.

trans-unit.source: And when those who disbelieve see you, [O Muhammad], they take you not except in ridicule, [saying], "Is this the one who insults your gods?" And they are, at the mention of the Most Merciful, disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: A wann déi déi Dir disbelieve gesinn, [O Muhammad], si huelen iech net ausser an lächerlech, [gesot], "Ass dat dee Är Gëtter insults?"

trans-unit.source: Man was created of haste. I will show you My signs, so do not impatiently urge Me.
trans-unit.target: Mann war vun Sprëchwuert geschaf.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"
trans-unit.target: A si soen, "Wéi ass dat verspriechen, wann Dir zouverléisseg soll?"

trans-unit.source: If those who disbelieved but knew the time when they will not avert the Fire from their faces or from their backs and they will not be aided...
trans-unit.target: Wann déi disbelieved mä wousst der Zäit, wou se net d'Weeltzer aus hir Gesiichter oder vun hirer Positioun gerannt a se gëtt net En gin ...

trans-unit.source: Rather, it will come to them unexpectedly and bewilder them, and they will not be able to repel it, nor will they be reprieved.
trans-unit.target: Villméi geet et hinnen kommen onerwart an bewilder hinnen, a si wäert et net goufs fäheg, nach wäert si reprieved ginn.

trans-unit.source: And already were messengers ridiculed before you, but those who mocked them were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: An schon huet Vermëttler ier Dir verleiert, mä déi, déi hinnen de Spott sech deem, wat se lächerlech benotzt.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who can protect you at night or by day from the Most Merciful?" But they are, from the remembrance of their Lord, turning away.
trans-unit.target: Soen, "Wien dir an der Nuecht oder vum Dag aus dem gréissten Verléierer schützen kann?"

trans-unit.source: Or do they have gods to defend them other than Us? They are unable [even] to help themselves, nor can they be protected from Us.
trans-unit.target: Oder gi si Gëtter hinne anere wéi eis ze verdeedegen hunn?

trans-unit.source: But, [on the contrary], We have provided good things for these [disbelievers] and their fathers until life was prolonged for them. Then do they not see that We set upon the land, reducing it from its borders? So it is they who will overcome?
trans-unit.target: Mä, [op de Géigendeel], Mir hunn fir dës [iech] gutt Saache gëtt an hir Pappen bis Liewen war fir se noliesen.

trans-unit.source: Say, "I only warn you by revelation." But the deaf do not hear the call when they are warned.
trans-unit.target: Soen, "Ech warnen Iech nëmmen duerch Révélatioun."

trans-unit.source: And if [as much as] a whiff of the punishment of your Lord should touch them, they would surely say, "O woe to us! Indeed, we have been wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: A wann [sou vill wéi] en Doft vun der Strof vun Äre Här soll hinnen opmierksam ginn, wier se secher soen, "O gare eis! Iwwerhaapt hu mir wrongdoers ginn."

trans-unit.source: And We place the scales of justice for the Day of Resurrection, so no soul will be treated unjustly at all. And if there is [even] the weight of a mustard seed, We will bring it forth. And sufficient are We as accountant.
trans-unit.target: An Mir Plaz an domat vun der Gerechtegkeet fir d'Day vun Akten, sou gëtt keng Séil unjustly bei all behandelt ginn.

trans-unit.source: And We had already given Moses and Aaron the criterion and a light and a reminder for the righteous
trans-unit.target: A mir hu schonn entscheet Moses an Aaron de Kritär an engem Liicht an engem Rappel fir déi Gerecht

trans-unit.source: Who fear their Lord unseen, while they are of the Hour apprehensive.
trans-unit.target: Wien Angscht hirem Här, Schwoer, wann se vun der Hour fille sinn.

trans-unit.source: And this [Qur'an] is a blessed message which We have sent down. Then are you with it unacquainted?
trans-unit.target: An dëser [Koran] ass e geseent Message deen Mir erof geschéckt hunn.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given Abraham his sound judgement before, and We were of him well-Knowing
trans-unit.target: A mir hu sécherlech Abraham sengem Sound Veruerteelung virum entscheet, a mir ware vun him gutt-Lo

trans-unit.source: When he said to his father and his people, "What are these statues to which you are devoted?"
trans-unit.target: Wann hie bis zu sengem Papp sot a seng Leit, "Wat sinn déi Statuen un déi Dir Misär ginn?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "We found our fathers worshippers of them."
trans-unit.target: Si sot, "Mir eise Pappe treien vun hinne fonnt."

trans-unit.source: He said, "You were certainly, you and your fathers, in manifest error."
trans-unit.target: Hien huet gesot, "Du sech sécher, Iech an Äre Papp, an manifestéieren Feeler."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Have you come to us with truth, or are you of those who jest?"
trans-unit.target: Si sot: "Hutt Dir fir eis mat Wourecht kommen, oder sidd Dir vun deenen déi Pak?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "[No], rather, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth who created them, and I, to that, am of those who testify.
trans-unit.target: Hien huet gesot, "[Nee], éischter, däin Här vun den Himmel ass an d'Äerd déi se hunn, an ech, an dat, ech vun deenen, déi dat bestätegen.

trans-unit.source: And [I swear] by Allah, I will surely plan against your idols after you have turned and gone away."
trans-unit.target: An [Ech schwieren] vun gefroot, ech wäert géint Är dass grad déi dote Plan der Dir war hun an fort. "

trans-unit.source: So he made them into fragments, except a large one among them, that they might return to it [and question].
trans-unit.target: Also hien huet hinnen an Brochstécker, ausser engem grousse een ënnert hinnen, datt se bis et zréck kéint [a Fro].

trans-unit.source: They said, "Who has done this to our gods? Indeed, he is of the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: Si sot, "Wien huet dat gemaach fir eis Götter? Zréckzeféieren, hien ass vun der wrongdoers."

trans-unit.source: They said, "We heard a young man mention them who is called Abraham."
trans-unit.target: Si sot, "Mir engem jonke Mann héieren hinnen ernimmen deen Abraham genannt ass."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Then bring him before the eyes of the people that they may testify."
trans-unit.target: Si sot, "hien Da bréngt eis virun den Ae vun de Leit, datt si him kann."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Have you done this to our gods, O Abraham?"
trans-unit.target: Si sot: "Hutt Dir ugedon fir eis Gëtter, O Abraham?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Rather, this - the largest of them - did it, so ask them, if they should [be able to] speak."
trans-unit.target: Hien huet gesot, "opgefall, dat - de gréisste vun hinnen - hat et, sou stellen se, wann se soll [fäheg] schwätzt."

trans-unit.source: So they returned to [blaming] themselves and said [to each other], "Indeed, you are the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: Also si hannescht op [viru Gericht ausgesot] selwer a gesot [Moundphasen], "zréckzeféieren, Dir sidd der wrongdoers."

trans-unit.source: Then they reversed themselves, [saying], "You have already known that these do not speak!"
trans-unit.target: Dunn réckgängeg si selwer, [gesot], "Dir hutt scho bekannt datt dës do schwätzen net!"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Then do you worship instead of Allah that which does not benefit you at all or harm you?
trans-unit.target: Hien huet gesot, "Dann hutt Dir amplaz vu gefroot dass Kultplaz, déi Dir et guer net profitéieren oder dir schueden?

trans-unit.source: Uff to you and to what you worship instead of Allah. Then will you not use reason?"
trans-unit.target: Uff, fir Iech an fir wat Dir amplaz vu gefroot Chouer.

trans-unit.source: They said, "Burn him and support your gods - if you are to act."
trans-unit.target: Si sot, "Burn him an Är Gëtter Ënnerstëtzung -. Wann dir wäermstens sinn"

trans-unit.source: Allah said, "O fire, be coolness and safety upon Abraham."
trans-unit.target: Gefroot gesot, "O Feier, coolness a Sécherheet op Abraham ginn."

trans-unit.source: And they intended for him harm, but We made them the greatest losers.
trans-unit.target: A si fir him ze schueden, mä mir hunn se de gréisste Loser.

trans-unit.source: And We delivered him and Lot to the land which We had blessed for the worlds.
trans-unit.target: A mir geliwwert him an Lot fir d'Land, déi mir fir d'Welten geseent hat.

trans-unit.source: And We gave him Isaac and Jacob in addition, and all [of them] We made righteous.
trans-unit.target: An Mir huet him Isaac a Jacob zu Zousätzlech, an all [vun hinnen] Mir feieren gerecht.

trans-unit.source: And We made them leaders guiding by Our command. And We inspired to them the doing of good deeds, establishment of prayer, and giving of zakah; and they were worshippers of Us.
trans-unit.target: A mir hunn hinnen Cheffen vun eisem Kommandant wéider.

trans-unit.source: And to Lot We gave judgement and knowledge, and We saved him from the city that was committing wicked deeds. Indeed, they were a people of evil, defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: An zu Lot huet Mir Uerteel a Wëssen, a mir gerett him aus der Stad, dat Béist mierks war asëtzen.

trans-unit.source: And We admitted him into Our mercy. Indeed, he was of the righteous.
trans-unit.target: A mir zouginn him an eis ausgeliwwert.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Noah, when he called [to Allah] before [that time], so We responded to him and saved him and his family from the great flood.
trans-unit.target: An [Gewerkschaft] Noah, wou hien [zu gefroot] genannt ier [datt Zäit], esou ënnerhal Mir zu him a gerett him a senger Famill aus der grousser Iwwerschwemmung.

trans-unit.source: And We saved him from the people who denied Our signs. Indeed, they were a people of evil, so We drowned them, all together.
trans-unit.target: A mir gerett him vun de Leit, déi eis Zeeche verweigert.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] David and Solomon, when they judged concerning the field - when the sheep of a people overran it [at night], and We were witness to their judgement.
trans-unit.target: An [Gewerkschaft] David an Solomon, wann si den Terrain scho wéinst - wann d'Schof vun engem Leit Loutrenge et [at Nuecht], an Mir waren Zeien un hir Veruerteelung.

trans-unit.source: And We gave understanding of the case to Solomon, and to each [of them] We gave judgement and knowledge. And We subjected the mountains to exalt [Us], along with David and [also] the birds. And We were doing [that].
trans-unit.target: An Mir huet Verständnis vun de Fall ze Solomon, an all [vun hinnen] Mir huet Uerteel a Wëssen.

trans-unit.source: And We taught him the fashioning of coats of armor to protect you from your [enemy in] battle. So will you then be grateful?
trans-unit.target: A mir geléiert him d'fashioning vun Wopen Rüstung Dir aus Ärem [Feind zu] Schluecht ze schützen.

trans-unit.source: And to Solomon [We subjected] the wind, blowing forcefully, proceeding by his command toward the land which We had blessed. And We are ever, of all things, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: An zu Solomon [Mir ënnerworf] de Wand, forcefully garde, réckelt vun sengem Kommandant géintiwwer der Grondsteier déi Mir geseent hat.

trans-unit.source: And of the devils were those who dived for him and did work other than that. And We were of them a guardian.
trans-unit.target: A vun der Devils huet déi fir him souguer an huet Aarbecht aner wéi déi.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Job, when he called to his Lord, "Indeed, adversity has touched me, and you are the Most Merciful of the merciful."
trans-unit.target: An [Gewerkschaft] Job, wou hien zu sengem Här genannt, "Iwwerhaapt Schluss huet mech beréiert, an Dir sidd de gréissten Verléierer vun der eis gär."

trans-unit.source: So We responded to him and removed what afflicted him of adversity. And We gave him [back] his family and the like thereof with them as mercy from Us and a reminder for the worshippers [of Allah].
trans-unit.target: Also Etzella Mir zu him a geläscht, wat him vun der Distanz krankheetshalber.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Ishmael and Idrees and Dhul-Kifl; all were of the patient.
trans-unit.target: An [Gewerkschaft] Ishmael an Idrees an Dhul-Kifl;

trans-unit.source: And We admitted them into Our mercy. Indeed, they were of the righteous.
trans-unit.target: A mir behaapten se nees Eis ausgeliwwert.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the man of the fish, when he went off in anger and thought that We would not decree [anything] upon him. And he called out within the darknesses, "There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: An [Gewerkschaft] de Mann vun de Fësch, wou hien am Roserei huet sech geduecht, dass mir géifen net Dekret [näischt] op him.

trans-unit.source: So We responded to him and saved him from the distress. And thus do We save the believers.
trans-unit.target: Also Etzella Mir zu him a gerett him aus der Nout.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Zechariah, when he called to his Lord, "My Lord, do not leave me alone [with no heir], while you are the best of inheritors."
trans-unit.target: An [Gewerkschaft] Zechariah, wou hien zu sengem Här genannt, "My Lord, do loosst mech net eleng [mat kee destinéiert], wann Dir de beschte vun inheritors sinn."

trans-unit.source: So We responded to him, and We gave to him John, and amended for him his wife. Indeed, they used to hasten to good deeds and supplicate Us in hope and fear, and they were to Us humbly submissive.
trans-unit.target: Also Etzella Mir zu him, a Mir huet zu him John, an iwwerhëlt fir him seng Fra.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the one who guarded her chastity, so We blew into her [garment] through Our angel [Gabriel], and We made her and her son a sign for the worlds.
trans-unit.target: An [Gewerkschaft], dee säi Chastity iwwerwaacht, datt mir an hirem [gekleet] verroden duerch Eis Engel [Gabriel], a Mir hunn hir an hirem Bouf en Zeechen fir d'Welten.

trans-unit.source: Indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so worship Me.
trans-unit.target: Jo dat, Är Relioun, ass eng Relioun, an ech Äre Lord, esou Me Chouer.

trans-unit.source: And [yet] they divided their affair among themselves, [but] all to Us will return.
trans-unit.target: An [nach] si ënnerdeelt hir Affär ënnert sech, [mä] all eis wäert zréck.

trans-unit.source: So whoever does righteous deeds while he is a believer - no denial will there be for his effort, and indeed We, of it, are recorders.
trans-unit.target: Also Deejéinegen Gerechten mierks iwwerdeems hien e gleeweg ass - keng Negatioun gëtt et fir seng Effort ginn, an zwar Mir, vun et, sinn Tounbänner.

trans-unit.source: And there is prohibition upon [the people of] a city which We have destroyed that they will [ever] return
trans-unit.target: An do ass Verbuet op [de Leit vu] eng Stad déi Mir zerstéiert hunn, datt se wäert [schons] zréck

trans-unit.source: Until when [the dam of] Gog and Magog has been opened and they, from every elevation, descend
trans-unit.target: Bis wéini [der anzeléën vun] Gog an de Magog gouf opgemaach a se, aus all Punkt, Nokomme

trans-unit.source: And [when] the true promise has approached; then suddenly the eyes of those who disbelieved will be staring [in horror, while they say], "O woe to us; we had been unmindful of this; rather, we were wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: An [wa] déi richteg verspriechen huet gudden;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, you [disbelievers] and what you worship other than Allah are the firewood of Hell. You will be coming to [enter] it.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, Dir [iech] a wat Dir aner Chouer wéi gefroot ginn d'Feierholz vun Hell.

trans-unit.source: Had these [false deities] been [actual] gods, they would not have come to it, but all are eternal therein.
trans-unit.target: Haten dës [falsch fënnt] gouf Gëtter [tatsächlech], géif si muss et net kommen, mee all sinn androen éiwegt.

trans-unit.source: For them therein is heavy sighing, and they therein will not hear.
trans-unit.target: Fir si ass androen schwéier Heen, a si wäert androen net héieren.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those for whom the best [reward] has preceded from Us - they are from it far removed.
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech huet deenen déi bescht [Belounung] vun eis Zousaz - si aus et wäit geläscht.

trans-unit.source: They will not hear its sound, while they are, in that which their souls desire, abiding eternally.
trans-unit.target: Si ginn net hirer Toun héieren, wann si, an datt déi hir Séilen Wonsch, konstante eternally.

trans-unit.source: They will not be grieved by the greatest terror, and the angels will meet them, [saying], "This is your Day which you have been promised" -
trans-unit.target: Si gëtt net vun de gréissten Terror grieved ginn, an d'Engelen Léiert hinnen, [gesot], "Dëst ass Är Day déi versprach goufen" -

trans-unit.source: The Day when We will fold the heaven like the folding of a [written] sheet for the records. As We began the first creation, We will repeat it. [That is] a promise binding upon Us. Indeed, We will do it.
trans-unit.target: Den Daag wou Mir wäerten d'Himmel wéi d'folding vun engem [schrëftlech] Aschreiwung fir den records fantastesch.

trans-unit.source: And We have already written in the book [of Psalms] after the [previous] mention that the land [of Paradise] is inherited by My righteous servants.
trans-unit.target: An mir hunn schon am Buch [vun gesicht] geschriwwen no der [virdrun] ernimmen, datt d'Land [vun Paradise] vun Meng Gerechten Dénger ierflecher ass.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, in this [Qur'an] is notification for a worshipping people.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, an dat [Koran] ass Notifikatioun fir eng worshiping Leit.

trans-unit.source: And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a mercy to the worlds.
trans-unit.target: A mir hunn net Iech, [O Muhammad], ausser als Opfer fir d'Welten geschéckt.

trans-unit.source: Say, "It is only revealed to me that your god is but one God; so will you be Muslims [in submission to Him]?"
trans-unit.target: Soen: "Et ass nëmme fir mech verroden dass Äre Gott awer ee Gott ass; sou wäert Dir Muslimen ginn [zu Soumissioun zu Him]?"

trans-unit.source: But if they turn away, then say, "I have announced to [all of] you equally. And I know not whether near or far is that which you are promised.
trans-unit.target: Mee wann se ewech maachen, da soen, "ech hunn annoncéiert zu [all vun] Dir gläich. An ech weess net, ob bei oder wäit dat ass wat Dir versprach ginn.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, He knows what is declared of speech, and He knows what you conceal.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, weess hien, wat vun Ried deklaréiert ass, an hien weess, wat Dir verheemlechen.

trans-unit.source: And I know not; perhaps it is a trial for you and enjoyment for a time."
trans-unit.target: An ech weess net;

trans-unit.source: [The Prophet] has said, "My Lord, judge [between us] in truth. And our Lord is the Most Merciful, the one whose help is sought against that which you describe."
trans-unit.target: [Den Prophet] gesot huet, "My Lord, Riichter [tëscht eis] zu Wourecht. An eisen Här ass de gréissten Verléierer, déi een hir hëllefen géint déi ugestriewt ass deen dir beschreiwen."

trans-unit.source: O mankind, fear your Lord. Indeed, the convulsion of the [final] Hour is a terrible thing.
trans-unit.target: O Fräiheet, Angscht Är Här.

trans-unit.source: On the Day you see it every nursing mother will be distracted from that [child] she was nursing, and every pregnant woman will abort her pregnancy, and you will see the people [appearing] intoxicated while they are not intoxicated; but the punishment of Allah is severe.
trans-unit.target: Op der Day Dir se all Altersheem Mamm gesinn gëtt aus, datt [Kand] ofgelenkt gin si war Altersheem, an all schwanger Fra wäert hir Schwangerschaft Ausféierung, an Dir wäert d'Leit [Rostain] Autoscourssen gesinn wann si net Autoscourssen;

trans-unit.source: And of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge and follows every rebellious devil.
trans-unit.target: A vun de Leit ass hien deen ouni Wëssen Meenungsverschiddenheeten iwwer gefroot a se all Rebellenzon Däiwel.

trans-unit.source: It has been decreed for every devil that whoever turns to him - he will misguide him and will lead him to the punishment of the Blaze.
trans-unit.target: Et ass fir all Däiwel Dekret datt wien him verleeft - hien him misguide gëtt an him un d'Strof vun der Tempo Féierung gëtt.

trans-unit.source: O People, if you should be in doubt about the Resurrection, then [consider that] indeed, We created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot, and then from a lump of flesh, formed and unformed - that We may show you. And We settle in the wombs whom We will for a specified term, then We bring you out as a child, and then [We develop you] that you may reach your [time of] maturity. And among you is he who is taken in [early] death, and among you is he who is returned to the most decrepit [old] age so that he knows, after [once having] knowledge, nothing. And you see the earth barren, but when We send down upon it rain, it quivers and swells and grows [something] of every beautiful kind.
trans-unit.target: O Leit, wann Dir am Zweiwel iwwer d'Akten soll, dann [Meenung dass] Dot, Mir hunn iech aus Stëbs, dann vun engem presuméierten-Lëscht, dann aus enger clinging Bluddung, an dann aus enger lump vun Fleesch, aleng an unformed

trans-unit.source: That is because Allah is the Truth and because He gives life to the dead and because He is over all things competent
trans-unit.target: Dat ass well bei der Wourecht ass a well hie gëtt Liewen an déi Doudeg a well Hien ass iwwer all Saachen zoustännegen

trans-unit.source: And [that they may know] that the Hour is coming - no doubt about it - and that Allah will resurrect those in the graves.
trans-unit.target: An [dass si vläicht wëssen] datt d'Hour nächste ass - keng Zweiwel iwwer dat - an dat gefroot ginn déi an de Griewer gegrënnt.

trans-unit.source: And of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge or guidance or an enlightening book [from Him],
trans-unit.target: A vun de Leit ass hien deen gefroot Meenungsverschiddenheeten iwwer ouni Wëssen oder Orientatioun oder eng bescht Buch [aus Him],

trans-unit.source: Twisting his neck [in arrogance] to mislead [people] from the way of Allah. For him in the world is disgrace, and We will make him taste on the Day of Resurrection the punishment of the Burning Fire [while it is said],
trans-unit.target: Zweekampf op seng Hals [an Arroganz] ze beléien [Leit] vun der Aart a Weis vun der Douane.

trans-unit.source: "That is for what your hands have put forth and because Allah is not ever unjust to [His] servants."
trans-unit.target: "Dat ass fir wat Är Hänn erausbréngen Supporter hunn a well gefroot ass net ëmmer gerecht ze [Seng] Dénger."

trans-unit.source: And of the people is he who worships Allah on an edge. If he is touched by good, he is reassured by it; but if he is struck by trial, he turns on his face [to the other direction]. He has lost [this] world and the Hereafter. That is what is the manifest loss.
trans-unit.target: A vun de Leit ass hien deen gefroot op engem Wäitschoss Kult.

trans-unit.source: He invokes instead of Allah that which neither harms him nor benefits him. That is what is the extreme error.
trans-unit.target: Hien invokes amplaz gefroot dass déi weder erwisenermoossen him nach Virdeeler him.

trans-unit.source: He invokes one whose harm is closer than his benefit - how wretched the protector and how wretched the associate.
trans-unit.target: Hien invokes een deem Schued ass méi no wéi säi Virdeel - wéi erbäermlech der Protecteur a wéi erbäermlech der Associé.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow. Indeed, Allah does what He intends.
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech Flux déi gleewen an do Gerechten Reha ze Gäert ënnert deem Flëss gefroot ginn zouginn.

trans-unit.source: Whoever should think that Allah will not support [Prophet Muhammad] in this world and the Hereafter - let him extend a rope to the ceiling, then cut off [his breath], and let him see: will his effort remove that which enrages [him]?
trans-unit.target: Deejéinegen, sollen dat gefroot wäert ënnerstëtzen [Prophet Muhammad] net vun dëser Welt an der verdéngt - loosse him un der Plafongsbiller engem Seel verlängeren, koum dunn ugefaangen [säin Otem], a loosse him gesinn: wäert seng Effort datt ewechzehuelen déi [him enrages

trans-unit.source: And thus have We sent the Qur'an down as verses of clear evidence and because Allah guides whom He intends.
trans-unit.target: An domat hu mer de Koran geschéckt huet den Verse vum kloer Beweiser a well gefroot Guiden wiem hie wäert.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and those who were Jews and the Sabeans and the Christians and the Magians and those who associated with Allah - Allah will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed Allah is, over all things, Witness.
trans-unit.target: déi, déi gegleeft hunn an déi jo, déi Judden sech an der Sabeans an de Chrëschten an der Magians an déi, déi mat gefroot verbonne - gefroot ginn tëschent hinnen op dem Dag vun Akten Riichter.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that to Allah prostrates whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth and the sun, the moon, the stars, the mountains, the trees, the moving creatures and many of the people? But upon many the punishment has been justified. And he whom Allah humiliates - for him there is no bestower of honor. Indeed, Allah does what He wills.
trans-unit.target: Do gesitt Dir net, datt zu gefroot prostrates wien am Himmel ass an wien ass op der Äerd an der Sonn, de Mound, d'Stären, d'Bierger, d'Beem, d'Plënneren Kreaturen an vill vun de Leit?

trans-unit.source: These are two adversaries who have disputed over their Lord. But those who disbelieved will have cut out for them garments of fire. Poured upon their heads will be scalding water
trans-unit.target: Dës sinn zwee Géigner deen iwwer hir Här kontestéiert hunn.

trans-unit.source: By which is melted that within their bellies and [their] skins.
trans-unit.target: Vun deem ass einfach, datt bannent hir bellies an [hir] iwwerzunn.

trans-unit.source: And for [striking] them are maces of iron.
trans-unit.target: A fir [markant] hinne sinn maces vun Eisen.

trans-unit.source: Every time they want to get out of Hellfire from anguish, they will be returned to it, and [it will be said], "Taste the punishment of the Burning Fire!"
trans-unit.target: All Kéier wann se aus Stierwe aus Hellfire ze kréien wëllt, da si se zréck ginn, an [gëtt et gesot ginn], "Schmaacht d'Strof vun der Burning Fire!"

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearl, and their garments therein will be silk.
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech Flux déi gleewen an do Gerechten Reha ze Gäert ënnert deem Flëss gefroot ginn zouginn.

trans-unit.source: And they had been guided [in worldly life] to good speech, and they were guided to the path of the Praiseworthy.
