And We have not made their number except as a trial for those who disbelieve - that those who were given the Scripture will be convinced and those who have believed will increase in faith and those who were given the Scripture and the believers will not doubt and that those in whose hearts is hypocrisy and the disbelievers will say, "What does Allah intend by this as an example?" Thus does Allah leave astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And none knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him. And mention of the Fire is not but a reminder to humanity.
trans-unit.target: A mir hunn net d'Goalkeeperen vun der Fire ausser Engele gemaach.

trans-unit.source: No! By the moon
trans-unit.target: Nee!

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it departs
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] der Nuecht wann et departs

trans-unit.source: And [by] the morning when it brightens,
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] moies wann et brightens,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Fire is of the greatest [afflictions]
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech ass d'Weeltzer vun de gréissten [afflictions]

trans-unit.source: As a warning to humanity -
trans-unit.target: Als eng Warnung un Mënschheet -

trans-unit.source: To whoever wills among you to proceed or stay behind.
trans-unit.target: Fir wien ënnert Dir Wills hannert virgoen oder bleiwen.

trans-unit.source: Every soul, for what it has earned, will be retained
trans-unit.target: All Séil, fir wat se mécht, ginn zréckbehalen

trans-unit.source: Except the companions of the right,
trans-unit.target: Ausser de Begleeder vun der Recht,

trans-unit.source: [Who will be] in gardens, questioning each other
trans-unit.target: [Wien wäert] an Gäert, all aner Fro

trans-unit.source: About the criminals,
trans-unit.target: Iwwer d'Kriminell,

trans-unit.source: [And asking them], "What put you into Saqar?"
trans-unit.target: [An froen hinnen], "Wat dir an Saqar huet?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "We were not of those who prayed,
trans-unit.target: Si soen, "Mir waren net vun deenen, déi gebiet,

trans-unit.source: Nor did we used to feed the poor.
trans-unit.target: Nach gemaach ginn mir déi aarm ze fidderen.

trans-unit.source: And we used to enter into vain discourse with those who engaged [in it],
trans-unit.target: A mir ginn nees ëmsoss Discours mat deenen ze trieden déi [an et] engagéiert,

trans-unit.source: And we used to deny the Day of Recompense
trans-unit.target: A mir ginn der Day vun unzerkennen an ze verleegnen

trans-unit.source: Until there came to us the certainty."
trans-unit.target: Bis et un eis ass d'Sécherheet. "

trans-unit.source: So there will not benefit them the intercession of [any] intercessors.
trans-unit.target: Also gëtt et net hinnen d'Fürbitten vum [keng] intercessors profitéieren.

trans-unit.source: Then what is [the matter] with them that they are, from the reminder, turning away
trans-unit.target: Wat ass [der Matière] mat hinnen, datt si, aus de Rappel, doriwwer ewech

trans-unit.source: As if they were alarmed donkeys
trans-unit.target: Wéi wann si erféiert Datt sech

trans-unit.source: Fleeing from a lion?
trans-unit.target: Bauer aus engem Léiw?

trans-unit.source: Rather, every person among them desires that he would be given scriptures spread about.
trans-unit.target: Villméi Lëschter all Persoun dorënner datt hien Schrëften iwwer verbreet ginn hätt.

trans-unit.source: No! But they do not fear the Hereafter.
trans-unit.target: Nee!

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder
trans-unit.target: Nee!

trans-unit.source: Then whoever wills will remember it.
trans-unit.target: Dunn Wills wien et erënnert gëtt.

trans-unit.source: And they will not remember except that Allah wills. He is worthy of fear and adequate for [granting] forgiveness.
trans-unit.target: A si ginn net erënneren ausser dass gefroot Wills.

trans-unit.source: I swear by the Day of Resurrection
trans-unit.target: Ech schwieren vun der Day vun Akten

trans-unit.source: And I swear by the reproaching soul [to the certainty of resurrection].
trans-unit.target: An ech schwieren vun der reproaching Séil [zu der Sécherheet vun Sënde].

trans-unit.source: Does man think that We will not assemble his bones?
trans-unit.target: Heescht, dass de Mann dat Mir wäerten net seng Schanken Board?

trans-unit.source: Yes. [We are] Able [even] to proportion his fingertips.
trans-unit.target: Jo.

trans-unit.source: But man desires to continue in sin.
trans-unit.target: Mä Mann Lëschter am Sënn weiderfueren.

trans-unit.source: He asks, "When is the Day of Resurrection?"
trans-unit.target: Hie freet: "Wann d'Day vun Akten ass?"

trans-unit.source: So when vision is dazzled
trans-unit.target: Also wann Visioun ass Gaaschtfrëndschaft

trans-unit.source: And the moon darkens
trans-unit.target: An de Mound darkens

trans-unit.source: And the sun and the moon are joined,
trans-unit.target: An der Sonn an dem Mound si sech,

trans-unit.source: Man will say on that Day, "Where is the [place of] escape?"
trans-unit.target: Mann gëtt op déi Day soen, "Wou ass de [Plaz vun] entzéien?"

trans-unit.source: No! There is no refuge.
trans-unit.target: Nee!

trans-unit.source: To your Lord, that Day, is the [place of] permanence.
trans-unit.target: Fir Är Lord, datt Day, ass de [Plaz vun] Bestand.

trans-unit.source: Man will be informed that Day of what he sent ahead and kept back.
trans-unit.target: Man gëtt, datt Day vu informéiert ginn, wat hien geschéckt Supporter waren an de Réck.

trans-unit.source: Rather, man, against himself, will be a witness,
trans-unit.target: Éischter, Mann, géint sech selwer, wäert Zeien gin,

trans-unit.source: Even if he presents his excuses.
trans-unit.target: Och wann hie presentéiert seng Ausried.

trans-unit.source: Move not your tongue with it, [O Muhammad], to hasten with recitation of the Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Move net Ärer Mammesprooch mat et, [O Muhammad], mat recitation vun de Koran ze hasten.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, upon Us is its collection [in your heart] and [to make possible] its recitation.
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech oblige seng Sammlung [zu Är Häerz] ass an [ze maachen méiglech] seng recitation.

trans-unit.source: So when We have recited it [through Gabriel], then follow its recitation.
trans-unit.target: Also wann mir et hunn recited [duerch Gabriel], dann seng recitation verfollegen.

trans-unit.source: Then upon Us is its clarification [to you].
trans-unit.target: Dunn oblige ass seng Ännerung [Iech].

trans-unit.source: No! But you love the immediate
trans-unit.target: Nee!

trans-unit.source: And leave the Hereafter.
trans-unit.target: A verloossen d'verdéngt.

trans-unit.source: [Some] faces, that Day, will be radiant,
trans-unit.target: [Sou] Gesiichter, wäert dat Day, ginn Stralungsenergie,

trans-unit.source: Looking at their Lord.
trans-unit.target: Sich op hiren Här.

trans-unit.source: And [some] faces, that Day, will be contorted,
trans-unit.target: An [e] Gesiichter, datt Day, wäert contorted,

trans-unit.source: Expecting that there will be done to them [something] backbreaking.
trans-unit.target: Erwaarden, dass et hinnen [eppes] backbreaking gemaach ginn.

trans-unit.source: No! When the soul has reached the collar bones
trans-unit.target: Nee!

trans-unit.source: And it is said, "Who will cure [him]?"
trans-unit.target: An et gesot gëtt, "Wien Kur gëtt [him]?"

trans-unit.source: And the dying one is certain that it is the [time of] separation
trans-unit.target: An d'Stierwen eent ass sécher, datt et den [Zäit vun] Trennung ass

trans-unit.source: And the leg is wound about the leg,
trans-unit.target: An de Been ass iwwer d'Been Wonn,

trans-unit.source: To your Lord, that Day, will be the procession.
trans-unit.target: Fir Är Lord, datt Day, gëtt de Cortège ginn.

trans-unit.source: And the disbeliever had not believed, nor had he prayed.
trans-unit.target: An der disbeliever net gegleeft huet, nach hu gebiet huet.

trans-unit.source: But [instead], he denied and turned away.
trans-unit.target: Mä [amplaz], hie volljäreg a war ewech.

trans-unit.source: And then he went to his people, swaggering [in pride].
trans-unit.target: An dann ass hien fir seng Leit, swaggering [zu Stolz].

trans-unit.source: Woe to you, and woe!
trans-unit.target: Gare Dir, a gare!

trans-unit.source: Then woe to you, and woe!
trans-unit.target: Dunn gare Dir, a gare!

trans-unit.source: Does man think that he will be left neglected?
trans-unit.target: Heescht dass Mann, datt hien vernoléissegt ginn lénks?

trans-unit.source: Had he not been a sperm from semen emitted?
trans-unit.target: Hat hien net e presuméierten aus Buedmantel gesicht ginn?

trans-unit.source: Then he was a clinging clot, and [Allah] created [his form] and proportioned [him]
trans-unit.target: Dunn huet hien eng clinging Bluddung, a [gefroot] geschaf [seng Form] a verschiddenen Etappen [him]

trans-unit.source: And made of him two mates, the male and the female.
trans-unit.target: A vun him zwee weider ausgebaut huet, déi männlech an déi weiblech.

trans-unit.source: Is not that [Creator] Able to give life to the dead?
trans-unit.target: Ass net, datt [Schëpfer] kënnt Liewen un déi Doudeg ze ginn?

trans-unit.source: Has there [not] come upon man a period of time when he was not a thing [even] mentioned?
trans-unit.target: Huet do [net] kommen op Mann enger Zäit, wou hien net eng Saach war [och] geschwaat?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing.
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech Mir hunn Mann aus enger Mëschung presuméierten-Lëscht, datt mir him probéieren kann;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech Mir him un der Manéier proposéiert, gin hien dankbar oder hien dankbar sinn.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt hu mir fir iech Ketten an shackles an engem Feier ëmkomm virbereet.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of Kafur,
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, déi gerecht aus enger Coupe [Wäin] Gedrénks hir Mëschung ass vun Kafur,

trans-unit.source: A spring of which the [righteous] servants of Allah will drink; they will make it gush forth in force [and abundance].
trans-unit.target: A Fréijoer vun deenen der [Gerechten] Beamte vun der Douane drénke ginn;

trans-unit.source: They [are those who] fulfill [their] vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread.
trans-unit.target: Si [sinn déi] erfëllen [hir] Ämter an Angscht engem Day deem Béisen wäert verbreet ginn.

trans-unit.source: And they give food in spite of love for it to the needy, the orphan, and the captive,
trans-unit.target: A si ginn Liewensmëttel trotz Léift fir et un der schlechter, de orphan, an d'Gefaangen,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], "We feed you only for the countenance of Allah. We wish not from you reward or gratitude.
trans-unit.target: [Vergiess], "Mir fidderen dir nëmmen fir d'countenance vun gefroot. Mir wëllen net vun Iech oder Dankbarkeet belounen.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day austere and distressful."
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech Mir Angscht vun eiser Här e Day austere an distressful. "

trans-unit.source: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day and give them radiance and happiness
trans-unit.target: Also si vum Béisen vu dass Day gefroot ginn schützen an hinne Sonnenastralung a glécklech

trans-unit.source: And will reward them for what they patiently endured [with] a garden [in Paradise] and silk [garments].
trans-unit.target: A gëtt hinnen fir Belounung wat se endured Ament [mat] engem Gaart [am Paradise] an Portraite [Gezei].

trans-unit.source: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches. They will not see therein any [burning] sun or [freezing] cold.
trans-unit.target: [Si wäert] reclining Spannungen op léisen ewech.

trans-unit.source: And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance.
trans-unit.target: An der Géigend virun hinnen si hir Nuancen, an hir [Fruucht] ofgeholl ze ginn an Anhale Chaos gin.

trans-unit.source: And there will be circulated among them vessels of silver and cups having been [created] clear [as glass],
trans-unit.target: An et wäert dorënner kritt Sëlwer an Taasen schonn [geschaf] kloer [als Glas] sechs ginn,

trans-unit.source: Clear glasses [made] from silver of which they have determined the measure.
trans-unit.target: Kloer Brëller [feieren] aus Sëlwer vun deem si hunn d'Moossnam alles.

trans-unit.source: And they will be given to drink a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of ginger
trans-unit.target: A si ginn entscheet Coupe [Wäin] ze drénken hir Mëschung vun Ginger ass

trans-unit.source: [From] a fountain within Paradise named Salsabeel.
trans-unit.target: [Vun] engem Fräsch am Paradise genannt Salsabeel.

trans-unit.source: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal. When you see them, you would think them [as beautiful as] scattered pearls.
trans-unit.target: Et gëtt dorënner jonk Jongen huet éiwegt ugebonnen.

trans-unit.source: And when you look there [in Paradise], you will see pleasure and great dominion.
trans-unit.target: A wann Dir do kucken [am Paradise], wäert Dir Spaass a groussen Dominion gesinn.

trans-unit.source: Upon the inhabitants will be green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.
trans-unit.target: Nodems den Awunner gëtt gréng Kleedungsstécker vun Geldstrof Seid an brocade ginn.

trans-unit.source: [And it will be said], "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated."
trans-unit.target: [An et gëtt gesot ginn], "Iwwerhaapt ass dat fir Iech eng Belounung, an Äre Effort gegraff ass."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muhammad], the Qur'an progressively.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, et ass mir déi op Iech geschéckt verwandelt hunn, [O Muhammad], de Koran ofgeléist.

trans-unit.source: So be patient for the decision of your Lord and do not obey from among them a sinner or ungrateful [disbeliever].
trans-unit.target: Also Patient gin fir d'Décisioun vun Äre Här an do weit net aus dorënner ee Sënner oder dankbar [disbeliever].

trans-unit.source: And mention the name of your Lord [in prayer] morning and evening
trans-unit.target: An ernimmen den Numm vun Ärem Här [am Gebiet] moies an owes

trans-unit.source: And during the night prostrate to Him and exalt Him a long [part of the] night.
trans-unit.target: A während der Nuecht Gesiicht ze Him a wëll Him eng laang [Deel vun der] Nuecht.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, these [disbelievers] love the immediate and leave behind them a grave Day.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, dës [iech] Léift der direkter an hannert hinnen eng grave Day verloossen.

trans-unit.source: We have created them and strengthened their forms, and when We will, We can change their likenesses with [complete] alteration.
trans-unit.target: Mir mussen hinnen hunn a verstäerkt hire Formen, a wou mer wäerten, kann mir hir likenesses ännere mat [komplett] Verfall.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is a reminder, so he who wills may take to his Lord a way.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt ass dat drun erënnert, datt hien déi Wills zu sengem Här engem Wee huelen kann.

trans-unit.source: And you do not will except that Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: An Dir wäert net ausser dass gefroot Wills.

trans-unit.source: He admits whom He wills into His mercy; but the wrongdoers - He has prepared for them a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Hien bekannt wiem hien an seng Barmhäerzegkeet Wills;

trans-unit.source: By those [winds] sent forth in gusts
trans-unit.target: Vun deene [bléist] an stiermesch geschéckt erausbréngen

trans-unit.source: And the winds that blow violently
trans-unit.target: An de Wand, dass och e Coup virgespillt

trans-unit.source: And [by] the winds that spread [clouds]
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] de Wand dass hiere [Wolleken]

trans-unit.source: And those [angels] who bring criterion
trans-unit.target: An deene [Engelen], dee Kritär bréngen

trans-unit.source: And those [angels] who deliver a message
trans-unit.target: An deene [Engelen], déi e Message liwweren

trans-unit.source: As justification or warning,
trans-unit.target: Als Begrënnung oder Warnung,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, what you are promised is to occur.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt sinn wat versprach ass ze geschéien.

trans-unit.source: So when the stars are obliterated
trans-unit.target: Also wann d'Stäre sinn obliterated

trans-unit.source: And when the heaven is opened
trans-unit.target: A wann de Himmel ass opgemaach

trans-unit.source: And when the mountains are blown away
trans-unit.target: A wann si dem Bierger geplatzt ewech

trans-unit.source: And when the messengers' time has come...
trans-unit.target: A wann de Vermëttler 'Zäit ass komm ...

trans-unit.source: For what Day was it postponed?
trans-unit.target: Fir wat Day war et ofgesot?

trans-unit.source: For the Day of Judgement.
trans-unit.target: Fir den Dag vun Judgement.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Day of Judgement?
trans-unit.target: An wat kann maachen Dir wësst wat der Day vun Judgement ass?

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Gare, datt Day, fir d'deniers.

trans-unit.source: Did We not destroy the former peoples?
trans-unit.target: Huet mir net de fréieren Populatiounen zerstéieren?

trans-unit.source: Then We will follow them with the later ones.
trans-unit.target: Da wäert Mir verfollegen hinnen mat der spéider erklären.

trans-unit.source: Thus do We deal with the criminals.
trans-unit.target: Sou maachen mer mat der Kriminell këmmeren.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Gare, datt Day, fir d'deniers.

trans-unit.source: Did We not create you from a liquid disdained?
trans-unit.target: Huet Mir schafen Iech net aus engem flësseg disdained?

trans-unit.source: And We placed it in a firm lodging
trans-unit.target: A mir Faarwe et zu enger Firma Betriber

trans-unit.source: For a known extent.
trans-unit.target: Fir e bekannt Mooss.

trans-unit.source: And We determined [it], and excellent [are We] to determine.
trans-unit.target: A mir alles [ass], an excellent [sinn Mir] ze bestëmmen.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Gare, datt Day, fir d'deniers.

trans-unit.source: Have We not made the earth a container
trans-unit.target: Hunn mir net d'Äerd engem Container gemaach

trans-unit.source: Of the living and the dead?
trans-unit.target: Vun der Lieweg an déi Doudeg?

trans-unit.source: And We placed therein lofty, firmly set mountains and have given you to drink sweet water.
trans-unit.target: A mir Faarwe androen iert, onweigerlech Formatioun Bierger an Äeren Dir séiss Waasser ze drénken.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Gare, datt Day, fir d'deniers.

trans-unit.source: [They will be told], "Proceed to that which you used to deny.
trans-unit.target: [Si gëtt gesot ginn], "Fuer datt zu där Dir verleegnen benotzt fir.

trans-unit.source: Proceed to a shadow [of smoke] having three columns
trans-unit.target: Fuer zu engem Stéck [vun Damp] mussen dräi Saile

trans-unit.source: [But having] no cool shade and availing not against the flame."
trans-unit.target: [Mä dass] kee cool Hallefschiet an net géint d'Flam Fusiounen. "

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it throws sparks [as huge] as a fortress,
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, et léisst eskaléiert [als grousse] als Festung,

trans-unit.source: As if they were yellowish [black] camels.
trans-unit.target: Wéi wann si gielzeg [schwaarz] Kaméiler goufen.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Gare, datt Day, fir d'deniers.

trans-unit.source: This is a Day they will not speak,
trans-unit.target: Dëst ass eng Day se net schwätze wäert,

trans-unit.source: Nor will it be permitted for them to make an excuse.
trans-unit.target: Och ass et erlaabt ginn fir hinnen Virwand ze maachen.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Gare, datt Day, fir d'deniers.

trans-unit.source: This is the Day of Judgement; We will have assembled you and the former peoples.
trans-unit.target: Dëst ass den Dag vun Judgement;

trans-unit.source: So if you have a plan, then plan against Me.
trans-unit.target: Also wann Dir e Plang hunn, plangen da géint mech.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Gare, datt Day, fir d'deniers.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be among shades and springs
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech wäert de Gerechten ënner Nuancen an Quell ginn

trans-unit.source: And fruits from whatever they desire,
trans-unit.target: An Uebst aus irgend se Wonsch,

trans-unit.source: [Being told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: [Gesot Well], "an Zefriddenheet iessen an drénken fir wat Dir do benotzt ginn."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech Belounung Mir also d'doers vu gutt.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Gare, datt Day, fir d'deniers.

trans-unit.source: [O disbelievers], eat and enjoy yourselves a little; indeed, you are criminals.
trans-unit.target: [O iech], iessen a genéisst Iech e bëssen;

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Gare, datt Day, fir d'deniers.

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "Bow [in prayer]," they do not bow.
trans-unit.target: A wann et hinne gesot gëtt, "Bow [am Gebiet]," si Wouerechten do net.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Gare, datt Day, fir d'deniers.

trans-unit.source: Then in what statement after the Qur'an will they believe?
trans-unit.target: Dann zu wat Ausso no de Koran gëtt se gleewen?

trans-unit.source: About what are they asking one another?
trans-unit.target: Iwwer wat sinn se eng aner froen?

trans-unit.source: About the great news -
trans-unit.target: Iwwert de groussen Noriichten -

trans-unit.source: That over which they are in disagreement.
trans-unit.target: Datt iwwer déi si an Meenungsverschiddenheet.

trans-unit.source: No! They are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Nee!

trans-unit.source: Then, no! They are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Dann, nee!

trans-unit.source: Have We not made the earth a resting place?
trans-unit.target: Hunn mir net d'Äerd eng Rou Plaz gemaach?

trans-unit.source: And the mountains as stakes?
trans-unit.target: An de Bierger als Kulturministère?

trans-unit.source: And We created you in pairs
trans-unit.target: A Mir hunn iech an Puer

trans-unit.source: And made your sleep [a means for] rest
trans-unit.target: An huet Äre schlofen [e Mëttel fir] Rescht

trans-unit.source: And made the night as clothing
trans-unit.target: An huet d'Nuecht als Kleeder

trans-unit.source: And made the day for livelihood
trans-unit.target: An huet den Dag fir revendiquéieren

trans-unit.source: And constructed above you seven strong [heavens]
trans-unit.target: A virun Iech siwen staark [Himmel] gebaut

trans-unit.source: And made [therein] a burning lamp
trans-unit.target: An huet [androen] e Brennen Sonneluucht

trans-unit.source: And sent down, from the rain clouds, pouring water
trans-unit.target: An geschéckt huet, aus de Reen Wolleken, Waasser Schloreen

trans-unit.source: That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation
trans-unit.target: Datt mir eis erausbréngen vläicht doduerch, zemol an Vegetatioun

trans-unit.source: And gardens of entwined growth.
trans-unit.target: A Gäert vun onternnbar Wuesstem.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is an appointed time -
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech ass den Dag vun Judgement eng Zäit -

trans-unit.source: The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in multitudes
trans-unit.target: D'Day d'Horn ass geplatzt an Dir wäert an ville Leit komm erausbréngen

trans-unit.source: And the heaven is opened and will become gateways
trans-unit.target: An der Himmel ass opgemaach a gëtt Paarten ginn

trans-unit.source: And the mountains are removed and will be [but] a mirage.
trans-unit.target: An de Bierger sinn, goufen a ginn [mä] engem Mirage.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Hell has been lying in wait
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech huet Hell gouf zu wait doruechter

trans-unit.source: For the transgressors, a place of return,
trans-unit.target: Fir d'transgressors, eng Plaatz vun zréck,

trans-unit.source: In which they will remain for ages [unending].
trans-unit.target: An dat wäert si fir Alterskategorien bleiwen [onendlech].

trans-unit.source: They will not taste therein [any] coolness or drink
trans-unit.target: Si gëtt net schmaacht androen [keng] coolness oder drénken

trans-unit.source: Except scalding water and [foul] purulence -
trans-unit.target: Ausser scalding Waasser an [Foul] purulence -

trans-unit.source: An appropriate recompense.
trans-unit.target: Eng adäquat unzerkennen.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they were not expecting an account
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech huet erwaarde se net eng Kont

trans-unit.source: And denied Our verses with [emphatic] denial.
trans-unit.target: An Refusen Eis Verse mat [Englesch] Negatioun.

trans-unit.source: But all things We have enumerated in writing.
trans-unit.target: Mä all Saache Mir hunn schrëftlech enumerated.

trans-unit.source: "So taste [the penalty], and never will We increase you except in torment."
trans-unit.target: "Sou schmaacht [de Strofraum], an ni wäert Mir Erhéijung Dir ausser an éiweg."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, for the righteous is attainment -
trans-unit.target: Zréckzeféieren, fir déi Gerecht ass attainment -

trans-unit.source: Gardens and grapevines
trans-unit.target: Gäert an grapevines

trans-unit.source: And full-breasted [companions] of equal age
trans-unit.target: A voll-breasted [Begleeder] vun der Gläichbehandlung Alter

trans-unit.source: And a full cup.
trans-unit.target: An engem voll Coupe.

trans-unit.source: No ill speech will they hear therein or any falsehood -
trans-unit.target: Nee krank Ried wäert se doran oder all falsehood héieren -

trans-unit.source: [As] reward from your Lord, [a generous] gift [made due by] account,
trans-unit.target: [Als] Belounung vun Äre Lord, [e generéis] Cadeau [gemaach wéinst duerch] Kont,

trans-unit.source: [From] the Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Most Merciful. They possess not from Him [authority for] speech.
trans-unit.target: [Vun] den Här vum Himmel a vun der Äerd, an egal ass tëscht hinnen, déi meescht Verléierer.

trans-unit.source: The Day that the Spirit and the angels will stand in rows, they will not speak except for one whom the Most Merciful permits, and he will say what is correct.
trans-unit.target: D'Day, datt de Geescht an d'Engelen an den Zeile Stand wäert, wäert se ausser net schwätzt fir eng wiem de gréissten Verléierer verkraften, an hie wäert soen, wat richteg ass.

trans-unit.source: That is the True Day; so he who wills may take to his Lord a [way of] return.
trans-unit.target: Dat ass déi richteg Day;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have warned you of a near punishment on the Day when a man will observe what his hands have put forth and the disbeliever will say, "Oh, I wish that I were dust!"
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt hu mir Iech vun enger nächster Strof op der Day gewarnt, wann e Mënsch wäert fest wat seng Hänn erausbréngen säi Virsprong an der disbeliever wäert soen, "Oh, wënschen ech, datt ech décidéiert Stëbs!"

trans-unit.source: By those [angels] who extract with violence
trans-unit.target: Vun deene [Engelen], déi mat Gewalt Extrait

trans-unit.source: And [by] those who remove with ease
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] déi mat Liichtegkeet ewechhuelen

trans-unit.source: And [by] those who glide [as if] swimming
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] déi z [wéi wann] Schwammen

trans-unit.source: And those who race each other in a race
trans-unit.target: An déi, déi all aner zu enger Course Course

trans-unit.source: And those who arrange [each] matter,
trans-unit.target: An déi, déi [all] egal Rendez,

trans-unit.source: On the Day the blast [of the Horn] will convulse [creation],
trans-unit.target: Op der Day wäert Héichuewen [vun der Horn] spektakulärt [Kreatioun],

trans-unit.source: There will follow it the subsequent [one].
trans-unit.target: Do gëtt et der nächster [een] verfollegen.

trans-unit.source: Hearts, that Day, will tremble,
trans-unit.target: Häerz, datt Day, wäert Dovun ofgesinn,

trans-unit.source: Their eyes humbled.
trans-unit.target: Hir Aen geéiert.

trans-unit.source: They are [presently] saying, "Will we indeed be returned to [our] former state [of life]?
trans-unit.target: Si sinn [weideres] gesot, "Gesinn mer jo zu hannescht ginn [eiser] fréiere Staat [vum Liewen]?

trans-unit.source: Even if we should be decayed bones?
trans-unit.target: Och wann mir délabréiert Schanken soll?

trans-unit.source: They say, "That, then, would be a losing return."
trans-unit.target: Si soen, "Dat, dann, e Verléierer Retour géif ginn."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it will be but one shout,
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech ass et awer ee gefaang ginn,

trans-unit.source: And suddenly they will be [alert] upon the earth's surface.
trans-unit.target: An op eemol gëtt si [iwwerrasche] sinn op der Uewerfläch d'Äerd.

trans-unit.source: Has there reached you the story of Moses? -
trans-unit.target: Ass et Iech d'Geschicht vun Moses erreecht?

trans-unit.source: When his Lord called to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa,
trans-unit.target: Wann sengem Här zu him an déi helleg Dall vun Tuwa genannt,

trans-unit.source: "Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed.
trans-unit.target: "Zu Pharaoh Go. Iwwerhaapt, hien transgressed huet.

trans-unit.source: And say to him, 'Would you [be willing to] purify yourself
trans-unit.target: An zu him gesot, "Géif Dir [bereed] selwer wesssen

trans-unit.source: And let me guide you to your Lord so you would fear [Him]?'"
trans-unit.target: A loosse mech Guide Dir op Är Här sou géif Dir [Him] Angscht? ""

trans-unit.source: And he showed him the greatest sign,
trans-unit.target: An hien huet him de gréisste Zeechen,

trans-unit.source: But Pharaoh denied and disobeyed.
trans-unit.target: Mä Pharaoh dementéiert a gefollegt.

trans-unit.source: Then he turned his back, striving.
trans-unit.target: Dunn war hien erëm, Quotefraen.

trans-unit.source: And he gathered [his people] and called out
trans-unit.target: An hien afonnt [seng Leit] a geruff

trans-unit.source: And said, "I am your most exalted lord."
trans-unit.target: A sot, "Ech sinn Äre stäerkste getrennt Här."

trans-unit.source: So Allah seized him in exemplary punishment for the last and the first [transgression].
trans-unit.target: Also Joux gefroot him an exemplaresch Strof fir d'lescht an déi éischt [transgression].

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a warning for whoever would fear [Allah].
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech an dat ass eng Warnung fir wien Angscht géif [gefroot].

trans-unit.source: Are you a more difficult creation or is the heaven? Allah constructed it.
trans-unit.target: Sidd Dir enger méi schwéier Kreatioun oder ass den Himmel?

trans-unit.source: He raised its ceiling and proportioned it.
trans-unit.target: Hien konnten hir Héicht a verschiddenen Etappen ass.

trans-unit.source: And He darkened its night and extracted its brightness.
trans-unit.target: An hien iwwert seng Nuecht a Quecksëlwer seng Hellegkeet.

trans-unit.source: And after that He spread the earth.
trans-unit.target: An der dass Hien verbreet der Äerd.

trans-unit.source: He extracted from it its water and its pasture,
trans-unit.target: Hien ofgebaut aus et seng Waasser an hire Weed,

trans-unit.source: And the mountains He set firmly
trans-unit.target: An de Bierger Hien Formatioun fest

trans-unit.source: As provision for you and your grazing livestock.
trans-unit.target: Als Dispositioun fir Iech an Är endlech Béischten.

trans-unit.source: But when there comes the greatest Overwhelming Calamity -
trans-unit.target: Mä wann et drëm geet de gréisste SPD Calamity -

trans-unit.source: The Day when man will remember that for which he strove,
trans-unit.target: D'Day wann Mann wäert erënneren, datt fir déi hien strove,

trans-unit.source: And Hellfire will be exposed for [all] those who see -
trans-unit.target: An Hellfire gëtt fir [all] déi kucken gin ausgesat -

trans-unit.source: So as for he who transgressed
trans-unit.target: Esou wéi fir hien déi transgressed

trans-unit.source: And preferred the life of the world,
trans-unit.target: An hir Défense konzentréiert fir d'Liewen vun der Welt,

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, Hellfire will be [his] refuge.
trans-unit.target: Dunn Dot, wäert Hellfire ginn [sengem] Thiers.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who feared the position of his Lord and prevented the soul from [unlawful] inclination,
trans-unit.target: Mä wéi fir hien deen gefaart d'Positioun vun sengem Här an dowéinst d'Séil vun [onerlaabt] bewegen,

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, Paradise will be [his] refuge.
trans-unit.target: Dunn Dot, Paradise ginn [sengem] Thiers.

trans-unit.source: They ask you, [O Muhammad], about the Hour: when is its arrival?
trans-unit.target: Si froen Iech, [O Muhammad], iwwert d'Hour: wou ass seng Arrivée?

trans-unit.source: In what [position] are you that you should mention it?
trans-unit.target: An wat [Positioun] sidd Dir, dass Dir sollt et ernimmen?

trans-unit.source: To your Lord is its finality.
trans-unit.target: Fir Är Här ass hir Finalitéit.

trans-unit.source: You are only a warner for those who fear it.
trans-unit.target: Dir sidd just eng Warner fir déi, déi et Angscht.

trans-unit.source: It will be, on the Day they see it, as though they had not remained [in the world] except for an afternoon or a morning thereof.
trans-unit.target: Et wäert, op der Day se gesinn, wéi wann si [an der Welt] net ëmmer haten ausser fir een Nomëtten oder engem Moien stoppen.

trans-unit.source: The Prophet frowned and turned away
trans-unit.target: De Prophet gemaach a war ewech

trans-unit.source: Because there came to him the blind man, [interrupting].
trans-unit.target: Well et zu him de Blannen huet, [liwwert].

trans-unit.source: But what would make you perceive, [O Muhammad], that perhaps he might be purified
trans-unit.target: Mä wat géif maachen Iech zréckkommen, [O Muhammad], datt vläicht kéint hien sidd ginn

trans-unit.source: Or be reminded and the remembrance would benefit him?
trans-unit.target: Oder gin och an der Erënnerungsowend géif him profitéieren?

trans-unit.source: As for he who thinks himself without need,
trans-unit.target: Well fir hien, deen sech ouni brauchen mengt,

trans-unit.source: To him you give attention.
trans-unit.target: Zu him ginn dir Opmierksamkeet.

trans-unit.source: And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified.
trans-unit.target: An net op Dir [gëtt all Virworf] wann hien net stilvoller ginn.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who came to you striving [for knowledge]
trans-unit.target: Mä wéi fir hien, deen un Iech komm Quotefraen [fir Wëssen]

trans-unit.source: While he fears [Allah],
trans-unit.target: Iwwerdeems hien Ängschte [gefroot],

trans-unit.source: From him you are distracted.
trans-unit.target: Vun him sinn dir ofgelenkt.

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, these verses are a reminder;
trans-unit.target: Nee!

trans-unit.source: So whoever wills may remember it.
trans-unit.target: Also Wills wien et erënnere kann.

trans-unit.source: [It is recorded] in honored sheets,
trans-unit.target: zu geéiert Blieder [Et ass opgeholl],

trans-unit.source: Exalted and purified,
trans-unit.target: Getrennt a sidd,

trans-unit.source: [Carried] by the hands of messenger-angels,
trans-unit.target: [Duerchgefouert] vun den Hänn vun Messenger-Engelen,

trans-unit.source: Noble and dutiful.
trans-unit.target: Adel a dutiful.

trans-unit.source: Cursed is man; how disbelieving is he.
trans-unit.target: Verflucht ass Mann;

trans-unit.source: From what substance did He create him?
trans-unit.target: Vu wat Substanz hutt schafen Hien him?

trans-unit.source: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him;
trans-unit.target: Vun engem presuméierten-Lëscht geschaf Hien him an ufanks fir him;

trans-unit.source: Then He eased the way for him;
trans-unit.target: Dunn marquéieren Hien huet de Wee fir him;

trans-unit.source: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him.
trans-unit.target: Dann bewierkt Hien sengem Doud a stellt eng grave fir him.

trans-unit.source: Then when He wills, He will resurrect him.
trans-unit.target: Da wann Hien Wills, gëtt Hien him gegrënnt.

trans-unit.source: No! Man has not yet accomplished what He commanded him.
trans-unit.target: Nee!

trans-unit.source: Then let mankind look at his food -
trans-unit.target: Dunn Mënschheet kucks de Liewensmëttel loossen -

trans-unit.source: How We poured down water in torrents,
trans-unit.target: Wéi Mir parfüméiertem Waasser zu torrents erof,

trans-unit.source: Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts],
trans-unit.target: Dann riicht Mir der Äerd oppen, Trennung [et mat sprouts],

trans-unit.source: And caused to grow within it grain
trans-unit.target: An ëmmer an et Kar ze wuessen

trans-unit.source: And grapes and herbage
trans-unit.target: An Drauwe an herbage

trans-unit.source: And olive and palm trees
trans-unit.target: An Olivenueleg a palm Beem

trans-unit.source: And gardens of dense shrubbery
trans-unit.target: A Gäert vun dichten shrubbery

trans-unit.source: And fruit and grass -
trans-unit.target: An Uebst a ausgerëtscht -

trans-unit.source: [As] enjoyment for you and your grazing livestock.
trans-unit.target: [Als] léifsten fir Iech an Är endlech Béischten.

trans-unit.source: But when there comes the Deafening Blast
trans-unit.target: Mä wann et drëm geet d'Deafening Blast

trans-unit.source: On the Day a man will flee from his brother
trans-unit.target: Op der Day gëtt e Mann aus sengem Brudder fortzelafen

trans-unit.source: And his mother and his father
trans-unit.target: A seng Mamm a säi Papp

trans-unit.source: And his wife and his children,
trans-unit.target: A seng Fra a seng Kanner,

trans-unit.source: For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him.
trans-unit.target: Fir all Mënsch, datt Day, gëtt eng Matière duergeet fir him gin.

trans-unit.source: [Some] faces, that Day, will be bright -
trans-unit.target: [Sou] Gesiichter, datt Day, wäert hell gin -

trans-unit.source: Laughing, rejoicing at good news.
trans-unit.target: Laacht, op gutt Noriichten Jugendlechen.

trans-unit.source: And [other] faces, that Day, will have upon them dust.
trans-unit.target: An [anere] Gesiichter, datt Day, wäert Stëbs op si hunn.

trans-unit.source: Blackness will cover them.
trans-unit.target: Blackness gëtt hinnen Cover.

trans-unit.source: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones.
trans-unit.target: Déi sinn iech, déi Schlecht gelackelt.

trans-unit.source: When the sun is wrapped up [in darkness]
trans-unit.target: Wéi ass d'Sonn awéckelen [am Däischteren]

trans-unit.source: And when the stars fall, dispersing,
trans-unit.target: A wann de Stäre falen, ufänken,

trans-unit.source: And when the mountains are removed
trans-unit.target: A wann de Bierger wechgeholl

trans-unit.source: And when full-term she-camels are neglected
trans-unit.target: A wann voll-Begrëff hatt-Kaméiler sinn vernoléissegt

trans-unit.source: And when the wild beasts are gathered
trans-unit.target: A wann der wëllt Béischt sinn afonnt

trans-unit.source: And when the seas are filled with flame
trans-unit.target: A wann de Mierer sinn mat Flam gefëllt

trans-unit.source: And when the souls are paired
trans-unit.target: A wann de Séilen sinn vläit

trans-unit.source: And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked
trans-unit.target: An wann der Meedchen [deen war] lieweg begruewen ass gefrot

trans-unit.source: For what sin she was killed
trans-unit.target: Fir wat Sënn war si ëmbruecht

trans-unit.source: And when the pages are made public
trans-unit.target: A wann de Säite sinn feieren ëffentlechen

trans-unit.source: And when the sky is stripped away
trans-unit.target: A wou ass den Himmel ewechgeholl ewech

trans-unit.source: And when Hellfire is set ablaze
trans-unit.target: A wann Hellfire konfiguréiert Brand

trans-unit.source: And when Paradise is brought near,
trans-unit.target: A wann Paradise ass wäit bruecht,

trans-unit.source: A soul will [then] know what it has brought [with it].
trans-unit.target: Eng Séil [dann] wësst wat et ass bruecht [mat se].

trans-unit.source: So I swear by the retreating stars -
trans-unit.target: Sou schwieren ech vun der ofzesetzen Stären -

trans-unit.source: Those that run [their courses] and disappear -
trans-unit.target: Déi lafen [hir Coursen] a verschwannen -

trans-unit.source: And by the night as it closes in
trans-unit.target: A vun der Nuecht wéi et mécht an

trans-unit.source: And by the dawn when it breathes
trans-unit.target: A vun der Dämmerung wann et otemt

trans-unit.source: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is a word [conveyed by] a noble messenger
trans-unit.target: [Dat] Dot, ass de Koran e Wuert enger Adel Messenger [vun verbreet]

trans-unit.source: [Who is] possessed of power and with the Owner of the Throne, secure [in position],
trans-unit.target: [Wien ass] vu Muecht haten an mat der Proprietaire vun den Troun, sécher [zu Positioun],

trans-unit.source: Obeyed there [in the heavens] and trustworthy.
trans-unit.target: Awer do [am Himmel] an vertrauenswierdeg.

trans-unit.source: And your companion is not [at all] mad.
trans-unit.target: An Äre Begleeder ass net [bei all] rosen.

trans-unit.source: And he has already seen Gabriel in the clear horizon.
trans-unit.target: An hien huet schon Gabriel an der kloer Stadion gesinn.

trans-unit.source: And Muhammad is not a withholder of [knowledge of] the unseen.
trans-unit.target: An Muhammad ass net eng withholder vun [Wëssen] der Gewerkschaft.

trans-unit.source: And the Qur'an is not the word of a devil, expelled [from the heavens].
trans-unit.target: An de Koran ass net d'Wuert vun engem Däiwel, verdriwwen [aus dem Himmel].

trans-unit.source: So where are you going?
trans-unit.target: Also wuer gees du?

trans-unit.source: It is not except a reminder to the worlds
trans-unit.target: Et ass net drun erënnert un de Welten ausser

trans-unit.source: For whoever wills among you to take a right course.
trans-unit.target: Fir wien ënnert Dir Wills e Recht natierlech ze huelen.

trans-unit.source: And you do not will except that Allah wills - Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: An Dir wäert net ausser dass gefroot Wills - Här vun de Welten.

trans-unit.source: When the sky breaks apart
trans-unit.target: Wann den Himmel Break ausser

trans-unit.source: And when the stars fall, scattering,
trans-unit.target: A wann de Stäre falen, Effekt,

trans-unit.source: And when the seas are erupted
trans-unit.target: A wann de Mierer sinn ausgebrach

trans-unit.source: And when the [contents of] graves are scattered,
trans-unit.target: A wann de [Inhalter vun] Griewer sinn Streeung,

trans-unit.source: A soul will [then] know what it has put forth and kept back.
trans-unit.target: Eng Séil [dann] wësst wat et verlaangen no huet an de Réck.

trans-unit.source: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous,
trans-unit.target: O Mënschheet, wat huet verfouert Iech iwwer Är Lord, déi generéis,

trans-unit.source: Who created you, proportioned you, and balanced you?
trans-unit.target: Wien hunn Iech, Etappen Iech, an Dir equilibréiert?

trans-unit.source: In whatever form He willed has He assembled you.
trans-unit.target: An egal Form hierkënnt Hien huet Dir Hien versammelt.

trans-unit.source: No! But you deny the Recompense.
trans-unit.target: Nee!

trans-unit.source: And indeed, [appointed] over you are keepers,
trans-unit.target: An jo, [Mandat] iwwer Dir Goalkeeperen sinn,

trans-unit.source: Noble and recording;
trans-unit.target: Adel an opzehuelen;

trans-unit.source: They know whatever you do.
trans-unit.target: Si wëssen, wat Dir maacht.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure,
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, déi gerecht an de Pleséier ginn,

trans-unit.source: And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: An jo, wäert de béisen an Hellfire ginn.

trans-unit.source: They will [enter to] burn therein on the Day of Recompense,
trans-unit.target: Si wäert [gitt zu] verbrennen Spannungen op der Day vun unzerkennen,

trans-unit.source: And never therefrom will they be absent.
trans-unit.target: An ni therefrom wäert si veréiert gin.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?
trans-unit.target: An wat kann maachen Dir wësst wat der Day vun unzerkennen ass?

trans-unit.source: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?
trans-unit.target: Dann, wat kënnt Dir wësst maachen wat der Day vun unzerkennen ass?

trans-unit.source: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing; and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with Allah.
trans-unit.target: Et ass den Dag wou eng Séil net fir aner Séil Besëtz vun enger Saach [Muecht ze maachen];

trans-unit.source: Woe to those who give less [than due],
trans-unit.target: Gare zu deenen, déi manner ginn [wéi wéinst],

trans-unit.source: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.
trans-unit.target: Wien, wéini se eng Moossnam vu Leit huelen, huelen zu voll.

trans-unit.source: But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss.
trans-unit.target: Mä wann si vun Moossnam oder vum Gewiicht hinne ginn, si féieren Verloscht.

trans-unit.source: Do they not think that they will be resurrected
trans-unit.target: Denkt se net dass se geruff ginn

trans-unit.source: For a tremendous Day -
trans-unit.target: Fir en enorme Day -

trans-unit.source: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds?
trans-unit.target: Den Daag wou ganzer Mënschheet virun den Här vun der Welten Stand wäert?

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen.
trans-unit.target: Nee!

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is sijjeen?
trans-unit.target: An wat kann Dir wësst maachen wat ass sijjeen?

trans-unit.source: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed.
trans-unit.target: Et ass [hir Destinatioun an opgeholl] engem Register Musekschoul.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers,
trans-unit.target: Gare, datt Day, fir d'deniers,

trans-unit.source: Who deny the Day of Recompense.
trans-unit.target: Wien verkennen den Dag vun unzerkennen.

trans-unit.source: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor.
trans-unit.target: An keen et ausser all begi transgressor verleegnen.

trans-unit.source: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."
trans-unit.target: Wann Eis Verse fir him recited ginn, seet hien, "Legends vun der fréierer Populatiounen."

trans-unit.source: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.
trans-unit.target: Nee!

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned.
trans-unit.target: Nee!

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Dunn Dot, wäert si [gitt a] verbrennen an Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny."
trans-unit.target: Da gëtt et gesot ginn [hinnen], "Dat ass dat, wat s du alles ofstreide benotzt ginn."

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun.
trans-unit.target: Nee!

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun?
trans-unit.target: An wat kann Dir wësst maachen wat ass "illiyyun?

trans-unit.source: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed
trans-unit.target: Et ass [hir Destinatioun opgeholl zu] engem Register Musekschoul

trans-unit.source: Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Wat ass vun deenen matbruecht bei [zu gefroot] Zeien.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech wäert de Gerechten zu Freed ginn

trans-unit.source: On adorned couches, observing.
trans-unit.target: Op léisen ewech, observéieren.

trans-unit.source: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure.
trans-unit.target: Dir wäert an hir Gesiichter d'Sonnenastralung vu Freed unerkennen.

trans-unit.source: They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.
trans-unit.target: Si ginn un drénken [reng] Wäin kritt [wat war] versiegelt.

trans-unit.source: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.
trans-unit.target: Déi lescht vun et ass Musk.

trans-unit.source: And its mixture is of Tasneem,
trans-unit.target: An hirer Mëschung ass vun Tasneem,

trans-unit.source: A spring from which those near [to Allah] drink.
trans-unit.target: A Fréijoer aus deenen déi bei [zu gefroot] drénken.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, déi deenen, déi Verbrieche engagéiert bei deenen ze laachen, déi gegleeft.

trans-unit.source: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances.
trans-unit.target: A wann se vun hinne vergaangen, géif se derisive Meenungen austauschen.

trans-unit.source: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting.
trans-unit.target: An wann se un hir Leit zréck, géifen se jesting zréck.

trans-unit.source: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."
trans-unit.target: An wann se se gesinn, géifen se soen, "zréckzeféieren, déi wierklech verluer ginn."

trans-unit.source: But they had not been sent as guardians over them.
trans-unit.target: Mä si haten net den Dépositaire iwwer hinnen geschéckt.

trans-unit.source: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,
trans-unit.target: Also Haut deenen déi mengen si bei iech laachen,

trans-unit.source: On adorned couches, observing.
trans-unit.target: Op léisen ewech, observéieren.

trans-unit.source: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do?
trans-unit.target: Hutt der iech [net] belount ginn [dëser Day] fir wat se do vun Ufank un?

trans-unit.source: When the sky has split [open]
trans-unit.target: Wann den Himmel gespléckt huet [oppen]

trans-unit.source: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]
trans-unit.target: An huet zu senge Här Etzella an obligatoresch [ze maachen]

trans-unit.source: And when the earth has been extended
trans-unit.target: An wann der Äerd verlängert gouf

trans-unit.source: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]
trans-unit.target: An huet Goss aus, datt bannent et an relinquished [ass]

trans-unit.source: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so] -
trans-unit.target: An huet zu senge Här Etzella an obligatoresch [ze maachen] -

trans-unit.source: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.
trans-unit.target: O Fräiheet, jo dir sidd laboring Richtung Är Här mat [super] fréi a wäert et treffen.

trans-unit.source: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,
trans-unit.target: Dann och fir hien, deen säi Rekord zu sengem Recht awer entscheet gëtt,

trans-unit.source: He will be judged with an easy account
trans-unit.target: Hie gëtt mat engem einfach Kont scho ginn

trans-unit.source: And return to his people in happiness.
trans-unit.target: An zréck op seng Leit zu glécklech.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,
trans-unit.target: Mä wéi fir hien, deen säi Rekord hannert sengem Réck geluecht gëtt,

trans-unit.source: He will cry out for destruction
trans-unit.target: Hie wäert kräischen eraus fir Zerstéierung

trans-unit.source: And [enter to] burn in a Blaze.
trans-unit.target: An [gitt zu] an engem Tempo verbrennen.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt hat hien [eemol] zu glécklech ënnert seng Leit ginn;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, déi hien gemengt huet hien ni [zu gefroot] Retour géif.

trans-unit.source: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Mee jo!

trans-unit.source: So I swear by the twilight glow
trans-unit.target: Also Ech schwieren vun der Dämmerung Liichtebengel

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night and what it envelops
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] der Nuecht a wat et envelops

trans-unit.source: And [by] the moon when it becomes full
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] de Mound wann et lo voll

trans-unit.source: [That] you will surely experience state after state.
trans-unit.target: [Dat] Dir wäert Staat an der Staat Erfahrung.

trans-unit.source: So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe,
trans-unit.target: Also, wat ass [der Matière] mat hinnen [datt] si gleewen net,

trans-unit.source: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allah]?
trans-unit.target: A wann de Koran hinnen recited ass, si maachen Gesiicht net [zu gefroot]?

trans-unit.source: But those who have disbelieved deny,
trans-unit.target: Mä déi, déi hunn disbelieved verleegnen,

trans-unit.source: And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.
trans-unit.target: An gefroot ass déi wëssen vu wat si bannent selwer halen.

trans-unit.source: So give them tidings of a painful punishment,
trans-unit.target: Also ginn se Noriicht vun engem batteren Strof,

trans-unit.source: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.
trans-unit.target: Ausser fir déi, déi gleewen an do Gerechten mierks.

trans-unit.source: By the sky containing great stars
trans-unit.target: Vum Himmel mat super Stären

trans-unit.source: And [by] the promised Day
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] de versprach Day

trans-unit.source: And [by] the witness and what is witnessed,
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] den Zeien a wat ass Zeien,

trans-unit.source: Cursed were the companions of the trench
trans-unit.target: Verflucht huet de Begleeder vun der Trenchcoat

trans-unit.source: [Containing] the fire full of fuel,
trans-unit.target: [Wouvun] d'Feier voller Bensin,

trans-unit.source: When they were sitting near it
trans-unit.target: Wann se sech nieft et sëtzt

trans-unit.source: And they, to what they were doing against the believers, were witnesses.
trans-unit.target: An si, wat si géint d'Gleeweger mécht waren, goufen Zeien.

trans-unit.source: And they resented them not except because they believed in Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy,
trans-unit.target: A se net verquëssen hinnen net ausser well si Mënze gegleeft, déi getrennt am Mee, de luewenswert,

trans-unit.source: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, over all things, is Witness.
trans-unit.target: Wiem gehéiert de Beräich vun den Himmel an d'Äerd.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, déi der Iwwerzeegung Männer a gleef Fraen gefoltert hun an hun dann net repented gëtt d'Strof vun Hell hunn, a si wäert d'Strof vun der Burning Fire hunn.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech wäert déi gegleeft hunn a gemaach Gerechten mierks hunn Gäert ënnert deem Flëss stréimen.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe.
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech ass d'rauer vun Äre Här schwéieren.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, et ass hien, deen [Kreatioun] an Widerhuelung originates.

trans-unit.source: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate,
trans-unit.target: An Hien ass de verzeien, déi e,

trans-unit.source: Honorable Owner of the Throne,
trans-unit.target: Prominent Proprietaire vun den Troun,

trans-unit.source: Effecter of what He intends.
trans-unit.target: Effecter vu wat hie wëlles.

trans-unit.source: Has there reached you the story of the soldiers -
trans-unit.target: Ass et Iech d'Geschicht vun den Zaldoten erreecht -

trans-unit.source: [Those of] Pharaoh and Thamud?
trans-unit.target: [Déi vun] Pharaoh an Thamud?

trans-unit.source: But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial,
trans-unit.target: Mä si déi disbelieve sinn zu [bestänneg] Negatioun,

trans-unit.source: While Allah encompasses them from behind.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerdeems gefroot Krankheeten hinnen aus der.

trans-unit.source: But this is an honored Qur'an
trans-unit.target: Mä dat ass eng geéiert Koran

trans-unit.source: [Inscribed] in a Preserved Slate.
trans-unit.target: [Musekschoul] an engem agekacht Slate.

trans-unit.source: By the sky and the night comer -
trans-unit.target: Vum Himmel an der Nuecht Eckkolonne -

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the night comer?
trans-unit.target: An wat kann Dir wësst maachen, wat ass d'Nuecht Eckkolonne?

trans-unit.source: It is the piercing star -
trans-unit.target: Et ass d'Ennpunkte Stär -

trans-unit.source: There is no soul but that it has over it a protector.
trans-unit.target: Et gëtt keng Séil mä datt et nach iwwer e Protecteur.

trans-unit.source: So let man observe from what he was created.
trans-unit.target: Also loosse Mann Observatioun vu wat hie geschaf huet.

trans-unit.source: He was created from a fluid, ejected,
trans-unit.target: Hie war aus enger Flesseggassystem geschaf, ausgestouss,

trans-unit.source: Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs.
trans-unit.target: Enstanen tëscht de Pilier an de Pelikan.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah, to return him [to life], is Able.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, gefroot, him ze Retour [ze Liewen], kann.

trans-unit.source: The Day when secrets will be put on trial,
trans-unit.target: Den Daag wou Geheimnisser gëtt op Prozess no ginn,

trans-unit.source: Then man will have no power or any helper.
trans-unit.target: Da wäert Mann keng Muecht oder all Mathëllef hunn.

trans-unit.source: By the sky which returns [rain]
trans-unit.target: Vum Himmel déi preparéieren [Reen]

trans-unit.source: And [by] the earth which cracks open,
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] der Äerd déi Splécken oppen,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement,
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech ass de Koran eng decisif Ausso,

trans-unit.source: And it is not amusement.
trans-unit.target: An et ass net Amusement.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they are planning a plan,
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt sinn Planung si e Plang,

trans-unit.source: But I am planning a plan.
trans-unit.target: Mä ech vir eng plangen.

trans-unit.source: So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile.
trans-unit.target: Also Zäit fir iech erlaben.

trans-unit.source: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,
trans-unit.target: Wëll de Numm vun ären Här, Héchste,

trans-unit.source: Who created and proportioned
trans-unit.target: Wien hunn a verschiddenen Etappen

trans-unit.source: And who destined and [then] guided
trans-unit.target: An déi Douanieren an [dann] orientéiert

trans-unit.source: And who brings out the pasture
trans-unit.target: An deen d'Weed bréngt aus

trans-unit.source: And [then] makes it black stubble.
trans-unit.target: An [dann] mécht et schwaarz stubble.

trans-unit.source: We will make you recite, [O Muhammad], and you will not forget,
trans-unit.target: Mir maachen Ierch och vu sech, [O Muhammad], an dir wäert net vergiessen,

trans-unit.source: Except what Allah should will. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden.
trans-unit.target: Ausser wat gefroot ginn soll.

trans-unit.source: And We will ease you toward ease.
trans-unit.target: A mir wäerten Iech Richtung bescheed bescheed.

trans-unit.source: So remind, if the reminder should benefit;
trans-unit.target: Also erënneren, wann der drun Virdeel soll;

trans-unit.source: He who fears [Allah] will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: Hien huet déi Ängschte [gefroot] ginn drun erënnert.

trans-unit.source: But the wretched one will avoid it -
trans-unit.target: Mä d'erbäermlech een et vermeiden -

trans-unit.source: [He] who will [enter and] burn in the greatest Fire,
trans-unit.target: [Hien] wéen [gitt a] verbrennt an der gréisstméiglecher Fire,

trans-unit.source: Neither dying therein nor living.
trans-unit.target: Weder Stierwen androen nach lieft.

trans-unit.source: He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself
trans-unit.target: Hien huet et fäerdeg sëcherlech déi selwer purifizéiert

trans-unit.source: And mentions the name of his Lord and prays.
trans-unit.target: A schreift de Numm vun sengem Här a schéin di Zäit.

trans-unit.source: But you prefer the worldly life,
trans-unit.target: Mä Dir léiwer de weltlechen Liewen,

trans-unit.source: While the Hereafter is better and more enduring.
trans-unit.target: Während der verdéngt ass besser a méi gesäit Grenzen.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is in the former scriptures,
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt ass dat an der fréierer Schrëften,

trans-unit.source: The scriptures of Abraham and Moses.
trans-unit.target: D'Schrëften vum Abraham an Moses.

trans-unit.source: Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]?
trans-unit.target: Ass et Iech de Rapport vun der SPD [event] erreecht?

trans-unit.source: [Some] faces, that Day, will be humbled,
trans-unit.target: [Sou] Gesiichter, datt Day, gëtt geéiert ginn,

trans-unit.source: Working [hard] and exhausted.
trans-unit.target: Schaffen [schwéier] a verbraucht.

trans-unit.source: They will [enter to] burn in an intensely hot Fire.
trans-unit.target: Si wäert [gitt zu] an eng schwéier waarm Fire verbrennen.

trans-unit.source: They will be given drink from a boiling spring.
trans-unit.target: Si wäert aus engem Eeërbecher Fréijoer entscheet drénke ginn.

trans-unit.source: For them there will be no food except from a poisonous, thorny plant
trans-unit.target: Fir si gëtt et keng Liewensmëttel gin ausser vun engem gëfteg, thorny Planz

trans-unit.source: Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger.
trans-unit.target: Wat weder nourishes nach avails géint den Honger.

trans-unit.source: [Other] faces, that Day, will show pleasure.
trans-unit.target: [Aner] Gesiichter, datt Day, Freed weise wäert.

trans-unit.source: With their effort [they are] satisfied
trans-unit.target: Mat hiren Effort [si] zefridden

trans-unit.source: In an elevated garden,
trans-unit.target: An en nik Gaart,

trans-unit.source: Wherein they will hear no unsuitable speech.
trans-unit.target: Hellef se gëtt kee zweifelhaftem Ried héieren.

trans-unit.source: Within it is a flowing spring.
trans-unit.target: An et ass e leeft Fréijoer.

trans-unit.source: Within it are couches raised high
trans-unit.target: An et sinn ewech opgewuess héich

trans-unit.source: And cups put in place
trans-unit.target: An Taasen am Plaz no

trans-unit.source: And cushions lined up
trans-unit.target: An Këssen géinteneen ugetrueden

trans-unit.source: And carpets spread around.
trans-unit.target: An Teppecher verbreet ronderëm.

trans-unit.source: Then do they not look at the camels - how they are created?
trans-unit.target: Dann do kucken se net op d'Kaméiler - wéi si geschaf ginn?

trans-unit.source: And at the sky - how it is raised?
trans-unit.target: An um Himmel - wéi ass et erwächt?

trans-unit.source: And at the mountains - how they are erected?
trans-unit.target: An um Bierger - wéi se opgestallt ginn?

trans-unit.source: And at the earth - how it is spread out?
trans-unit.target: An op der Äerd - wéi et ass héhé?

trans-unit.source: So remind, [O Muhammad]; you are only a reminder.
trans-unit.target: Also erënneren, [O Muhammad];

trans-unit.source: You are not over them a controller.
trans-unit.target: Dir sidd net iwwert si eng ziemlech.

trans-unit.source: However, he who turns away and disbelieves -
trans-unit.target: hien awer, déi sech ëmdréit ewech an disbelieves -

trans-unit.source: Then Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment.
trans-unit.target: Da gëtt gefroot bestrofen him mat der gréisst Strof.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, to Us is their return.
trans-unit.target: Zréckzeféieren, fir eis ass hire Retour.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, upon Us is their account.
trans-unit.target: Dunn Dot, oblige ass hire Kont.

trans-unit.source: By the dawn
trans-unit.target: Vum Sonnenopgang

trans-unit.source: And [by] ten nights
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] ten Nuechte

trans-unit.source: And [by] the even [number] and the odd
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] der souguer [Zuel] an de Risiko

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it passes,
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] der Nuecht wann et Zack,

trans-unit.source: Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception?
trans-unit.target: Ass et [net] zu [all] datt en Eed [genuch] fir eng vun Perceptioun?

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with 'Aad -
trans-unit.target: Hutt Dir net iwwerluecht wéi Är Här mat "vunda erfollegen -

trans-unit.source: [With] Iram - who had lofty pillars,
trans-unit.target: [Mat] Iram - deen iert Seilen hat,

trans-unit.source: The likes of whom had never been created in the land?
trans-unit.target: Déi gär vun deenen ni am Land geschaf ginn?

trans-unit.source: And [with] Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley?
trans-unit.target: An [mat] Thamud, déi de Fielsen zu Dall geschnëtzt aus?

trans-unit.source: And [with] Pharaoh, owner of the stakes? -
trans-unit.target: An [mat] Pharaoh, Besëtzer vun de Kulturministère?

trans-unit.source: [All of] whom oppressed within the lands
trans-unit.target: [All vun] deen an der Lännereien Uspréch

trans-unit.source: And increased therein the corruption.
trans-unit.target: An doran d'Korruptioun fräi.

trans-unit.source: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.
trans-unit.target: Also Är Här dann op se eng Plo vun der Strof.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord is in observation.
trans-unit.target: Tatsächlech Är Här ass an Observatiounsrichtung.

trans-unit.source: And as for man, when his Lord tries him and [thus] is generous to him and favors him, he says, "My Lord has honored me."
trans-unit.target: A wéi fir de Mënsch, wann hien Här probéiert him an [also] ass generéis zu him a favoriséiert him, seet hien, "My Lord mech geéiert huet."

trans-unit.source: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me."
trans-unit.target: Mä wann hien probéiert him an din seng Dispositioun, seet hien, "My Lord mech dem Kapp huet."

trans-unit.source: No! But you do not honor the orphan
trans-unit.target: Nee!

trans-unit.source: And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor.
trans-unit.target: An Dir do encouragéieren net een aneren den aarm ze fidderen.

trans-unit.source: And you consume inheritance, devouring [it] altogether,
trans-unit.target: An Dir konsuméiere Ierfschaft, Verschléngen [ass] ofzeschafen,

trans-unit.source: And you love wealth with immense love.
trans-unit.target: An Dir Léift Räichtum mat Nol Léift.

trans-unit.source: No! When the earth has been leveled - pounded and crushed -
trans-unit.target: Nee!

trans-unit.source: And your Lord has come and the angels, rank upon rank,
trans-unit.target: An Äre Här ass komm, an den Engelen, zielen op Platz,

trans-unit.source: And brought [within view], that Day, is Hell - that Day, man will remember, but what good to him will be the remembrance?
trans-unit.target: An bruecht [bannent Vue], datt Day, ass Hell - datt Day, Mann wäert erënneren, mee wat gutt fir hien ass de Erënnerungsowend ginn?

trans-unit.source: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead [some good] for my life."
trans-unit.target: Hie wäert soen, "Oh, ech wënschen ech viraus [puer gutt] geschéckt hat fir mäi Liewen."

trans-unit.source: So on that Day, none will punish [as severely] as His punishment,
trans-unit.target: Also op deem Dag, keent gëtt bestroft [esou streng] als Seng Strof,

trans-unit.source: And none will bind [as severely] as His binding [of the evildoers].
trans-unit.target: An keen wäert festleeën [esou streng] als Seng [vun der evildoers] obligatoresch.

trans-unit.source: [To the righteous it will be said], "O reassured soul,
trans-unit.target: [Fir déi Gerecht ass et gesot ginn], "O berouegt Séil,

trans-unit.source: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him],
trans-unit.target: Zeréck un Är Lord, gutt-frou an lackeleg [zu Him],

trans-unit.source: And enter among My [righteous] servants
trans-unit.target: A gitt ënnert Meng [Gerechten] Dénger

trans-unit.source: And enter My Paradise."
trans-unit.target: An Meng Paradise gitt. "

trans-unit.source: I swear by this city, Makkah -
trans-unit.target: Ech schwieren vun dëser Stad, Makkah -

trans-unit.source: And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city -
trans-unit.target: An Dir, [O Muhammad], si gratis vun Restriktioun an dëser Stad -

trans-unit.source: And [by] the father and that which was born [of him],
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] de Papp an déi gebuer gouf [vun him],

trans-unit.source: We have certainly created man into hardship.
trans-unit.target: Mir hu sécherlech Mann an nuren geschaf.

trans-unit.source: Does he think that never will anyone overcome him?
trans-unit.target: Heescht, dass hien dass jiddereen ni him iwwerwonne ginn?

trans-unit.source: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."
trans-unit.target: Hien seet, "ech Räichtum am Iwwerfloss verbruecht hunn."

trans-unit.source: Does he think that no one has seen him?
trans-unit.target: Heescht, dass hien dass keen him gesinn huet?

trans-unit.source: Have We not made for him two eyes?
trans-unit.target: Hunn mir net fir him zwee Aen huet?

trans-unit.source: And a tongue and two lips?
trans-unit.target: An engem Zong an zwee ufänken?

trans-unit.source: And have shown him the two ways?
trans-unit.target: An hunn him déi zwee Weeër gewisen?

trans-unit.source: But he has not broken through the difficult pass.
trans-unit.target: Mä hien huet net duerch déi schwéier Ugrëff gebrach.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?
trans-unit.target: An wat kann Dir wësst maachen wat ass [getraff duerch] déi schwéier Ugrëff?

trans-unit.source: It is the freeing of a slave
trans-unit.target: Dat ass de befreiende vun engem Prophéit

trans-unit.source: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger
trans-unit.target: Oder erofzesetzen op engem Dag vun schwéieren Honger

trans-unit.source: An orphan of near relationship
trans-unit.target: An orphan vun nächster Relatioun

trans-unit.source: Or a needy person in misery
trans-unit.target: Oder enger schlechter Persoun am Ongléck

trans-unit.source: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion.
trans-unit.target: An dann ënnert deene Wiesen, déi gegleeft an ugeroden een aneren ze Gedold an ugeroden een aneren ze Matgefill.

trans-unit.source: Those are the companions of the right.
trans-unit.target: Deene sinn der Begleeder vun der Recht.

trans-unit.source: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left.
trans-unit.target: Mä si disbelieved deen zu Eis Unzeeche - déi sinn d'Kollegen vun der lénker Säit.

trans-unit.source: Over them will be fire closed in.
trans-unit.target: Während se ginn Feier zougemaach an.

trans-unit.source: By the sun and its brightness
trans-unit.target: Vun der Sonn an hirer Hellegkeet

trans-unit.source: And [by] the moon when it follows it
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] de Mound wann et villméi

trans-unit.source: And [by] the day when it displays it
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] den Dag wou et weist et

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it covers it
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] der Nuecht wann et deckt se

trans-unit.source: And [by] the sky and He who constructed it
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] Himmel an hien deen et gebaut

trans-unit.source: And [by] the earth and He who spread it
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] der Äerd an hien deen et verbreet

trans-unit.source: And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] der Séil an hien deen et Etappen

trans-unit.source: And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,
trans-unit.target: An inspiréiert et [mat Niveau erof vun] seng méindes a seng Éierlechkeet,

trans-unit.source: He has succeeded who purifies it,
trans-unit.target: Hien huet et fäerdeg deen purifizéiert et,

trans-unit.source: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].
trans-unit.target: An hien huet dunn déi et instills [mat Korruptioun].

trans-unit.source: Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,
trans-unit.target: Thamud dementéiert [hir Prophéit] duerch Grond vun hirer transgression,

trans-unit.source: When the most wretched of them was sent forth.
trans-unit.target: Wann déi erbäermlech vun hinne gouf geschéckt erausbréngen.

trans-unit.source: And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."
trans-unit.target: An der Messenger vun gefroot [Salih] sot zu hinnen: "[wees schueden net] déi hatt-Kaméil vun gefroot oder [verhënneren hirem aus] hirem drénken."

trans-unit.source: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].
trans-unit.target: Mä si refuséieren him an hamstrung hir.

trans-unit.source: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.
trans-unit.target: An hien net d'Konsequenz Angscht stoppen.

trans-unit.source: By the night when it covers
trans-unit.target: Vun der Nuecht wann et nëmme

trans-unit.source: And [by] the day when it appears
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] den Dag wou et schéngt

trans-unit.source: And [by] He who created the male and female,
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] Hien deen ugeluecht d'männlech a weiblech,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your efforts are diverse.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt sinn Äre Efforten Objeten.

trans-unit.source: As for he who gives and fears Allah
trans-unit.target: Well fir hien dee gëtt an Ängschte gefroot

trans-unit.source: And believes in the best [reward],
trans-unit.target: An un déi bescht [Belounung],

trans-unit.source: We will ease him toward ease.
trans-unit.target: Mir ginn him Richtung bescheed bescheed.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need
trans-unit.target: Mä wéi fir hien déi withholds an méngt sech fräi vun brauchen

trans-unit.source: And denies the best [reward],
trans-unit.target: An dassen déi bescht [Belounung],

trans-unit.source: We will ease him toward difficulty.
trans-unit.target: Mir ginn him Richtung Schwieregkeeten bescheed.

trans-unit.source: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?
trans-unit.target: A wat gëtt sengem Räichtum him Länner och wann hie schléift?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, [incumbent] upon Us is guidance.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, [Ugekloten] oblige ass derwäert.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, to Us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].
trans-unit.target: An zwar, fir eis gehéiert d'verdéngt an den éischte [Liewen].

trans-unit.source: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing.
trans-unit.target: Also hunn ech dech vun engem Fire ermëttelt deen ass Hierzer.

trans-unit.source: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one.
trans-unit.target: Keen gëtt [gitt zu] androen ausser déi erbäermlech ee verbrennen.

trans-unit.source: Who had denied and turned away.
trans-unit.target: Wien huet dementéiert a war ewech.

trans-unit.source: But the righteous one will avoid it -
trans-unit.target: Gerecht awer ee wäert et verhënneren -

trans-unit.source: [He] who gives [from] his wealth to purify himself
trans-unit.target: [Hien] déi gëtt [aus] sengem Räichtum selwer wesssen

trans-unit.source: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded
trans-unit.target: An net [Féierung] fir jiddereen deen [gemaach him] huet en zugonschte belount gin

trans-unit.source: But only seeking the countenance of his Lord, Most High.
trans-unit.target: Mee engagéiert just d'countenance vu sengem Här, Héchste.

trans-unit.source: And he is going to be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: An hien ass elo zefridden ze ginn.

trans-unit.source: By the morning brightness
trans-unit.target: Vun de Moien Hellegkeet

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it covers with darkness,
trans-unit.target: An [duerch] der Nuecht wann et mat der Däischtert deckt,

trans-unit.source: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, [O Muhammad], nor has He detested [you].
trans-unit.target: Är Här huet net verlooss vun dir geholl, [O Muhammad], nach huet hien detested [s].

trans-unit.source: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].
trans-unit.target: An der verdéngt ass besser fir Iech wéi déi éischt [Liewen].

trans-unit.source: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: An Äre Här ass Wäerts ginn, an Dir wäert zefridde sinn.

trans-unit.source: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge?
trans-unit.target: Huet hien Iech net eng orphan fannen eraginn [s] Thiers?

trans-unit.source: And He found you lost and guided [you],
trans-unit.target: An hien fonnt Dir verluer a guidéiert [s],

trans-unit.source: And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient.
trans-unit.target: An hien fonnt dir aarm an huet [s] Self-duer.

trans-unit.source: So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him].
trans-unit.target: Esou wéi fir d'orphan, do oppress net [him].

trans-unit.source: And as for the petitioner, do not repel [him].
trans-unit.target: A wéi fir d'petitioner, do gouft net [him].

trans-unit.source: But as for the favor of your Lord, report [it].
trans-unit.target: Mä wéi fir de Faveur vum Är Lord, Rapport [ass].

trans-unit.source: Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast?
trans-unit.target: Huet Mir géifen net fir Iech, [O Muhammad], Är Broscht?

trans-unit.source: And We removed from you your burden
trans-unit.target: A mir geläscht vum Dir Är Belaaschtung

trans-unit.source: Which had weighed upon your back
trans-unit.target: Wat hat op Är zréck gewien

trans-unit.source: And raised high for you your repute.
trans-unit.target: An dengen héich fir Iech Är gros iwwerholl.

trans-unit.source: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.
trans-unit.target: Fir Dot, mat nuren [ginn] bescheed.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.
trans-unit.target: Iwwerhaapt, mat nuren [ginn] bescheed.

trans-unit.source: So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship].
trans-unit.target: Also wann Dir ofbezuelt hut [Är Flichten], dann z'erhiewen [fir Chouer].

trans-unit.source: And to your Lord direct [your] longing.
